dialogue_en:
And that's the last thing I remember.
The rest is a blank.
dialogue_jp:
俺の記憶は　ここで終わりだ
あとは覚えていない

dialogue_en: The hell it is. What happened!?
dialogue_jp: おいおい　おいおいおい！

dialogue_en:
It was all over the news.
I remember watching it with my mom.
dialogue_jp: 『英雄セフィロス　訓練中に行方不明』

dialogue_en: They said he went missing during a training exercise.
dialogue_jp: そんなニュース　お母さんと見たよ

dialogue_en: But then...the story changed. A couple days later, they started reporting that he was killed in action.
dialogue_jp:
そして　何日かあとに
『実は戦死だった』って発表されたよね

dialogue_en: Yeah, that was it.
dialogue_jp: うん　そうそう！

dialogue_en: The news outlets are nothin' but Shinra mouthpieces spewin' propaganda.
dialogue_jp:
ニュースを作っているのは神羅だ
やつら　やり放題だからな

dialogue_en: Question!
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Only dumbasses believe that shit.
dialogue_jp: 信じるほうがどうかしてる！

dialogue_en: Does that make me a dumbass?
dialogue_jp: わたし　信じてましたけど

dialogue_en: I didn't say that. What I meant was...
dialogue_jp: ああ……あれだ

dialogue_en: screw Shinra for manipulatin' honest folks.
dialogue_jp: とにかく神羅がぜんぶ悪いってこった

dialogue_en:
It doesn't matter what they said back then.
Sephiroth was in Midgar. We fought him.
dialogue_jp:
５年前の真実はともかく
俺たちは　ミッドガルでセフィロスと戦ってきた

dialogue_en: Whatever happened...he's alive.
dialogue_jp: あいつは　生きている

dialogue_en: Dunno about "alive" so much as..."around"?
dialogue_jp: 生きているっていうか　いる？

dialogue_en: But...why come back now?
dialogue_jp: どうして　いまになって現れたんだろう

dialogue_en: After five years...doing who-knows-what?
dialogue_jp: ５年間　なにをしていたのかな

dialogue_en: Because...he wants to finish what he started.
dialogue_jp: セフィロスは　あの日の続きを始めたんだ

dialogue_en:
He wants to "reclaim his birthright" and rule over
the planet with Jenova at his side.
dialogue_jp:
ジェノバとともに　この星を取り戻して
支配者になるとかいう計画の続きを

dialogue_en: After five years?
dialogue_jp: ５年ぶりに？

dialogue_en:
Not to sound like a broken record, but...
it's really bothering me.
dialogue_jp:
ごめんね　しつこくて
でも　気になって……

dialogue_en: Well, what's botherin' me is all this Jenova stuff.
dialogue_jp: ジェノバってのも　よくわかんねえな

dialogue_en: 'Scuse me.
dialogue_jp: ごめん

dialogue_en: Guess the travel─or something─really did a number on my back. Feels as stiff as a board.
dialogue_jp:
荒野？　慣れてなくて疲れちゃった
背中　ガチガチ

dialogue_en: Lemme take a look.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと触らせて

dialogue_en: Wow.
dialogue_jp: たいへん

dialogue_en:
You weren't kidding, were you?
Let's get you back to the room.
dialogue_jp:
でも　なんとかできるかも
部屋行こう？

dialogue_en: Yeah, let's just call it a night.
dialogue_jp: んじゃ　今日はこの辺にしとくか

dialogue_en: ...mine.
dialogue_jp: レッド……

dialogue_en: Oh no you don't! That bed's─
dialogue_jp: おいおいおいおいおい～

dialogue_en: No amount of guesswork'll get us any closer to the truth, so how about we give our heads a rest?
dialogue_jp:
結局　セフィロスがなにしてたかなんて
オレたちにわかるはずねえしな

dialogue_en: Sweet dreams.
dialogue_jp: おやすみ

dialogue_en: Ah, man...
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: See ya tomorrow.
dialogue_jp: おやすみなさい

dialogue_en: Hey, Aerith. You awake?
dialogue_jp: エアリス　寝ちゃった？

dialogue_en: Barely. Why?
dialogue_jp: ううん　ギリギリ

dialogue_en: Was wondering... What's Cloud been doing these past five years? Where's he been?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド……
この５年間　どこでなにをしてたのかな

dialogue_en: And you're asking me this?
dialogue_jp: それ　わたしにきく？

dialogue_en: Just had a feeling you'd know.
dialogue_jp: なんでも　知ってるのかなって

dialogue_en: Prob'ly did, at one point.
dialogue_jp: 知ってたんだと思う

dialogue_en: All that stuff was taken from me though.
dialogue_jp: でも　取られちゃった

dialogue_en: Or...maybe erased?
dialogue_jp: ……消されちゃった？

dialogue_en: By Whispers?
dialogue_jp: フィーラーに？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: たぶん

dialogue_en: Maybe that's why.
dialogue_jp: 私も　取られたのかな

dialogue_en: Why what?
dialogue_jp: なにを？

dialogue_en: This is gonna sound crazy, but...as far as I know, Cloud was never in Nibelheim five years ago.
dialogue_jp:
私の記憶では　５年前
クラウドはニブルヘイムに来なかったの

dialogue_en: Cloud. You up?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　起きてる？

dialogue_en: Sorry. Did I wake you?
dialogue_jp: ごめん　寝てた？

dialogue_en: Nope. What's goin' on?
dialogue_jp: いや　なにかあったのか

dialogue_en:
Oh, uh...it's nothing really.
There's just something I need to ask you.
dialogue_jp:
ううん　でも
クラウドに聞きたいことがあって

dialogue_en: So, can we talk?
dialogue_jp: すこし　話さない？

dialogue_en: Sure.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Great. But not here.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　場所変えよっか

dialogue_en: Follow me.
dialogue_jp: こっち　こっち

dialogue_en: You know that I killed her.
dialogue_jp: ティファは　俺が殺したはずだ

dialogue_en: So who is she?
dialogue_jp: ならば　あれは誰だ？

dialogue_en: Or rather...what is she?
dialogue_jp: まったく　油断も隙もないな

dialogue_en: Pardon me, sir, but you don't look very well. An old war wound acting up, perhaps?
dialogue_jp:
顔色が　すぐれないようですね
戦場の古傷でも痛みますか？

dialogue_en: If so, I can certainly empathize. I myself fought for the company once upon a time─and my body's never let me forget it.
dialogue_jp:
実は　私も神羅あがりでしてね
今はしがない宿屋ですが　たまに古傷が痛むんです

dialogue_en: It's been a good many years since I served, but...still feels like yesterday.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　私が神羅にいたのは
ずいぶんと前のことですが……

dialogue_en: Might I suggest retiring to your room for the evening?
dialogue_jp:
部屋で　お休みになられたほうが
よろしいのでは？

dialogue_en: Do you think Midgar's over there?
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル　あっちかな

dialogue_en: Anyway...
dialogue_jp: あのね

dialogue_en: There's somethin' I need to ask you too.
dialogue_jp: 俺も　聞きたいことがある

dialogue_en: Shoot.
dialogue_jp: どうぞ

dialogue_en:
That night five years ago...at the reactor?
I saw you lying there.
dialogue_jp:
５年前　あの日
魔晄炉の中で　俺はティファを見た

dialogue_en: Saw your wound and...all the blood.
dialogue_jp: 深い傷から　血が流れ出して

dialogue_en: I figured it was too late.
dialogue_jp: もう　手遅れだと思った

dialogue_en: Yeah...?
dialogue_jp: うん……

dialogue_en:
Wait, what're you implying? That I died?
That I'm some kind of impostor?
dialogue_jp:
それって　私を疑ってるの？
あの時とは別人じゃないかって

dialogue_en:
Can't believe I'm having this conversation
with you...but here we are.
dialogue_jp: こんなふうに疑われるなんて　思ってもいなかった

dialogue_en: Here. Look.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　見て

dialogue_en: My scar. That proof enough?
dialogue_jp: ほら　あの時の傷

dialogue_en: After you left, Zangan found me. He's the one who brought me to the clinic.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉で私を助けてくれたのは
ザンガン先生だった

dialogue_en: He risked his life carrying me out of the reactor and down the river.
dialogue_jp: 先生は　私を抱えて命懸けで川をくだった

dialogue_en: Wasn't just him though. There's the doctor who operated on me all night, and the nurses who looked after me for days on end.
dialogue_jp:
運ばれた先のお医者さんは徹夜で手術
看護師さんたちは　ずっと私を見ていてくれた

dialogue_en: I'm here now because they were there for me then.
dialogue_jp: そういう人たちのおかげで　私は生きのびたの

dialogue_en: And where were you again?
dialogue_jp: クラウドは　どうなの？

dialogue_en: In fact, where've you been this whole time?
dialogue_jp: 村を出てから　なにをしてたの？

dialogue_en: For five years.
dialogue_jp: この５年間は？

dialogue_en: You know I can't tell you that.
dialogue_jp: 秘密の多い仕事なんだ

dialogue_en: Of course you can't.
dialogue_jp: そうでしょうね

dialogue_en: Sorry, I just...need some space.
dialogue_jp: ごめん　部屋に戻るね

dialogue_en: I thought we could just pick up where we left off, like nothing had changed...but I guess I was wrong.
dialogue_jp:
私たち　幼なじみっていうほど
仲良しじゃなかったよね

dialogue_en: Guess so.
dialogue_jp: かもな

dialogue_en:
I was so happy to see you again,
but maybe I shouldn't have been.
dialogue_jp: 再会が嬉しくて　はしゃぎすぎたかな

dialogue_en: You two fight?
dialogue_jp: もめたのか？

dialogue_en: No.
dialogue_jp: いや

dialogue_en: We have enough problems as it is.
dialogue_jp: これ以上　問題は抱え込みたくねえ

dialogue_en: Copy?
dialogue_jp: いいな

dialogue_en: Night.
dialogue_jp: 寝る

dialogue_en: Tomorrow is another day.
dialogue_jp: 夜は　必ず明けるさ

dialogue_en: What's this?
dialogue_jp: これは……

dialogue_en: "A gift from our humble establishment.
dialogue_jp: 当宿からの　ささやかなプレゼントです

dialogue_en: "Though it may not look like much, it should help you to break the ice with those you meet."
dialogue_jp:
よろしければ　コミュニケーションツールとして
ご活用ください

dialogue_en: Queen's Blood?
dialogue_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッド？

dialogue_en: Good morning, sir.
dialogue_jp: おはようございます

dialogue_en: I must apologize for not introducing myself to you earlier. I'm Broden, the owner of this inn.
dialogue_jp:
ご挨拶が遅くなりました
私はブロード　この宿のオーナーです

dialogue_en: Your companions have all stepped out.
dialogue_jp: みなさんは　すでにお出かけですよ

dialogue_en: Oh, but "Barret" left a message he wanted me to pass along to you.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　そうだ
バレットさんから伝言をあずかってます

dialogue_en:
"You missed roll call, SOLDIER boy.
Luckily, you're on leave for the day.
dialogue_jp:
『寝ぼすけのソルジャーさんよ
　今日は１日　自由行動だ』

dialogue_en:
"Don't waste it though.
Get your equipment checked ASAP."
dialogue_jp: 『いまのうちに　装備の点検でもしておくんだな』

dialogue_en: Sound advice.
dialogue_jp: ……とのことです

dialogue_en: Perhaps a trip to the arms dealer is in order?
dialogue_jp: まずは　武器屋へ行かれてみてはいかがでしょう？

dialogue_en: Good idea.
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en: By the way, Cloud. Do you have any folios on you?
dialogue_jp:
それと　クラウドさん
『スキルブック』をお持ちですよね

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en:
In that case, you might also want
to pay a visit to Maghnata Books.
dialogue_jp:
でしたら　ついでに
本屋にも寄られてはどうでしょう？

dialogue_en:
They have stores all over, but the first
official one was built here in Kalm.
dialogue_jp: カームの本屋は　由緒ある魔導書店の第１号店

dialogue_en: And their resident scholars are remarkably talented.
dialogue_jp: たしか　初回はサービスしてくれるはずです

dialogue_en: If you want to unlock the true potential of your folios, you should go see them.
dialogue_jp:
熟練の技能士が
お客様の新たな能力を引き出すように

dialogue_en: The first customization is always free.
dialogue_jp: スキルブックを　カスタマイズしてくれますよ

dialogue_en: Kalm's a simple─but beautiful─town.
dialogue_jp: カームは素朴でいい街ですよ

dialogue_en: Take your time─see the sights.
dialogue_jp: ゆっくり観光なさってください

dialogue_en: Get your folios and weapons inspected yet?
dialogue_jp: 武器屋と本屋には行かれましたかな

dialogue_en: Finally.
dialogue_jp: 起きたか

dialogue_en: Rough day yesterday, huh?
dialogue_jp: よほど　疲れていたようだな

dialogue_en: You've been waiting for me?
dialogue_jp: 俺を待っていたのか？

dialogue_en: I've been waiting for a chance to thank you properly.
dialogue_jp: 感謝を伝えていなかったと思ってな

dialogue_en: Without your help, I'd still be in Hojo's clutches─trapped in that lab.
dialogue_jp: クラウドたちのおかげで　宝条から逃げられた

dialogue_en: Was nothing.
dialogue_jp: なりゆきだ

dialogue_en: Even so, I owe you a debt. And till it's paid...
dialogue_jp: だとしても　恩はかならず返す

dialogue_en: I'm going to accompany you.
dialogue_jp: しばらくは　一緒に行く

dialogue_en: Oh, uh...
dialogue_jp: そうだ

dialogue_en:
If you're getting your equipment checked,
have them check mine while you're at it.
dialogue_jp: 装備の点検に行くなら　私の装備品も頼む

dialogue_en: Sure thing.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: The rook's got a backbone.
dialogue_jp: えらそうな新入りだな

dialogue_en: Morning.
dialogue_jp: おはよう

dialogue_en: Morning.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Everyone's kinda off doin' their own thing.
dialogue_jp: みんな　街を見に行ったみたい

dialogue_en: I noticed.
dialogue_jp: そうらしいな

dialogue_en: Say, uh... This tank remind you of anything?
dialogue_jp: あのタンク　思い出さない？

dialogue_en: "This tank remind you of anything?"
dialogue_jp: あのタンク　思い出さない？

dialogue_en: The place I made that promise to you.
dialogue_jp: 約束した場所だ

dialogue_en: The water tower in Nibelheim.
dialogue_jp: ニブルヘイムの給水塔に似てるな

dialogue_en: Any other mako tank.
dialogue_jp: ただの魔晄タンクだ

dialogue_en: Yeah. The place I made that promise to you.
dialogue_jp: ああ　約束した場所だ

dialogue_en:
You remember the dress I wore?
It was one of my favorites.
dialogue_jp: あの時の服　お気に入りだった

dialogue_en: Uh... The light blue one? With a bit of green in there?
dialogue_jp: ああ　水色みたいな　緑みたいな色の

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: うん

dialogue_en: Looks kinda like the water tower in Nibelheim.
dialogue_jp: ニブルヘイムの給水塔に似てるな

dialogue_en: Right?
dialogue_jp: うん

dialogue_en: Weird to think how much it meant to me back then. When it was still there.
dialogue_jp:
思い出の場所なのに
今はもう　ないんだよね

dialogue_en: Any other mako tank.
dialogue_jp: ただの魔晄タンクだ

dialogue_en: Sorry. Dumb question.
dialogue_jp: そう……だね

dialogue_en:
Makes you think, though...
How the mako in it came all the way from Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルから魔晄を運んで
あのタンクに貯めておくんだ

dialogue_en: Yeah, it does...
dialogue_jp: そうなんだ

dialogue_en: This is such a quiet, peaceful town.
dialogue_jp: おだやかで　いい街だね

dialogue_en: Feels a little weird to be taking it easy, though...
dialogue_jp:
なんだか　のんびりしちゃうね
いいのかな……

dialogue_en: Look who it is. You up already?
dialogue_jp: おう　お早いお目覚めで

dialogue_en: Drinkin' already?
dialogue_jp: 朝から飲んでるのか

dialogue_en: Hah! No sir.
dialogue_jp: 酒じゃねえよ

dialogue_en: Not gonna have a drop till Seventh Heaven's back up and runnin'.
dialogue_jp: 祝杯は　セブンスヘブンを再建してからだ

dialogue_en: "Not gonna have a drop till Seventh Heaven's back up and runnin'."
dialogue_jp: 祝杯は　セブンスヘブンを再建してからだ

dialogue_en: First one's on me.
dialogue_jp: その時は俺がおごろう

dialogue_en: First one'll taste good.
dialogue_jp: うまい酒になりそうだな

dialogue_en: No time soon then.
dialogue_jp: 当分おあずけだな

dialogue_en: First one's on me, okay?
dialogue_jp: その時は　俺がおごろう

dialogue_en: Now that's what I'm talkin' about!
dialogue_jp: そりゃ　うれしいねえ

dialogue_en: Gotta remember to order some top-shelf stuff in that case.
dialogue_jp: んじゃ　高い酒を仕入れとかないとな

dialogue_en: First one'll taste good.
dialogue_jp: うまい酒になりそうだな

dialogue_en: Damn straight! 'Specially 'cause I'll be havin' it with friends at a huge party!
dialogue_jp:
おうよ　ハデな開店パーティーを開いて
ドンチャン騒ぎよ

dialogue_en: No time soon then.
dialogue_jp: 当分　おあずけだな

dialogue_en: Hmph, well... Sooner than you think.
dialogue_jp: また　すぐにやれるさ

dialogue_en:
Got a long road ahead of us.
Better make sure you're prepped for the journey.
dialogue_jp:
長旅になりそうだ
準備は　しっかりしとけよ

dialogue_en:
Don't go buyin' any souvenirs, y'hear?
They'll just weigh us down.
dialogue_jp: 土産はまだ買うなよ　荷物になるだけだ

dialogue_en: I take it our equipment is in order?
dialogue_jp: 装備の点検は　終わったのか

dialogue_en: What are you doing here anyway?
dialogue_jp: ここで　なにをしている

dialogue_en:
Standing watch.
One can never be too careful with Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
見張りだ
いつ神羅が来ても　おかしくはない

dialogue_en: "One can never be too careful with Shinra."
dialogue_jp: 神羅が来ても　おかしくはない

dialogue_en: I knew I could count on you.
dialogue_jp: さすが　頼りになるな

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: 助かるよ

dialogue_en: Good boy.
dialogue_jp: 真面目だな

dialogue_en: I knew I could count on you.
dialogue_jp: さすが　頼りになるな

dialogue_en: Hmph. Flattery will get you nowhere.
dialogue_jp: ほめても　なにも出ないぞ

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: 助かるよ

dialogue_en: No need to thank me. I'm doing this for myself.
dialogue_jp: 気にするな　私自身のためだ

dialogue_en: Good boy.
dialogue_jp: 真面目だな

dialogue_en:
Someone has to be.
Next time, it might even be you.
dialogue_jp:
誰もやらないからな
しかたなくやっている

dialogue_en: Leave this to me.
dialogue_jp: 見張りは　まかせろ

dialogue_en: Nothing to report so far.
dialogue_jp: いまのところ　異状はない

dialogue_en: Aha, finally decided to get up?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　おはよう

dialogue_en: Yeah. So, whatcha been doin'?
dialogue_jp: ああ　なにをしてるんだ？

dialogue_en: Why, waiting for you, of course.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　探してたの

dialogue_en: You have?
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en: Got business with the bookstore?
dialogue_jp: 本屋に用事？

dialogue_en: If so, I won't keep you. But if you're free afterwards...
dialogue_jp: あのね　そのあと時間ある？

dialogue_en: Wanna climb the clock tower together?
dialogue_jp: 塔のうえ　行ってみない？

dialogue_en: "Wanna climb the clock tower together?"
dialogue_jp: 塔のうえ　行ってみない？

dialogue_en: Sure. Let's.
dialogue_jp: ああ　行こう

dialogue_en: ...If I have to.
dialogue_jp: しかたないな

dialogue_en: I'm busy.
dialogue_jp: ヒマじゃない

dialogue_en: Sure. Let's.
dialogue_jp: ああ　行こう

dialogue_en: For real!? Awesome!
dialogue_jp: ホント？　やった！

dialogue_en: ...If I have to.
dialogue_jp: しかたないな

dialogue_en: You got a real way with words.
dialogue_jp: その言い方！

dialogue_en: You're lucky I speak your language, mister.
dialogue_jp: でも　ま　いっか

dialogue_en: I'm busy.
dialogue_jp: ヒマじゃない

dialogue_en: But it'll only take a few minutes! Come on!
dialogue_jp: ええ　そんなあ～　お願い！

dialogue_en: Fine.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: Sweet!
dialogue_jp: やった！

dialogue_en: Since it was my idea, I'll go get the tickets.
dialogue_jp:
それじゃあ
入場券　もらっておくから

dialogue_en: I'll meet you in front of the tower, okay?
dialogue_jp: 塔の前で　集合

dialogue_en: I'll catch up with you later, alright?
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　あとでね

dialogue_en: Don't forget. In front of the tower.
dialogue_jp: 塔の前で集合　だよ

dialogue_en: Hey there! Welcome to Maghnata Books.
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃいませ
魔導書店へ　ようこそ

dialogue_en:
Oh!
I take it this is your first visit to one of our stores.
dialogue_jp:
お客さん
スキルブックをカスタマイズするのは初めて？

dialogue_en: Well, customization can seem tricky to the uninitiated. It takes time and experience to get it right.
dialogue_jp:
スキルブックを強化するには　持ち主に
それ相応の知識や経験　能力が必要なんだけど

dialogue_en:
But I think you'll pick it up quick enough.
Let's give it a try.
dialogue_jp:
お客さんは大丈夫そうだね
早速　やってみようか

dialogue_en: ...And that's about all we can do for now.
dialogue_jp: まあ　最初はこんなもんかな

dialogue_en: But we haven't even skimmed the surface, believe you me. There's much more to this than meets the eye.
dialogue_jp:
スキルブックは　仲間との絆が深まることで
さらに力を引き出すことができるよ

dialogue_en: May not seem like it yet, but you'll see.
dialogue_jp:
また　強化したくなったら
いつでも持ってきなよ

dialogue_en: Hey there.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい

dialogue_en: Oh, back for more?
dialogue_jp: おっ　また来たね

dialogue_en: What'll it be?
dialogue_jp: 今日は　どうします？

dialogue_en: See you around.
dialogue_jp: いつでもどうぞ

dialogue_en: Have a good one.
dialogue_jp: また寄ってね

dialogue_en: Thanks for stoppin' by.
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございました

dialogue_en: Welcome.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい

dialogue_en:
Damn...
That is quite the weapon you got there, mister.
dialogue_jp:
おっ　兄ちゃん
渋い武器持ってるね

dialogue_en: Seen plenty of action, by the look of it.
dialogue_jp: 使い込まれた　いい色してやがる

dialogue_en: But saying that, it's still only a shadow of what it could be. With a little love, that baby'll sing.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　そいつのポテンシャルはまだまだだ
しっかり整備すれば　もっと強くなるぜ

dialogue_en: If you like, I could show you.
dialogue_jp: どうだい　手ほどきしようか？

dialogue_en:
See─what'd I tell you! That girl is singing.
And she's got the voice of an angel.
dialogue_jp:
いいねえ　輝きが増したじゃねえか
武器もニッコリ笑ってやがる

dialogue_en: Just make sure you take proper care of her, alright?
dialogue_jp:
これからも　定期的に
カスタマイズしてやるんだな

dialogue_en:
Oh, and while you're here,
check out what we got to offer.
dialogue_jp:
せっかくだ
ウチの商品も見ていってくれよ

dialogue_en: You take care of that weapon now!
dialogue_jp: そんじゃ　武器は大切にな

dialogue_en: Back again! What can I do ya for?
dialogue_jp: よお　兄ちゃん　調子はどうだ？

dialogue_en: Lemme know if something piques your interest.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい　ゆっくり見ていけよ

dialogue_en: We got a great selection here, you know.
dialogue_jp: ウチはいい品　そろえてるぜ

dialogue_en: 'Preciate it.
dialogue_jp: ありがとよ

dialogue_en: Hope to see you again!
dialogue_jp: また　いつでも来いよ

dialogue_en: You be careful out there.
dialogue_jp: そんじゃ　気をつけてな

dialogue_en: Excuse me, sir, but the tower's not open yet.
dialogue_jp: すみません　まだ準備中なんです

dialogue_en: I'm afraid you'll have to come back later.
dialogue_jp: しばらくあとで　お越しください

dialogue_en: They said it's not open yet. If you got anything else you need to do, now's the time.
dialogue_jp:
準備中だって
クラウド　用事すませてきたら？

dialogue_en: Cloud! Over here!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　こっちこっち！

dialogue_en: Let's get started then, shall we?
dialogue_jp: それじゃ　行こっか

dialogue_en: I think Midgar's thisaway.
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル　こっちだったよね

dialogue_en: Should be, yeah.
dialogue_jp: そのはずだ

dialogue_en: Funny, isn't it? How small it looks.
dialogue_jp: ここから見ると　小さいね

dialogue_en: It is far away.
dialogue_jp: 距離があるからな

dialogue_en: So...did something happen between you and Tifa?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　ティファとなにかあった？

dialogue_en: Don't look so shocked. We're roommates, you know.
dialogue_jp: ほら　部屋　同じだったから

dialogue_en: She say something?
dialogue_jp: なにか言ってたか

dialogue_en: Not about you two, no.
dialogue_jp: 特には　なにも

dialogue_en: Still, I can tell.
dialogue_jp: でも　わかる

dialogue_en:
I would've given anything to have a friend
when I was growing up.
dialogue_jp: 幼なじみなんて　うらやましい

dialogue_en: Don't take her for granted.
dialogue_jp: 大切にしなくちゃ

dialogue_en: Just what we need...
dialogue_jp: ちきしょう

dialogue_en: Go!
dialogue_jp: 行け！

dialogue_en:
A team, B team, you know the drill!
Let's find these terrorists!
dialogue_jp:
Ａ班　Ｂ班わかれろ
アバランチを探せ！

dialogue_en: Move!
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ！

dialogue_en: They're looking for us, aren't they?
dialogue_jp: わたしたち　探してる？

dialogue_en: Gotta be.
dialogue_jp: おそらく

dialogue_en: Ah, there you are.
dialogue_jp: ああ　いたか

dialogue_en:
There isn't much time.
We need to get back to the inn.
dialogue_jp: 話はあと　とにかく宿に戻れ

dialogue_en: But...
dialogue_jp: でも……

dialogue_en:
Don't worry about your friends.
They're safe; trust me.
dialogue_jp: 仲間は避難した　あとは君たちだけだ

dialogue_en: No violence─please. This town's suffered enough.
dialogue_jp:
戦おうなんて　考えないでくれ
街が巻き込まれる

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 逃げよう

dialogue_en: Follow me.
dialogue_jp: ついてこい

dialogue_en: We'll take the back way.
dialogue_jp: 裏路地を行こう

dialogue_en: Stick close.
dialogue_jp: どこへ行く？

dialogue_en: What're you doing?
dialogue_jp: なにをしている

dialogue_en: Never know what you're gonna run into out there. Best be prepared.
dialogue_jp: なにがあるかわからない　備えはしっかりな

dialogue_en: Careful out there.
dialogue_jp: 気をつけてな

dialogue_en: Not here.
dialogue_jp: 異状なし

dialogue_en: Well, we know they're in town...
dialogue_jp: チッ　どこに隠れてやがる

dialogue_en: Hey, you! Seen anyone acting suspicious?
dialogue_jp:
おい　そこのおまえ
不審者を見なかったか？

dialogue_en: No, I haven't...
dialogue_jp: いえ　私はなにも……

dialogue_en: The moment any of you see someone suspicious, inform the nearest trooper. Got it!?
dialogue_jp:
他に不審者を見かけたヤツはいないか！
見かけた者は　ただちに報告しろ

dialogue_en: I want them found─now!
dialogue_jp: まだ見つからないのか　急ぐぞ！

dialogue_en: Sir!
dialogue_jp: ハッ！

dialogue_en: Hey, shithead! Why'd you run?
dialogue_jp: 貴様　なぜ逃げた！

dialogue_en: I was just scared, that's all!
dialogue_jp: いや　追いかけられたから……

dialogue_en: Scared we might find out what you been up to? That it?
dialogue_jp: 怪しいな　なにを隠している！

dialogue_en: We're currently conducting a search!
dialogue_jp: 現在　店内を捜査中だ

dialogue_en: No one's allowed inside!
dialogue_jp: 誰も中に入るな！

dialogue_en: Excuse me. We have a few questions...
dialogue_jp:
申し訳ありませんが
ご協力をお願いします

dialogue_en: Uhh, what is this about?
dialogue_jp: いきなり　なんなんですか？

dialogue_en: Let's see some ID─and don't make me ask twice.
dialogue_jp: 口答えせず　さっさと身分証を見せろ！

dialogue_en:
I heard about the reactor bombings in Midgar.
That was you, wasn't it?
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの魔晄炉をやったのは
君たちなんだろう？

dialogue_en: It's okay, I'm on your side. Got a contact at HQ.
dialogue_jp: 私は味方だ　本家に知り合いがいてね

dialogue_en: You're with Avalanche?
dialogue_jp: あんたも　アバランチか

dialogue_en: Not exactly.
dialogue_jp: 似たようなものだ

dialogue_en: Stop.
dialogue_jp: 待て！

dialogue_en: I'll keep the troopers occupied.
dialogue_jp: 私が兵士の気を引こう

dialogue_en: While we're talking, you two go up and over.
dialogue_jp: 君たちは　上の足場を渡れ

dialogue_en: May I ask what's going on?
dialogue_jp: なにか　あったんですか？

dialogue_en: We're searching for some fugitives.
dialogue_jp: 逃亡犯の捜索中だ

dialogue_en: Have you seen anyone suspicious?
dialogue_jp: 怪しいやつを見なかったか？

dialogue_en: Now that you mention it, I think I might have...
dialogue_jp: ああ　どこかで見たような

dialogue_en: Though perhaps it was just my imagination. Or was it...?
dialogue_jp:
いや　あれは違うか
いやでも……

dialogue_en: Oh, for the love of─get outta here!
dialogue_jp: もういい　家に帰れ！

dialogue_en: Wait, wait! I know I saw some people who had a fugitive air about them! If only I could remember their faces...
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと待ってください
いま思い出しますから　えっと……

dialogue_en: Annoy someone else and stop wasting our time.
dialogue_jp: 捜索の邪魔だ　さっさと行け！

dialogue_en: They turn up yet!?
dialogue_jp: アバランチは居たか？

dialogue_en: No, but we're still searching buildings!
dialogue_jp: 順次　建物内を捜索中です

dialogue_en: Well, search harder! We gotta find 'em!
dialogue_jp: 急げ　ネズミ１匹逃すな！

dialogue_en: That went well.
dialogue_jp: うまくいったな

dialogue_en: The inn's not much further, but stay on your toes.
dialogue_jp: 宿まであと少し　気を抜くな

dialogue_en: Where are they?
dialogue_jp: みんなは？

dialogue_en: Down below─waiting for you.
dialogue_jp: 下で待っている

dialogue_en: The tunnel in the basement will take you outside of town. Leave now and they won't catch you.
dialogue_jp:
地下道が街の外まで続いている
いまならまだ待ち伏せはないはずだ

dialogue_en: Head to the east. Friend of mine runs a farm out there. He'd be happy to help you.
dialogue_jp:
外に出たら　近くの農場に
私の知人がいるから頼るといい

dialogue_en: Also...
dialogue_jp: それと……

dialogue_en: Take this.
dialogue_jp: これを

dialogue_en: It's a transmuter.
dialogue_jp: クラフト端末だ

dialogue_en:
Converts raw materials into more practical items.
A republic antique, but it still works.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代に作られた骨董品だが
『アイテムクラフト』ができるようになる

dialogue_en: You'll get more use out of it than me.
dialogue_jp: よければ　使ってくれ

dialogue_en: Why're you doin' this? Coulda just turned us in.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちを行かせて　あんたは大丈夫なのか

dialogue_en:
Yeah, I could've...but this town and I have
a history with Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
私も　この街も
神羅とは色々あってね

dialogue_en: Who knows? Maybe this'll turn out to be the worst decision I've ever made.
dialogue_jp: 正直　これが正しい道なのかはわからん

dialogue_en: So before I change my mind, you better get going.
dialogue_jp: 考えが変わる前に　さっさと行ってくれ

dialogue_en: View the item transmutation tutorial?
dialogue_jp: 『アイテムクラフト』のチュートリアルを確認しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Urng...
dialogue_jp: うう……

dialogue_en: Khoff! Khoff! Hrng... Hahh...
dialogue_jp: ゲホッゲホ……

dialogue_en: This goes without saying, but you'll have to lie low for a while.
dialogue_jp: しばらくは　この街に近づかないほうがいい

dialogue_en:
I'll let my friend at the farm know you're coming...
It's all good.
dialogue_jp:
農場のヤツには連絡しておく
寄ってみてくれ

dialogue_en: Best of luck to you.
dialogue_jp: 幸運を祈るよ

dialogue_en: You made it! All in one piece?
dialogue_jp: よかった　無事だったんだ

dialogue_en: Sorry we're late!
dialogue_jp: ごめ～ん！

dialogue_en: For the love of... Where the hell have you two been?
dialogue_jp: ったく　ふたりでなにしてやがったんだ

dialogue_en: On a date! Kind of.
dialogue_jp: デート　みたいな？

dialogue_en:
Well, that was the last one!
Least till things calm down.
dialogue_jp: そういうのは　しばらくおあずけだ

dialogue_en: Got that!?
dialogue_jp: いいな！

dialogue_en: Now let's move.
dialogue_jp: よし　脱出だ

dialogue_en: Where to now?
dialogue_jp: 行き止まり？

dialogue_en: Where there's a draft. This way.
dialogue_jp: 風が流れている　こっちだ

dialogue_en: Looks like a job for me.
dialogue_jp: オレの出番だな

dialogue_en: Wow...
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Just look at it all...
dialogue_jp: 星って

dialogue_en: It's so green.
dialogue_jp: 生きてるんだ

dialogue_en: ...A living, breathing planet.
dialogue_jp: あらためて　そう思った

dialogue_en:
Even after everything we've done to it,
it's still going strong.
dialogue_jp: それに　わたしなんかより　ずっと強そう

dialogue_en: It may look that way.
dialogue_jp: そう見えるだけだ

dialogue_en: But in reality, it's barely hanging on.
dialogue_jp: だから人々は　崩壊の予兆に気づかない

dialogue_en: Guess I still have a lot to learn.
dialogue_jp: いろいろ　教えてね

dialogue_en: Whaddya wanna know?
dialogue_jp: なにが知りたいんだ？

dialogue_en: Hmm... For starters...
dialogue_jp: うーん　たとえば

dialogue_en: How do we cross these plains?
dialogue_jp: 荒野の　歩き方？

dialogue_en: C'mon now. That's easy.
dialogue_jp: そんなの　簡単だぜ

dialogue_en: The same way you get anywhere.
dialogue_jp: オレのやり方は

dialogue_en: Pick a direction and start walkin'!
dialogue_jp: とりあえず　歩き出せー！

dialogue_en: Left, your left, your left, right...
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: I guess we won't be coming back anytime soon.
dialogue_jp: カームには　しばらく戻れないよね

dialogue_en: Guess not.
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en: Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 行こう

dialogue_en: And there it was! The first step on our new journey. You coming?
dialogue_jp: これが本当のはじまり　だね

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: 'Course we are.
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Right?
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Follow me.
dialogue_jp: よろしくな

dialogue_en: Alright!
dialogue_jp: おっしゃあ

dialogue_en: Let's get this show on the road, people!
dialogue_jp: 行くぜ　行くぜ　行くぜ　行くぜー！

dialogue_en: You know what that metal monstrosity is, don'tcha?
dialogue_jp: おまえ　あのパイプがなにか知ってるか？

dialogue_en: It's a pipeline.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄パイプ

dialogue_en: Moves mako pumped in Midgar to the outlying towns and wherever else.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルで汲み上げた魔晄を
ほかの街へ　輸送するためのものだ

dialogue_en: Hmph... You call it a pipeline, but I call it a funnel─one that drains the planet's lifeblood into Shinra's pockets.
dialogue_jp:
あのパイプん中を流れてんのは　星の命だ
金儲けに使っていいもんじゃねえ

dialogue_en: Mark my words, I'm gonna put a stop to that.
dialogue_jp: あれも　いつかぶっ壊してやる

dialogue_en: Oh, I know!
dialogue_jp: そうだ！

dialogue_en: How 'bout we break it in half and stick one end in the ground? That way, we'll really be givin' back to the planet!
dialogue_jp:
パイプをひん曲げて　地面に突っ込んでよ
魔晄を星に返すってのはどうだ？

dialogue_en: There's an idea.
dialogue_jp: それは　名案だな

dialogue_en: Real genius one.
dialogue_jp: ああ　名案だ

dialogue_en: And...unique?
dialogue_jp: いいかも？

dialogue_en: Very.
dialogue_jp: 覚えておこう

dialogue_en: Oh c'mon!
dialogue_jp: おまえらー！

dialogue_en: This road's seen better days...
dialogue_jp: 道路　ヒビだらけだね

dialogue_en: Much of the republic's infrastructure has fallen into disrepair after years of neglect.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代に作られた　古い道だ
整備をしなければ　こうなる

dialogue_en: And you know damn well Shinra ain't about to spend a single gil on shit they don't use.
dialogue_jp: 神羅は自分で使うとこしか　手入れしねえからな

dialogue_en: Is it true the republic used to run buses between towns?
dialogue_jp: 昔はバスが走ってたって　聞いたことがあるな

dialogue_en: Yes, though that service ended when the war did.
dialogue_jp: バスは　共和国と一緒になくなった

dialogue_en: In other words, we gotta hoof it 'cause Shinra's run by tightwads.
dialogue_jp:
つまり　オレたちが歩かされてんのは
神羅のせいってわけだ

dialogue_en: Well, I don't mind. It's kinda fun exploring the great outdoors!
dialogue_jp:
でも　楽しい
ハイキングって　こんな感じ？

dialogue_en: You do you...
dialogue_jp: 考え方次第だ

dialogue_en: That thing Shinra's?
dialogue_jp: 神羅の兵器？

dialogue_en: Looks like...but definitely an older model.
dialogue_jp: ああ　でも　かなり古いな

dialogue_en:
From back when they were
dukin' it out with the republic.
dialogue_jp: 共和国と　ドンパチやってた頃のだろ？

dialogue_en: Hard to imagine this was once a battlefield.
dialogue_jp: このあたりでも　戦争したんだね

dialogue_en: And harder still to find land anywhere that hasn't been a battlefield at some point...
dialogue_jp:
この星は　歴史をさかのぼりゃ
戦争ばっかりだぜ

dialogue_en: Uh... Should we be worried about those things?
dialogue_jp: あれはモンスター？　動物？

dialogue_en: We're fine.
dialogue_jp: 動物だ

dialogue_en: How can you be so sure?
dialogue_jp: どうして　わかるの？

dialogue_en:
'Cause I've read the field guide.
Like any good SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: 図鑑で覚える　兵士の基本のひとつだ

dialogue_en: Local wildlife will only attack while on the hunt, or in defense of their territory. Fiends, on the other hand, attack without reason.
dialogue_jp:
動物は食べるため　または縄張りを守るために襲う
だが　モンスターには理由がない

dialogue_en: If they're attacking, what does it matter?
dialogue_jp: 襲われてからわかっても遅い

dialogue_en: It matters if your nose can discern their intent before they attack─as I gather yours can't.
dialogue_jp:
あれに関して言えば　危険なニオイはしない
鼻を鍛えるんだな

dialogue_en: Town's still crawlin' with troops.
dialogue_jp: まだ神羅がいやがるな

dialogue_en: We should keep our distance for now.
dialogue_jp: しばらくは　戻らないほうがいいだろう

dialogue_en: Yeah... We should get going.
dialogue_jp: 私たちのこと　探してるのかな

dialogue_en: This...kinda feels like our fault.
dialogue_jp: 迷惑　かけちゃったね

dialogue_en: Are you tryin' to get us caught?
dialogue_jp: いま行くと　捕まっちまうぞ

dialogue_en: We can't risk attracting Shinra's attention.
dialogue_jp: 神羅がいるうちは近づかないでおこう

dialogue_en: Now might not be the best time.
dialogue_jp: いまは　やめといたほうがよさそう

dialogue_en: Let's not poke the bear.
dialogue_jp: 神羅　いるね

dialogue_en: You'd be the Avalanche folks?
dialogue_jp: あんたら　アバランチだろ？

dialogue_en:
It's okay, I'm on your side.
Heard you'd be headin' my way.
dialogue_jp:
心配するな
カームの宿屋から連絡があった

dialogue_en: You're safe here, but not for long. By the sound of it, Shinra's leavin' no stone unturned.
dialogue_jp:
神羅が本格的に　あんたらを探すらしい
ここも安全じゃないかもしれない

dialogue_en: Might wanna hole up at the old dock out by the swamp. I'd wager Shinra's forgotten it's even there.
dialogue_jp:
湿地帯のほうに使われていない船着き場がある
身を隠すには　いいかもしれないぞ

dialogue_en: Wish there was somethin' more I could do, but I ain't got the space to put you all up. The swamp's your best bet for now.
dialogue_jp:
悪いが　ここで匿うわけにはいかない
身を隠すなら湿地帯の船着き場がオススメだ

dialogue_en: Seein' more fiends out and about every day. Watch yourselves, y'hear?
dialogue_jp:
最近　モンスターが増えてるんだ
あんたらも　気をつけるんだな

dialogue_en: Well, well! If it ain't my favorite group of hitchhikers!
dialogue_jp:
おやおや
こいつはみなさん　おそろいで

dialogue_en: Fancy meeting you here!
dialogue_jp: トラックのおじさん

dialogue_en: Thanks again for the ride to Kalm.
dialogue_jp: あの時は　お世話になりました

dialogue_en: Ah, don't mention it. It's the least I could do for two such lovely young ladies.
dialogue_jp:
な～に　お嬢さんたちなら
いつでも大歓迎さ

dialogue_en: But I do believe I neglected to introduce myself.
dialogue_jp: おっと　自己紹介がまだだったな

dialogue_en:
The name's Bill, and you can count on me
for a lift anytime.
dialogue_jp: わたしはグリン　以後お見知りおきを

dialogue_en: 'Cept today, that is. 'Fraid the old beaut's pulled up lame. Sorry 'bout that.
dialogue_jp:
今日は　あいにく車の調子が悪くてね
乗せてやれないよ

dialogue_en:
No biggie─we're enjoying the fresh air.
Thanks though.
dialogue_jp: 今日は大丈夫　ありがとう

dialogue_en: You, uh...know someplace we can hunker down?
dialogue_jp: このあたりで　人気のないところはないか

dialogue_en: Hmm... "Hunker down," y'say?
dialogue_jp: 人気のないところ？

dialogue_en:
I'd almost forgotten what it was like to be
young and in love.
dialogue_jp: まあ　若いうちは情熱に流されるものだからな

dialogue_en: Y'all just head straight that a-way, toward the swamplands. You'll find an abandoned building by the dock. I guarantee no one'll bother ya there!
dialogue_jp:
そうだな　湿地帯にある船着き場なら
誰もいないし静かだし　バッチリだと思うぞ

dialogue_en: Swing by the ranch once you're done with whatever ya got goin' on.
dialogue_jp: よければ　あとでうちの牧場にも寄ってくれ

dialogue_en: Love to keep chattin', but this rust bucket ain't gonna fix itself.
dialogue_jp: いまは手が離せないんだ　すまんね

dialogue_en:
Just had to start actin' up on me.
Temperamental old goat!
dialogue_jp:
もう少しで牧場だっていうのに
このオンボロめ

dialogue_en: No sign of Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 神羅は　いねえな

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Looks like an old republic landing.
dialogue_jp: 共和国時代の船着き場だ

dialogue_en: Could borrow a boat─make our way across...
dialogue_jp: 昔は　船で湿地を渡ってたんだよな

dialogue_en:
then head on through the mines
and keep goin' till we hit Junon.
dialogue_jp:
で　ミスリルマインを抜ければ
ジュノンってわけだ

dialogue_en: Sure. Why not?
dialogue_jp: ああ　そのとおりだ

dialogue_en: You'd trust these rotting hulks?
dialogue_jp: だが　船は死んでいる

dialogue_en: I mean, we could...
dialogue_jp: 乗って　みる？

dialogue_en: Let's not.
dialogue_jp: 無理だな

dialogue_en: Then maybe...we swim it!
dialogue_jp: そんじゃあ　泳ぐか！

dialogue_en: "This swamp is home to the deadly Midgardsormr...
dialogue_jp: 『湿地には　ミドガルズオルムが潜んでいます』

dialogue_en: "Beware."
dialogue_jp: ……だって

dialogue_en: "But even if you're slow, you can rent a chocobo...
dialogue_jp: でも　チョコボのスピードなら大丈夫

dialogue_en: "who'll see you safely past, being nothing if not fast...
dialogue_jp: さあ　チョコボで湿地を越えましょう

dialogue_en: "So just give Bill the word, and he'll pick you out...
dialogue_jp: チョコボのご用命は　グリン牧場まで

dialogue_en: "a bird!"
dialogue_jp: だって！

dialogue_en: Well...?
dialogue_jp: どうする？

dialogue_en: Can we rent some birds?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ　乗る？

dialogue_en: Can we?
dialogue_jp: 乗る？

dialogue_en: Fine.
dialogue_jp: 行ってみよう

dialogue_en: Gotta get chocobos, man.
dialogue_jp: チョコボで行くんじゃねえのか

dialogue_en: Shouldn't swim this bog.
dialogue_jp: 徒歩で行くのは　危険だ

dialogue_en: Chocobos first, remember?
dialogue_jp: チョコボを手に入れないと

dialogue_en: What happened to getting chocobos?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ　乗らないの？

dialogue_en: Well, well! If it ain't my favorite group of hitchhikers!
dialogue_jp:
おやおや
こいつはみなさん　おそろいで

dialogue_en: Fancy meeting you here!
dialogue_jp: トラックのおじさん

dialogue_en: Thanks again for the ride to Kalm.
dialogue_jp: あの時は　お世話になりました

dialogue_en: Ah, don't mention it. It's the least I could do for two such lovely young ladies.
dialogue_jp:
な～に　お嬢さんたちなら
いつでも大歓迎さ

dialogue_en: But I do believe I neglected to introduce myself.
dialogue_jp: おっと　自己紹介がまだだったな

dialogue_en:
The name's Bill, and you can count on me
for a lift anytime.
dialogue_jp: わたしはグリン　以後お見知りおきを

dialogue_en:
Pleasure to see y'all again.
And welcome to my humble ranch.
dialogue_jp:
これはこれは　みなさん
ようこそ　グリン牧場へ

dialogue_en: Manage to get your truck fixed?
dialogue_jp: トラック　直った？

dialogue_en:
Indeed I did. You must've been my lucky charms.
She started up right after ya left.
dialogue_jp:
お嬢さんたちと会って元気になったのか
なんとか　動いてくれたよ

dialogue_en: Anywho, what can I do ya for? You in the market for some fine feathered friends, by any chance?
dialogue_jp:
今日は？
もしかして　チョコボが入り用かな

dialogue_en:
Are we ever.
Need 'em to get through the swamplands.
dialogue_jp: おうよ　湿地帯を越えたくてよ

dialogue_en: Then you have come to the right place!
dialogue_jp: さすが　お目が高い

dialogue_en:
Back in the day, we had republic ferries to
get us from A to B. But now they're nothin'
but driftwood, sadly.
dialogue_jp:
昔は国営の交通網があったが
ご存知のとおり　いまじゃまったくの役立たず

dialogue_en: We got the next best thing, though: chocobos.
dialogue_jp: そんな時代に便利なのが　チョコボ！

dialogue_en:
To them, a bottomless bog's
no worse'n a kiddie pool!
dialogue_jp: 特に湿地帯では　この上なく役に立つ

dialogue_en: Now, ladies...
dialogue_jp: お嬢さんがた

dialogue_en: You're prob'ly wonderin': what gives these birds the power to glide across swamps with ease?
dialogue_jp:
チョコボが　どうやって
底なし沼を渡るか知ってますかな？

dialogue_en: Uh...
dialogue_jp: さあ……？

dialogue_en: Uh...
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Would you believe that their fluffy feathers give 'em the buoyancy to float, while their limber legs can outrun a motorboat!
dialogue_jp:
なんと　羽毛でプカプカと浮かびながら
強靭な脚で　スイスイ～っと泳ぐんですな

dialogue_en: Not even the dreaded Midgardsormr─one of the fastest fiends around─can keep up with 'em!
dialogue_jp:
そして　あの恐ろしいミドガルズオルムも
チョコボには追いつけないときたもんだ

dialogue_en: But you don't need convincin'.
dialogue_jp: まあ　なにが言いたいかというと

dialogue_en: You just need pointin' to a hardworkin' chocobo!
dialogue_jp: 湿地帯を越えるなら　チョコボが最善！

dialogue_en: Nature's two-legged limousine!
dialogue_jp: それはもう　間違いなし

dialogue_en: So can we rent some?
dialogue_jp: ここで借りられるのか？

dialogue_en: Sure can!
dialogue_jp: もちろん

dialogue_en:
My grandson Billy's in the stable over yonder.
He'll help ya out.
dialogue_jp:
詳しいことは　あの小屋にいる
孫のグリングリンに聞いてくれ

dialogue_en: Hmm? There something I can help you with?
dialogue_jp: なにか　質問かな？

dialogue_en: "There something I can help you with?"
dialogue_jp: なにか　質問かな？

dialogue_en: I wanna know about Midgardsormr.
dialogue_jp: ミドガルズオルムについて

dialogue_en: A chocobo would be nice.
dialogue_jp: チョコボについて

dialogue_en: Nope. Nothing.
dialogue_jp: 質問はない

dialogue_en: Ah, that'd be the serpent that lives in the swamp. Longer than a river, quieter than a whisper, and quicker than a lightning bolt!
dialogue_jp:
ミドガルズオルムとは　湿地帯に棲む
身の丈１０メートルを超える怪物的ヘビのことだな

dialogue_en: Cause the water to so much as ripple, it'll come barrelin' after ya, gapin' maw and all. Whew...gives me chills just thinkin' 'bout it.
dialogue_jp:
湿地帯に入り込んだ人や動物の気配を察知しては
音もなく忍び寄り　バクッと襲いかかるわけだ

dialogue_en: Lucky for you, most chocobos can outrun the devil.
dialogue_jp:
そんなやつらも
チョコボのスピードには追いつけない

dialogue_en:
Though I'm sure you already knew that.
Any man of the road would've heard the tales.
dialogue_jp:
これ　経験豊かな旅人なら
だれでも知ってる豆知識

dialogue_en: And judgin' by that sword, ya been the subject of a few yourself.
dialogue_jp: おまえさんは　当然知ってるって顔だな

dialogue_en: 'Course ya have.
dialogue_jp: だろう？

dialogue_en: If there's one thing I know 'sides chocobos, it's how to spot a seasoned frontiersman.
dialogue_jp:
わたしは　チョコボと人を見る目には
自信があるんだ

dialogue_en: Midgardsormr's an ornery beast of a serpent. Made a home for itself in the wetlands southwest of here.
dialogue_jp:
ミドガルズオルムは湿地帯に生息する
ヘビのバケモノだよ

dialogue_en: Wanna make it across that swamp with all your limbs still attached? Then best get yourself a bird.
dialogue_jp:
彼らに襲われないためにも
チョコボが最善の選択ってわけだ

dialogue_en:
You might could talk to Billy over in the stables.
He'll be happy to tell ya all ya need to know.
dialogue_jp:
詳しいことは　チョコボ小屋にいる
グリングリンに聞いてくれ

dialogue_en: I hear you have to wrangle yourselves a wild chocobo! Best of luck to y'all.
dialogue_jp:
おお　逃げたチョコボを捕まえてくれるんだって？
頼んだよ

dialogue_en: Pro'ly oughta go'n check on the signs before my truck decides to die on me again.
dialogue_jp:
トラックの調子がいいうちに
看板の点検に行っとくかな

dialogue_en: Little birdie told me Shinra's military closed off Kalm. Y'all wouldn't happen to know anythin' about that, now wouldja?
dialogue_jp:
神羅軍が　カームを封鎖してるらしい
おまえさんたち　なにか知ってるか？

dialogue_en: Howdy!
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい！

dialogue_en:
Saw the sign.
Need some chocobos to cross the swamp.
dialogue_jp:
看板を見た
湿地帯用のチョコボを借りたい

dialogue_en: Um, sorry, pops, but you're outta luck.
dialogue_jp: あ～　おじさんたち　運が悪い

dialogue_en: "Pops"?
dialogue_jp: おじ……

dialogue_en: Got no more birds. Last one went this morning.
dialogue_jp: レンタル用のチョコボは　みんな貸し出し中なんだ

dialogue_en: Coulda fooled me, kid.
dialogue_jp: いっぱい　いるじゃねえか

dialogue_en: These're spoken for. That or they're not fit for riding.
dialogue_jp: いまいるのは療養中か　契約済みの子だよ

dialogue_en: But...
dialogue_jp: でも　まあ

dialogue_en:
I can see you're in a bind, so I'll bump you up
the list─for a price, of course.
dialogue_jp:
おじさんたちが　もっと高値で借りてくれる
って言うなら　譲ってもいいよ

dialogue_en: Which is?
dialogue_jp: いくらだよ

dialogue_en: Ten grand each.
dialogue_jp: １０万以上

dialogue_en: The thing is...
dialogue_jp: ごめんね

dialogue_en: we don't have that kind of money. Or any, really.
dialogue_jp: わたしたち　旅の途中で　そんなに払えないの

dialogue_en: Well, there is one other option...
dialogue_jp: それなら　いい情報があるんだ

dialogue_en: Only cost you a grand.
dialogue_jp: 情報料　１０００ギル

dialogue_en: ...Is what a scoundrel might say...
dialogue_jp: と　言いたいところだけど

dialogue_en: but I wouldn't dream of distressing y'all further.
dialogue_jp: 美人を困らせたくないから　タダでいいや

dialogue_en:
Just so happens one of our birds ran off
the other day─wild thing, but still a fine chocobo.
dialogue_jp:
実は　すこし前に牧場から逃げだして
そのまま野生化しちゃったチョコボがいるんだ

dialogue_en:
If you can manage to find and catch him,
then he's yours─free of charge.
dialogue_jp:
もし　そいつを捕まえてくれたら
お姉さんたちのものにしていいよ

dialogue_en: You sure?
dialogue_jp: ほんとに？

dialogue_en: Yeah, why not?
dialogue_jp: 名前は『ピコ』

dialogue_en:
Name's Piko...
The hardest-headed bird you'll ever meet─by far.
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと気難しいヤツで
放牧してたら　いつの間にか逃げちゃったんだ

dialogue_en: And he's the spittin' image of pops here.
dialogue_jp: おじさんに　雰囲気が似てるかも

dialogue_en: You can start by lookin' for his tracks.
dialogue_jp: まず　ピコの足あとを探して

dialogue_en:
Find those, and you're sure to
find the feet that made 'em.
dialogue_jp: 足あとがあれば　その近くにいるはずだよ

dialogue_en:
Now, wild chocobos can be a bit
skittish around people...
dialogue_jp: 野良になったチョコボは　すごく用心深いけど

dialogue_en: but if you play it cool and creep up real quiet-like, you'll wrangle him no problem!
dialogue_jp:
気づかれないように近づければ
お姉さんたちでも　捕まえられると思うな

dialogue_en: I think we can do that. Thanks.
dialogue_jp: うん　わかった　ありがとう

dialogue_en: And one last thing.
dialogue_jp: あと　これ重要

dialogue_en: This info comes free of charge─provided you promise to stop by our shop.
dialogue_jp:
情報をタダにしたんだ
必ず　うちの店で買い物をすること

dialogue_en:
Speak to Chloe back there.
She'll sell ya whatever ya need.
dialogue_jp: 妹のクリンが売ってるから　まずは見てってよ

dialogue_en: Kid's a born businessman.
dialogue_jp: 商売がうめえな

dialogue_en:
If y'all can catch our runaway
and get his butt back here...
dialogue_jp:
チョコボを捕まえたら
いちど　うちに連れてくるといいよ

dialogue_en: ridin' and rearin' lessons are on me.
dialogue_jp: 乗り方や育て方を　教えてあげる

dialogue_en: You check out the shop yet?
dialogue_jp: クリンのお店　見てってよ

dialogue_en: Even if you're flat broke, just humor me.
dialogue_jp: お金ないなら　見るだけでもいいからさ

dialogue_en: Need somethin'?
dialogue_jp: チョコボの質問？

dialogue_en: "Need somethin'?"
dialogue_jp: チョコボの質問？

dialogue_en: How can I find wild chocobos?
dialogue_jp: チョコボがいる場所について

dialogue_en: How do I catch a wild chocobo?
dialogue_jp: チョコボの捕まえ方について

dialogue_en: Tell me about riding gear.
dialogue_jp: チョコボの装具品について

dialogue_en: Nope.
dialogue_jp: 質問はない

dialogue_en: Start by looking for fresh tracks. Once you spot 'em, birds're rarely more than a stone's throw away.
dialogue_jp:
外に出たら　まずチョコボの足あとを探すんだ
そのあたりにいるよ　きっと

dialogue_en: Birds in the wild're much more skittish than kept ones.
dialogue_jp: 野生化したチョコボは　警戒心が強いからね

dialogue_en: Gonna have to be real quiet on the approach, else they'll bolt.
dialogue_jp:
気づかれないように
こっそり近づくのがコツだよ

dialogue_en: Good luck wranglin' Piko!
dialogue_jp: ピコのこと　よろしく頼むよ

dialogue_en: Gear serves all sortsa purposes, from the cosmetic to the practical. Can even improve a race bird's performance.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボに装具品をつけることで　格好よくしたり
チョコボレースの能力をパワーアップできるんだ

dialogue_en: Won't cost you a gil─golden plumes only.
dialogue_jp:
『黄金の羽根』と交換してるから
そっちもよろしくね

dialogue_en:
Sorry about my brother.
All he thinks about is money.
dialogue_jp: お兄ちゃんが　お金お金ってごめんなさい

dialogue_en: He's just doing his job. We understand.
dialogue_jp: お仕事だからね　気にしないで

dialogue_en: I suppose, but he's been a real pain about it ever since our parents...left.
dialogue_jp:
そうなんだけど　パパとママがいなくなってから
とってもお金にうるさくなって

dialogue_en: Say...are you guys from Midgar?
dialogue_jp: お姉さん　ミッドガルから来たの？

dialogue_en: Yeah. The undercity.
dialogue_jp: うん　スラムから

dialogue_en: Then, do you happen to know Chocobo Sam?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ・サムって　知ってる？

dialogue_en: Um... Not very well, but... Yeah, I guess we do.
dialogue_jp:
知ってるっていうか……
うん　知ってる

dialogue_en: Where is he?
dialogue_jp: どこにいるの？

dialogue_en: Probably the Sector 6 slums.
dialogue_jp: 六番街のスラムだろうな

dialogue_en: He's a big deal in Wall─
dialogue_jp: ウォール――

dialogue_en: Um...why do you ask?
dialogue_jp: サムに　会いたいの？

dialogue_en: I was thinking about reaching out.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　わかんない

dialogue_en: It's his fault Mom and Dad are gone, so...
dialogue_jp: その人　パパとママの“かたき”なの

dialogue_en: Chloe! That's none of these good folks' business.
dialogue_jp: クリン　その話はお客さんにはしないよ

dialogue_en: But they could help!
dialogue_jp: でも……

dialogue_en: Don't tell anyone what she told you.
dialogue_jp: いまの話は　よそでしないでよね

dialogue_en:
Sam's one of the biggest names in the business.
If he gets wind of that story, our ranch is done for.
dialogue_jp:
サムはチョコボ業界の大物だから
変な噂が立ったら　うちなんかすぐに潰されちゃう

dialogue_en: Don't worry─your secret's safe with us. I promise.
dialogue_jp: うん　わかった　だれにも言わない

dialogue_en:
Oh! Take these greens.
You can give them to Piko when you find him.
dialogue_jp:
ピコを捕まえたら
この野菜　あげてみてください

dialogue_en:
They were always his favorite treat, you see...
Maybe he'll come back once he's had a taste!
dialogue_jp:
ピコは　特に野菜が好きだったから
ここに戻ってきたくなると思うんです

dialogue_en: Right... Should prob'ly sell you stuff, huh?
dialogue_jp: それじゃ　お店も見ていってください

dialogue_en: Billy'll throw a fit if I don't at least try to get you to spend a few gil. No pressure, but if anything catches your eye...
dialogue_jp:
お兄ちゃんは　必ず買えなんて言ってたけど
いいものがあったらでいいんで　買ってください

dialogue_en:
Also, if you have any golden plumes on you,
I can exchange them for chocobo gear.
dialogue_jp:
あと　チョコボの装具品と
『黄金の羽根』の交換も受け付けてるんで

dialogue_en: So, be sure to hand 'em over if you do!
dialogue_jp: そちらも　よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: I hope Piko doesn't give you all too much trouble!
dialogue_jp: ピコのこと　よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: We're a one-stop shop for all your chocobo needs!
dialogue_jp: チョコボのことは　うちにおまかせください

dialogue_en: Welcome, folks!
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ

dialogue_en: Hi. How can I help you today?
dialogue_jp: 今日は　どれにします？

dialogue_en: Thank you for stopping by!
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございました

dialogue_en: We hope to serve you again!
dialogue_jp: また来てくださいね

dialogue_en: You're welcome back here anytime!
dialogue_jp: いつでも　遊びにきてくださいね

dialogue_en: If you ever wanna change your chocobo's gear, feel free to use the stable just over there.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボをお着替えさせるときは
そこの『チョコ房』を使ってください

dialogue_en: Alright, Beak-o! Where'd you run off to?
dialogue_jp: そんじゃあ　チョコボ探しといくか

dialogue_en: You mean "Piko"?
dialogue_jp: 名前は　ピコ！

dialogue_en: Let's try looking for some tracks.
dialogue_jp: まず　足あとだよね

dialogue_en: Bingo.
dialogue_jp: いたぞ

dialogue_en: Yeah! C'mon, y'all, let's go bag us a chocobo!
dialogue_jp:
よっしゃあ！
あとは　とっ捕まえるだけだな

dialogue_en:
Keep it down. When you're on the hunt,
you don't wanna startle your prey.
dialogue_jp: 静かに　狩りの基本は相手に気づかせないことだ

dialogue_en: "Prey"? You know we're not here to kill him, right?
dialogue_jp: 狩り？　友達になるんだよね

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ　クエ～！

dialogue_en: Aw, isn't he just the cutest?
dialogue_jp: かわいい～

dialogue_en: You know, they are kinda similar!
dialogue_jp: たしかに　似てるかも

dialogue_en: Totally!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: What does he want now?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　どうした？

dialogue_en: Do you think maybe he's still hungry?
dialogue_jp: まだ　おなか減ってるのかも

dialogue_en: Sorry... That's all the food we had.
dialogue_jp: ごめんね　もう持ってないの

dialogue_en: Kweh...
dialogue_jp: クエ……

dialogue_en: But you know where there's more? Bill's place!
dialogue_jp: 牧場に戻れば　たくさんあるよ

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ！

dialogue_en: Back to the ranch it is, then.
dialogue_jp: 牧場へ戻るようだな

dialogue_en: C'mon!
dialogue_jp: 追いかけよ

dialogue_en: Ah, there's our guy!
dialogue_jp: いたいた！

dialogue_en: Nothing beats a little taste of home, now does it?
dialogue_jp: 野菜で　おうちのこと　思い出した？

dialogue_en: Not so much as a feather outta place.
dialogue_jp: うん　ケガもしてないし大丈夫だね

dialogue_en: Got one healthy bird here.
dialogue_jp: むしろ　たくましくなってる

dialogue_en: 'Nough to ride?
dialogue_jp: 乗れそうか？

dialogue_en: Sure, though I wouldn't try till he's done eating.
dialogue_jp: いまは空腹で気が立ってるから　無理かな

dialogue_en: Once he's had his fill though, I'm sure he'll come round to the idea...if we ask him nice.
dialogue_jp:
でも　しっかり食べて
気持ちが落ちつけば　大丈夫だと思う

dialogue_en:
I'll need to prep his gear and all that,
so why don't you wait outside?
dialogue_jp:
乗れるように準備しておくから
それまで　外で待っててよ

dialogue_en: Piko doesn't much like eatin' when strangers are nearby.
dialogue_jp:
人がいると　ピコが落ちつかないから
外で待っててよ

dialogue_en: Mind waitin' outside for a bit?
dialogue_jp: もう少し　かかりそうかな

dialogue_en: I really can't thank you enough for bringing Piko back to us!
dialogue_jp: ピコを連れ戻してくれて　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん！

dialogue_en: Hey there.
dialogue_jp: おまえは……

dialogue_en: What a pleasant surprise!
dialogue_jp: ボクです　チャドリーです！

dialogue_en: You...do remember me...don't you?
dialogue_jp:
あれ……
もしかして　お忘れですか？

dialogue_en: "You...do remember me...don't you?"
dialogue_jp: もしかして　お忘れですか？

dialogue_en: Nope...
dialogue_jp: 覚えていない

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: もちろん覚えている

dialogue_en: Nope...
dialogue_jp: すまない

dialogue_en: Really? Not at all?
dialogue_jp: そう……ですか

dialogue_en:
It...seems I didn't make as strong
an impression as I thought.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさんにとって
ボクなんて　その程度の存在なのですね

dialogue_en: Silly me.
dialogue_jp: 残念です

dialogue_en: Well! Allow me to refresh your memory!
dialogue_jp: では　あらためて自己紹介させてください

dialogue_en: My name's Chadley.
dialogue_jp: ボクの名前は　チャドリー

dialogue_en: I was the one researching materia in Midgar.
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルで　マテリアの研究をしていた者です

dialogue_en: We first met in the Sector 7 undercity, where I asked you to provide me with battle intel.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさんとはスラムで出会い　研究に必要な
バトルレポートの提出をお願いしました

dialogue_en:
Though brief, we had multiple interactions
through which we got to know each other.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルでは　何度となくお話をし
とてもよくしてもらったのですが

dialogue_en: How was that? Ring any bells, perhaps?
dialogue_jp: どうでしょう　すこしは思い出されましたか？

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Great! What a relief!
dialogue_jp: よかった　うれしいです

dialogue_en: I knew you would!
dialogue_jp: よかった！

dialogue_en:
It was an absolute pleasure working with you
in Midgar. Thank you again!
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルでは　数々のバトルレポートの提出
ありがとうございました

dialogue_en:
Your invaluable intel allowed me to create
so much materia!
dialogue_jp:
おかげさまで　たくさんのマテリアを
生成することができました

dialogue_en:
Detecting internal monologue...
"The hell's this weirdo doing here?"
dialogue_jp:
どうしておまえがこんなところに？
という　困惑を検知

dialogue_en: I was created by Professor Hojo, you know.
dialogue_jp: ボクは　宝条によって造られたサイボーグですよ

dialogue_en: Though your thoughts could be read by any cyborg.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさんの感情を読み取ることぐらい
簡単です

dialogue_en: But, to answer your question, I took a page out of your book and skipped town.
dialogue_jp:
実は　ボクもクラウドさんたちを見習って
ミッドガルから飛び出し

dialogue_en: Now the whole world's my laboratory.
dialogue_jp: 世界中を見てまわることにしたんです

dialogue_en:
Speaking of which, I have a favor to ask─
if it's not too much trouble.
dialogue_jp:
そこで　折り入って
クラウドさんにお願いしたいことがあるのですが

dialogue_en: You need more battle intel.
dialogue_jp: 戦闘データの収集か

dialogue_en:
That's the Cloud I know.
Always eager to get on with it.
dialogue_jp: さすがクラウドさん　話が早いですね

dialogue_en: But yes...though I'd like you to activate some remnawave towers first.
dialogue_jp:
でも　その前に
『通信塔』を起動していただきたいんです

dialogue_en: They were originally constructed by the Republic of Junon, but were claimed by Shinra after the war...
dialogue_jp:
かつて　ジュノン共和国が世界中に建設した
通信塔を　神羅が接収したのですが

dialogue_en: since which time they've sat idle and untouched.
dialogue_jp: そのまま使われることなく　放置されてるんです

dialogue_en: Just waiting for someone to put them to good use.
dialogue_jp: だったら　ボクのものにしてもいいかなって

dialogue_en:
The more towers you activate around the world,
the more my processing power will grow...
dialogue_jp:
各地にある通信塔を起動していくごとに
ボクの演算処理能力が強化され

dialogue_en: as will the area I can survey.
dialogue_jp: 探索領域を広げることができます

dialogue_en: I might even be able to construct a communications network independent of Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
また　神羅に関与されない通信網を
構築することだって可能です

dialogue_en: How does that sound? You'd not only be helping me, but yourselves as well.
dialogue_jp:
いかがでしょう？
クラウドさんにとっても　有益かと思うのですが

dialogue_en: If we find any, we'll turn 'em on.
dialogue_jp: 見つけたら　起動しておこう

dialogue_en: Wonderful. I thought you might say something like that.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさんなら
そう言ってくれると信じていました

dialogue_en:
Let's get started, then.
See that tower? That's your first target.
dialogue_jp:
では　早速ですが
あそこにある通信塔の起動をお願いします

dialogue_en: And this will activate it.
dialogue_jp: これが　起動モジュールです

dialogue_en: As the tower is close by, allow me to accompany you.
dialogue_jp: それでは　今回はボクがご案内しますね

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud! It's this way!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　こっちですよ？

dialogue_en: Please, don't wander off.
dialogue_jp: しっかり　ついてきてください！

dialogue_en: Here we are.
dialogue_jp: こちらです

dialogue_en: Tower activation confirmed.
dialogue_jp: 通信塔の起動を確認！

dialogue_en: Initiating preliminary scan of the grasslands.
dialogue_jp: 早速　グラスランドエリアの探索を開始し

dialogue_en:
I'll ascertain the locations of fiends
and natural resources.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターの生息地
採取可能な素材などを割り出しています

dialogue_en:
Lemme guess. Y'all are fixin' to
finally cross the swamplands, right?
dialogue_jp:
おまえさんたち
これから　湿地帯へ行くんだろ？

dialogue_en: Yeah, that's the plan.
dialogue_jp: うん　そのつもり

dialogue_en:
While I was makin' a routine inspection
of my signage...
dialogue_jp: ついさっき　看板を点検しとったら

dialogue_en: group of fellas shambled on by, headin' toward the bog. Looked like a funeral procession, what with their black robes.
dialogue_jp:
黒いマントを着た連中が
ふらふら～っと　湿地帯へ入っていくのを見てな

dialogue_en: Black robes?
dialogue_jp: 黒マント？

dialogue_en: Yes indeed. Told 'em they'd need some chocobos for safe passage, but I ain't even sure they heard me.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボに乗らんと危ないぞ～と言ったんだが
行っちまいおった

dialogue_en:
I expect Midgardsormr will
make a meal out of those boys.
dialogue_jp:
あのままだと
ミドガルズオルムのエサになっちまう

dialogue_en:
But if you do catch up to 'em first,
try to convince 'em to swing by the ranch.
dialogue_jp:
もし見かけたら　うちに寄るよう
声をかけてくれんか

dialogue_en: Friend of mine from way back runs a chocobo ranch out near Junon. If you find the time, pay him a visit.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノン側に　古い友がやってる
チョコボ牧場があるから良ければ寄ってやってくれ

dialogue_en: The moment ya get on a chocobo, your world gets a hundred million times bigger.
dialogue_jp: チョコボにまたがれば　世界がグーンと広がるぞ！

dialogue_en: If we're crossing the swamp, we'll need to rely on chocobos.
dialogue_jp:
湿地を渡るなら
チョコボを呼んだほうがいい

dialogue_en: So...we sure this is safe?
dialogue_jp: 本当に渡れんだろうな？

dialogue_en: Heard pockets of the bog're damn near bottomless. Plus, there's that giant man-eatin' serpent.
dialogue_jp:
底なし沼もあるって話じゃねえか
それに　ヘビのバケモンも出るんだろ？

dialogue_en: Bill assured us the chocobos could handle it.
dialogue_jp: チョコボなら大丈夫って言ってたけど

dialogue_en: Have some faith in our feathered friends!
dialogue_jp: この子たち　信じよ

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ～！

dialogue_en: Over there!
dialogue_jp: あれを見ろ

dialogue_en: It's Sephiroth.
dialogue_jp: セフィロスだ

dialogue_en: What!?
dialogue_jp: ほんと？

dialogue_en: Come on.
dialogue_jp: 追うぞ

dialogue_en: I don't see Sephiroth...do you?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　いねえな

dialogue_en: No... I don't.
dialogue_jp: うん　そうだね……

dialogue_en: Is that dry land I see!?
dialogue_jp: ゴール　見えてきたね

dialogue_en: Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 急ごう

dialogue_en: Whoa, easy there!
dialogue_jp: なんだ　どうした！

dialogue_en: What the─!?
dialogue_jp: なにっ？

dialogue_en: Hey! Get back here right now!
dialogue_jp: おいおいおいおいおい！

dialogue_en: It disguised itself as an island.
dialogue_jp: 島に擬態していたようだな

dialogue_en: Gee, I hadn't noticed.
dialogue_jp: 解説ありがとよ

dialogue_en: Focus!
dialogue_jp: 来るぞ！

dialogue_en: Get back!
dialogue_jp: 離れろ！

dialogue_en: Is it gone?
dialogue_jp: 逃げた？

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: No...
dialogue_jp: そんな……

dialogue_en: Wakey wakey!
dialogue_jp: もしもーし

dialogue_en: You remember who I am?
dialogue_jp: わたし　わかる？

dialogue_en: Aerith...
dialogue_jp: エアリス……

dialogue_en: It's good to have you back, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: おかえり　クラウド

dialogue_en: Sephiroth?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスは？

dialogue_en: I knew he was strong, but still...
dialogue_jp: やっぱり　セフィロスは強いな

dialogue_en: Those guys're looking for him too. They've gotta be.
dialogue_jp:
あの連中も
セフィロスを追っているのかもしれない

dialogue_en: Yeah... I kinda get that feeling as well.
dialogue_jp: うん　そんな感じ　するね

dialogue_en: Let's not lose 'em.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちも行こう

dialogue_en: He's here, isn't he?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスがいるのか

dialogue_en: I don't know.
dialogue_jp: わからない

dialogue_en: Well, monsters sure are.
dialogue_jp: モンスター　いそうだね

dialogue_en: No doubt.
dialogue_jp: いかにも

dialogue_en: Monsters we can handle. We've dealt with worse.
dialogue_jp: ザコは適当にあしらう　深追いは禁物だ

dialogue_en: That's easy for you to say.
dialogue_jp: ザコなんて　いないよ

dialogue_en: You fought the worst for a living.
dialogue_jp: わたしには　ぜーんぶ強敵

dialogue_en: Not us though.
dialogue_jp: 私も

dialogue_en: Yeah, good point!
dialogue_jp: オレもだ

dialogue_en: You mind takin' the lead, merc?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　なんとかしてくれ

dialogue_en: For two thousand.
Enough for her Standard Course twice, right?
dialogue_jp: “極上”と“普通”の　あいだくらい？

dialogue_en: Her what now?
dialogue_jp: なんの話？

dialogue_en: Ask him.
dialogue_jp: もみ！

dialogue_en: Cloud...?
dialogue_jp: もみ？

dialogue_en: Forget it.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ

dialogue_en: You guys need to focus.
dialogue_jp: 各自　注意してくれ

dialogue_en: Wasn't all that long ago that this place was a working mythril mine. Y'all know about mythril, right?
dialogue_jp:
ここは元々　ミスリルを採ってたんだ
おまえら　ミスリルはわかるか？

dialogue_en: Hmm... Not anything specific, no.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　聞いたことはあるかな

dialogue_en: It's pretty tough.
dialogue_jp: とても硬い

dialogue_en: And beautiful besides.
dialogue_jp: そして　美しい

dialogue_en: Right on both counts. But what you might not realize is just how rare it is.
dialogue_jp:
ふたりとも正解だ
しかも　とんでもなく貴重だった

dialogue_en: Never been found outside of these caves, in fact.
dialogue_jp: ここ以外で採れたって話は　聞いたことがねえ

dialogue_en: And I oughta know. Worked in a mine myself back in the day. Hard not to learn about the life when you're livin' it.
dialogue_jp:
オレは昔　鉱山で働いてたからよ
この業界は　ちーっとばかり詳しいぜ

dialogue_en: Should we pick up a few souvenirs, then?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　ミスリル探す？

dialogue_en: Hmm... We could, but prob'ly not worth it.
dialogue_jp: あんまり　オススメじゃあねえな

dialogue_en: Shinra's been churnin' out stuff made with more durable alloys for years now.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の技術で　似たようなモノを
作れるようになったんだ

dialogue_en: Even got that signature mythril sheen and everything.
dialogue_jp: とてつもなく硬くて　キラキラしたモノをよ

dialogue_en: Probably refined with materia too.
dialogue_jp: マテリア精製の応用だろうな

dialogue_en: Look at you, Mister Shinra expert.
dialogue_jp: へえ～　そうなんだ

dialogue_en: It's them.
dialogue_jp: あっ　あの人たち！

dialogue_en: It seems we've caught up.
dialogue_jp: 奥へ向かっているようだ

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 追うぞ

dialogue_en: Barret
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Hope they're okay...
dialogue_jp: 無事だといいな

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: But if not...nothing we can do.
dialogue_jp: でも　深入りしないほうがいい

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: うん……

dialogue_en: I don't know... We shouldn't just leave 'em.
dialogue_jp: だよな　気になるよな

dialogue_en: Know what? I'll go check.
dialogue_jp: よし　オレが行く！

dialogue_en: Okay. I'll come too.
dialogue_jp: うん　私も行くね

dialogue_en:
Nah, you stay. I know what I'm doin' down here─
you don't.
dialogue_jp:
いや　こういう場所の歩き方には
ちょっとしたコツがいる

dialogue_en: Last thing we need is you gettin' hurt on us.
dialogue_jp: 素人は　悪いが足手まといだ

dialogue_en: I'll accompany him.
dialogue_jp: 私も行こう

dialogue_en: I'm no stranger to caves.
dialogue_jp: 多少　心得がある

dialogue_en: Okay, if you're sure... Sorry to─
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　お願い　ごめんね

dialogue_en: I mean...thank you.
dialogue_jp: ううん　ありがとう

dialogue_en: 'Course.
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: You keep track of the other robes now, y'hear?
dialogue_jp: ほかの黒マント　見失うなよ

dialogue_en: Careful down there!
dialogue_jp: 気をつけてね～！

dialogue_en: Wow... This place is huge!
dialogue_jp: うわ～　ひろ～い！

dialogue_en: What's that?
dialogue_jp: あの建物

dialogue_en: Hopefully our ticket outta here.
dialogue_jp: 出口まで　つながっているのかもな

dialogue_en: Let's see!
dialogue_jp: 行ってみよう

dialogue_en: I don't see any black robes. Did we lose 'em?
dialogue_jp: 黒マントの人たち　見失っちゃったね

dialogue_en: Still got time to catch up.
dialogue_jp: いつでも追いつける

dialogue_en: If any of them are still alive...
dialogue_jp: また　落ちたりしてなきゃいいけど

dialogue_en: So tell me about Reno. He holding up okay?
dialogue_jp: レノ先輩の様子　どうなんですか？

dialogue_en: He's been through worse.
dialogue_jp: 傷は　それほどでもない

dialogue_en: He's been instructed to take some time to himself. To relax. Recuperate.
dialogue_jp:
ここのところ働きづめだったからな
すこし　休んでいるだけだ

dialogue_en: Correct me if I'm wrong, but that sounds a lot like a nice long, all-expenses-paid vacation.
dialogue_jp:
それって
憧れのヴァケーションじゃないですか
“ヴァ”ケーション！

dialogue_en: Well, more or less.
dialogue_jp: まあ　そんなところだ

dialogue_en: Lucky...
dialogue_jp: うらやまし！

dialogue_en: Hardly. He's bored out of his mind.
dialogue_jp: いや　あいつは退屈してるさ

dialogue_en: Prob'ly misses it.
dialogue_jp: そうかもですね

dialogue_en: What's wrong?
dialogue_jp: どうしたんです？

dialogue_en: It's nothing. Just...keep talking.
dialogue_jp: なんでもない　もっとしゃべってろ

dialogue_en: Uh...
dialogue_jp: はい？

dialogue_en: Wait.
dialogue_jp: 待て

dialogue_en: Seriously, what are we even doing here?
dialogue_jp: それでアイツ　どうします？

dialogue_en: Sorry, but I gotta say it.
dialogue_jp: 先輩　あのですね

dialogue_en: This mission? It makes no sense.
dialogue_jp:
わたし　正直
納得してないんですけど

dialogue_en: Why are we wasting our time following these hooded weirdos around?
dialogue_jp:
あの黒マントを追跡して
なんか意味あるんですか？

dialogue_en: Orders are orders.
dialogue_jp: 上からの命令だ

dialogue_en: The whys and wherefores are not our concern.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちタークスにとっては　それがすべて

dialogue_en: Yeesh... Maybe you need a vacation.
dialogue_jp: うわ～　仕事ニンゲン登場～！

dialogue_en: So about him, Mr. Workaholic? Thoughts?
dialogue_jp: でもアイツ　もう助かりませんよ

dialogue_en: I say we put him down.
dialogue_jp: 楽にしてやりましょう

dialogue_en: I mean, that's what Tseng would do if he was here.
dialogue_jp: ツォン主任なら　きっとそうします

dialogue_en: Assholes.
dialogue_jp: ひどい……

dialogue_en: Who's there!?
dialogue_jp: 誰だ！

dialogue_en: Sharp ears.
dialogue_jp: いい耳だ

dialogue_en: Dammit.
dialogue_jp: ごめん

dialogue_en: No freakin' way!
dialogue_jp: あっ　あ～っ！

dialogue_en: Avalanche...
dialogue_jp: アバランチ

dialogue_en:
Feast your eyes on the Turks' latest
and greatest─Elena!
dialogue_jp: わたしはタークス期待の新人　イリーナ

dialogue_en: But you three can call me your worst nightmare!
dialogue_jp: 社会の敵ども　成敗してくれる！

dialogue_en: Where's Reno?
dialogue_jp: レノは？

dialogue_en: On vacation.
dialogue_jp: “ヴァ”ケーションだ

dialogue_en: And unfortunately for you, I'm here to fill in!
dialogue_jp: レノ先輩の留守は　わたしが守る！

dialogue_en: She may be new, but she's still a Turk.
dialogue_jp: 新人と言えども　タークスだ

dialogue_en: And a consummate professional.
dialogue_jp: なめるなよ　と

dialogue_en: Rude!
dialogue_jp: 先輩！

dialogue_en: Just like we practiced.
dialogue_jp: 訓練どおりにやるぞ

dialogue_en: Gotcha!
dialogue_jp: はい！

dialogue_en: Hands in the air! Right now!
dialogue_jp: 手をあげろ　両手！

dialogue_en: Better keep that toy where I can see it...
dialogue_jp: その物騒なもんは　そのままだ

dialogue_en: 'less you want a hole in your head.
dialogue_jp: おかしなマネすんじゃねえぞ

dialogue_en: Now then...
dialogue_jp: さーてと

dialogue_en:
Y'all got a lot to answer for.
Lotta blood on your hands...
dialogue_jp: 仲間と七番街の仇　どうしてくれようか

dialogue_en: You need someone to blame.
dialogue_jp: 恨むのは　お門違いだな

dialogue_en: I suggest you look in the mirror.
dialogue_jp: おまえたちが始めた戦争だ

dialogue_en: For us, however, things have changed.
dialogue_jp: うちも色々あって　状況が変わった

dialogue_en: While you're still wanted fugitives, if you stay out of our way, we'll stay out of yours.
dialogue_jp:
おまえたちは賞金首だが
今後　我々の邪魔をしなければ見逃してやる

dialogue_en: Oh yeah? Bullshit!
dialogue_jp: 上から　えらそうに！

dialogue_en: Take care of Aerith for me.
dialogue_jp: エアリスを　よろしくな

dialogue_en: Elena!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ！

dialogue_en: Nice one, Red!
dialogue_jp: ナーイス！

dialogue_en: Just gonna float there?
dialogue_jp: 泳げるか？

dialogue_en: Hey, where're the others?
dialogue_jp: クラウドたちは？

dialogue_en: You okay!?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫？

dialogue_en:
We're good!
Just takin' a quick dip to get the grime off!
dialogue_jp: おう　スッキリ気分爽快だぜ！

dialogue_en: Do you see a way back up!?
dialogue_jp: あがって　これそう？

dialogue_en: We'll find one!
dialogue_jp: まかせとけ！

dialogue_en: Okay!
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: We'll meet you at the exit!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　出口で合流しよう

dialogue_en: Hojo's lab was filled with men like this.
dialogue_jp: こんな連中を　大勢見たことがある

dialogue_en: Mako poisoned...
dialogue_jp: 宝条のところだ

dialogue_en: Every last one of them.
dialogue_jp: 重度の魔晄中毒らしい

dialogue_en: Poor bastards...
dialogue_jp: 神羅め……

dialogue_en: What do you think their deal is? Where they goin'?
dialogue_jp: しっかし　そろってなにしてるんだ？

dialogue_en:
They're following Sephiroth...
or so Cloud seems to think.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスを追っている可能性がある
クラウドは　そう考えている

dialogue_en: He did say that...
dialogue_jp: クラウドが……

dialogue_en: Let's hope the boy can keep it together.
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫か　あいつ

dialogue_en: Alright...now how we gettin' outta here?
dialogue_jp: さ～て　どうやって上に行く？

dialogue_en: That might be an option.
dialogue_jp: あのツタが使えそうだ

dialogue_en: Well now, look who it is.
dialogue_jp: あいつら　あんなとこでなにやってんだ

dialogue_en: Hey, guys! Over here!
dialogue_jp: バレット　お～い！

dialogue_en: Y'all taking a breather or what?
dialogue_jp: どうした　休憩か？

dialogue_en: The bridge is out!
dialogue_jp: 向こうに渡れないの

dialogue_en: Do you think you can give us a hand?
dialogue_jp: そっちで　足場を作れないか？

dialogue_en: For two grand! Two!
Hilarious.
dialogue_jp: 好きにしろ

dialogue_en: There must be some way we can dislodge that container.
dialogue_jp: あそこに　なにか落とせないだろうか

dialogue_en: We're in business!
dialogue_jp: やった！

dialogue_en: Thanks!
dialogue_jp: ありがとう

dialogue_en: 'Preciate it!
dialogue_jp: 助かった

dialogue_en:
Two grand!
And don't you forget.
dialogue_jp: 報酬　忘れんなよ

dialogue_en: I don't think we can open it from here.
dialogue_jp: こちらからは　開けられないようだ

dialogue_en: See a button or a lever?
dialogue_jp: そっちで開けられねえか？

dialogue_en: One sec!
dialogue_jp: やってみる

dialogue_en: Thanks! We owe ya!
dialogue_jp: 助かったぜ！

dialogue_en: Yep─two grand!
That's...fair.
dialogue_jp: おっ　おう……

dialogue_en: The hell?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: Ah, shit. Think we woke it up.
dialogue_jp: こいつも　自然の力ってヤツか？

dialogue_en: Angered it, more like.
dialogue_jp: 起こしてしまったようだ

dialogue_en: Then it's time to rock cranky-boy here back to sleep!
dialogue_jp: 寝かしつけるのは　父ちゃんにまかせな

dialogue_en: That's a mighty fine staircase. Thank you kindly.
dialogue_jp: ミスリルの階段とは　豪勢じゃねえか

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: What took you?
dialogue_jp: 遅かったな

dialogue_en:
Stumbled on a killer rock formation
and couldn't tear ourselves away.
dialogue_jp:
でっけえミスリル見つけて
目がくらんじまってよ

dialogue_en: Right?
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en:
The ground here could give way at any moment.
We shouldn't linger.
dialogue_jp:
ここも　いつ崩れるかわからない
急いで出たほうがいい

dialogue_en: True, but don't forget─Shinra knows we're here now.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　でも
神羅に居場所を知られている

dialogue_en: Might be more of 'em outside.
dialogue_jp: 待ち伏せされているかもしれない

dialogue_en: That doesn't make any difference to me.
dialogue_jp: オレが連中でも　そうするぜ

dialogue_en: I ain't stoppin'─not for them or anyone.
dialogue_jp: でもよ　それでも行かなくちゃならねえ

dialogue_en: Not after Midgar. Not after what we saw.
dialogue_jp: オレたちは　アレを見ちまったからな

dialogue_en:
We all know what's at stake here─
the fate of the world.
dialogue_jp: オレたちの使命は　星を守ること

dialogue_en: So if they get in our way, that's on them.
dialogue_jp: 神羅が邪魔するなら　戦うしかねえ

dialogue_en: Right.
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en:
Let's get back to tailing the guys in robes.
They're our best chance of finding Sephiroth.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの連中を追いかけよう
おそらく　セフィロスと繋がっている

dialogue_en: Cloud! The protorelic should be somewhere in your vicinity.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん　エンシェントマターは
その近くにあるはずです

dialogue_en: It may not be in plain sight, but I trust you'll be able to find it.
dialogue_jp:
それらしいものがないか
入念な調査をお願いします

dialogue_en: Hahhh!
dialogue_jp: ふんが～！

dialogue_en: Hyahaha! Yep, this here's something that'll appreciate.
dialogue_jp:
うひひひひ！
こりゃ　ネウチモンにちがいねえ

dialogue_en: Hahaha! Hell yeah! I 'preciate it!
dialogue_jp: うへへへへ　ネウチネウチ！

dialogue_en: Wait, what are we appreciating?
dialogue_jp: うん　ネウチってなんだ？

dialogue_en: When somethin' appreciates, it, uh...
dialogue_jp:
バカ！
ネウチってのは……あれだ

dialogue_en: It means it's worth a shitload of gil! Right?
dialogue_jp: お宝ってこった　なあ！

dialogue_en: Right! Which means we can finally go legit.
dialogue_jp: おうよ　これで足が洗えるぞ

dialogue_en: Gentlemen! Today we're founding "Beck's Business"!
dialogue_jp:
もう　盗賊団じゃねえ
『ベグカンパニー』だ！

dialogue_en: Quit slackin' off and see if there's any other treasures around here!
dialogue_jp:
おめえら
ほかにもお宝がねえか探すぞ

dialogue_en: You got it, Boss! I'm real good at appreciatin' things!
dialogue_jp:
ネウチモン　ネウチモン
ネウチモン！

dialogue_en: Yoo-hoo, oh appreciatin' treasure!
dialogue_jp: おっ宝～　おっ宝～！

dialogue_en: Heh! Hah! Ohoohoo!
dialogue_jp: ふご～　ふご～　ふご～　ふご～！

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: あん？

dialogue_en: Oh shit!
dialogue_jp: って　あぎゃ！

dialogue_en: Oh shit!
dialogue_jp: うひゃ！

dialogue_en: Oh shit!
dialogue_jp: ひぎゃ！

dialogue_en: Doh shur!
dialogue_jp: ふがっ！

dialogue_en: Th-the hell you people doin' here!?
dialogue_jp: てっ　てめえら　なんでここに！

dialogue_en: "The hell you people doin' here?"
dialogue_jp: てめえら　なんでここに？

dialogue_en: Who're you?
dialogue_jp: 誰だ？

dialogue_en: What're you doing here?
dialogue_jp: ここでなにをしている

dialogue_en: What did you find?
dialogue_jp: なにを見つけた？

dialogue_en: Hand it over. Now.
dialogue_jp: 見つけたものを渡せ

dialogue_en: Oh, hell no! Don't you dare act like you've forgotten Beck's Badasses.
dialogue_jp:
おい　オレたちベグ盗賊団を
忘れたとは言わせねえぜ

dialogue_en: Yeah, you waltzed into our home and beat us to shit! We hadn't even done nothin'!
dialogue_jp:
スラムで　のんびり暮らしていただけなのに
何度も襲いやがって

dialogue_en: Ya big jerks!
dialogue_jp: そうだ　そうだ！

dialogue_en: You're responsible for the destruction of our charitable organization!
dialogue_jp:
おめえらのせいで
ゼンリョウな盗賊団はカイメツだ！

dialogue_en: Oh, are we?
dialogue_jp: そう　だっけ？

dialogue_en: News to me.
dialogue_jp: なんの話だ

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh... Midgar isn't big enough for us. We're takin' our operations worldwide!
dialogue_jp:
フッフッフッフ　オレたちにスラムは狭すぎた
こっからは　世界テンカイよお！

dialogue_en: We've gone legit─we're a business now!
dialogue_jp: 足を洗って『カンパニー』だ～！

dialogue_en: They're a special kind of stupid.
dialogue_jp: なに言ってんだ　こいつら

dialogue_en: If Shinra can take over the world with mako, then all we gotta do is find our own treasures, and then we'll be on top!
dialogue_jp:
魔晄を見つけた神羅みたいに
オレらもお宝で　でっかくなるってワケよ！

dialogue_en: Hee hee... Yeah, we're gonna appreciate all the things!
dialogue_jp:
いっししし
ネウチモンで　カンパニーだ～！

dialogue_en: Haha! Wouldn't you like to know!
dialogue_jp: ハッハー　とんでもねえネウチモンよ！

dialogue_en: I mean, I would too─and it looks like crap─but...!
dialogue_jp:
見た目はボロいし
どういうブツかもわかんねえが

dialogue_en: It's definitely pulsin' with a ridiculous amount of power!
dialogue_jp:
とにかく　すげえエネルギーを
ビンビン感じるぜ！

dialogue_en: Once we flip it, we'll be swimmin' in lakes of gil!
dialogue_jp: これを売れば　オレたちは大金持ちだ！

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud. Isn't that...
dialogue_jp: それって　もしかして

dialogue_en: Hold on, now you're after our treasure!?
dialogue_jp: てめえらも　お宝目当てか？

dialogue_en: Well, sucks to be you! We found it!
dialogue_jp: オレたちが　先に見つけたんだぞ？

dialogue_en: Yeah, we're the only ones who can appreciate it!
dialogue_jp: ネウチモンは　オレたちのもんだ！

dialogue_en: Mhm! Mhm!
dialogue_jp: ふんだ　ふんだ！

dialogue_en: Hand it over. Now.
dialogue_jp: おとなしく渡すんだな

dialogue_en: Hah! You really think that's enough to intimidate the likes of...
dialogue_jp: けっ　そんな脅しに屈するオレたちじゃ――

dialogue_en: No, please! It's all yours! Just don't hurt us again!
dialogue_jp:
ダメだ　もうおしまいだあ！
うううう　おしまいだ……

dialogue_en: Play dead! Play dead!!! I'm so dead...
dialogue_jp: 死んだふり　死んだふりー！

dialogue_en: Would you all quit freakin' out!?
dialogue_jp: おめえら　落ちつけ！

dialogue_en: Now listen here, numb nuts. I got a foolproof plan.
dialogue_jp:
いいか　よく聞け
とっておきの作戦がある

dialogue_en: I call it...use a decoy!
dialogue_jp: その名も　『オトリ作戦』だ！

dialogue_en: Oh! A decoy!
dialogue_jp: おお　オトリか！

dialogue_en: So...who's the decoy?
dialogue_jp: オトリって　なんだ？

dialogue_en: All of you, that's who!
dialogue_jp: おめえらのことだ！

dialogue_en: Oh, okay, we'll be decoys! Wait...
dialogue_jp:
ああ　そうか
オレたちがオトリか……うん？

dialogue_en: Gentlemen, it has been an honor!
dialogue_jp: うむ　あとはまかせた！

dialogue_en: If ya survive, meet back at the hideout!
dialogue_jp: 生きてたら　カクレガに集合だ～！

dialogue_en: Dammit! Decoys, attack!
dialogue_jp: チキショウ　やってやる～！

dialogue_en: Ungh...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: Ah-hurk...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: So dead...
dialogue_jp: 死んでる　死んでる……

dialogue_en: Ung... Dead... I'm super...duper...dead...
dialogue_jp:
ううう……
オレ　死んでる……

dialogue_en: Ugh...
dialogue_jp: うう……！

dialogue_en: Hng! Zzz... Zzz...
dialogue_jp: ふご……！

dialogue_en: Now's our chance! Let's catch up with Beck!
dialogue_jp: いまだ　アニキと合流するぞ！

dialogue_en: Hey! Wait for me!
dialogue_jp: まっ　待って～！

dialogue_en: Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん

dialogue_en: My readings indicate the protorelic is on the move. Would you mind updating me on the situation?
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターの移動を観測しましたが……
状況の報告をお願いします

dialogue_en: Bandits beat us to it.
dialogue_jp: 盗賊に奪われた

dialogue_en: Oh? I see.
dialogue_jp: なるほど　了解です

dialogue_en: Fortunately, I've already ascertained the protorelic's destination. Would you mind heading there?
dialogue_jp:
エンシェントマターの移動先はすでに特定済みです
引き続き　調査をお願いします

dialogue_en: Cloud, I've picked up readings from the protorelic.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん
エンシェントマターを感知しました

dialogue_en: I believe the bandits are close by. And busy preparing a meal, if I am not mistaken.
dialogue_jp:
盗賊さんたちが近くにいるはずなのですが
どうやら　お料理中のようですね

dialogue_en: They may flee if openly confronted. I suggest using those shipping containers to cover your approach.
dialogue_jp:
正面から行くと　また逃げられるかもしれません
コンテナに隠れながら近づきましょう

dialogue_en: How could you ditch us like that, Boss!?
dialogue_jp: 置いてくなんてヒドイぞ　アニキ！

dialogue_en: Don't be an idiot! I had to for the treasure─obviously!
dialogue_jp:
バカやろう！
お宝のためだ　仕方ねえだろ

dialogue_en: I was inconsolable.
dialogue_jp: オレだって　ダンチョーの思いだ

dialogue_en: Income-soulable...? What's that?
dialogue_jp:
ダンチョー？
ダンチョーってなんだ？

dialogue_en: Oh, it's like when you're, uh...consolable...but not!
dialogue_jp:
うん？　う～ん……
盗賊団のボスって意味だ

dialogue_en: Oh, I get it!
dialogue_jp: なるほど～！

dialogue_en: Hahh... You think that merc's gonna come after us?
dialogue_jp:
はあ……
なんでも屋　追ってくるかな？

dialogue_en: Okay. We'll hide out here till that merc gives up.
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋があきらめるまで
ここで待機だ

dialogue_en: Hey, Boss. Can we eat yet? I'm hungry.
dialogue_jp:
腹減った……
もう食っていいか？

dialogue_en: It ain't ready yet, dingus!
dialogue_jp: ガマンしろ！

dialogue_en: We call it "well-done" 'cause shit's gotta get done well─not poorly!
dialogue_jp:
ウメエダンつってな
こげるぐらいがウメエのよ

dialogue_en: Yeah, but I think ya got it done too well.
dialogue_jp:
いや～　でも
ちょっとこげすぎじゃねえか？

dialogue_en: Hey! Are you a chef? You got a puffy hat!?
dialogue_jp: うるせえ　シロウトは黙って見てろ！

dialogue_en: Awww...
dialogue_jp: ぐう～……

dialogue_en: God, I'm hungry...
dialogue_jp: 腹　減った……

dialogue_en: We want meat! We want meat!
dialogue_jp: に～く　に～く！

dialogue_en: Aw, smells like heaven...
dialogue_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

dialogue_en: Hope there's plenty to go around.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

dialogue_en: I like my meat rare.
dialogue_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

dialogue_en: I'm starvin' over here!
dialogue_jp: 腹　減った……

dialogue_en: Gimme meat! Gimme meat!
dialogue_jp: に～く　に～く！

dialogue_en: ...Damn, that smells good.
dialogue_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

dialogue_en: Better be enough for us too.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

dialogue_en: My cut better be real bloody!
dialogue_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

dialogue_en: I'm runnin' on empty.
dialogue_jp: 腹　減った……

dialogue_en: Show. Me. The meat!
dialogue_jp: に～く　に～く！

dialogue_en: ...Smells like it's comin' along.
dialogue_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

dialogue_en: Wonder how much the guys got...
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

dialogue_en: The less cooked, the better.
dialogue_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

dialogue_en: I could eat a behemoth.
dialogue_jp: 腹　減った……

dialogue_en: Time to eat! Time to eat!
dialogue_jp: に～く　に～く！

dialogue_en: ...Get a load of that smell!
dialogue_jp: すぅ～……いいニオイだぜ

dialogue_en: They're gonna share, right?
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの分もあんのかな？

dialogue_en: I'm a "lightly seared" guy, myself.
dialogue_jp: 俺はレア派なんだよな～

dialogue_en: Huh? Whassat?
dialogue_jp: あん　なんだ？

dialogue_en: Uh... You hear somethin'!?
dialogue_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

dialogue_en: Hahaha!
dialogue_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

dialogue_en: Uh...who's there!?
dialogue_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

dialogue_en: C-come on out!
dialogue_jp: コソコソすんな！

dialogue_en: What the hell was that?
dialogue_jp: あん　なんだ？

dialogue_en: Are my eyes playin' tricks on me?
dialogue_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

dialogue_en: Hahaha!
dialogue_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh... Somebody there!?
dialogue_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

dialogue_en: You don't scare me!
dialogue_jp: コソコソすんな！

dialogue_en: Hey, what was that?
dialogue_jp: あん　なんだ？

dialogue_en: I think I saw somethin' move.
dialogue_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

dialogue_en: Haha, hahaha!
dialogue_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

dialogue_en: Shit, we got company?
dialogue_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

dialogue_en: I know you're there!
dialogue_jp: コソコソすんな！

dialogue_en: Huh? What was that?
dialogue_jp: あん　なんだ？

dialogue_en: I swear I saw somethin' move.
dialogue_jp: んん　なんか動いたか？

dialogue_en: Haaa, hahaha!
dialogue_jp: ヒャッハー　イヒヒヒ！

dialogue_en: Ack... Someone out there?
dialogue_jp: やばっ　誰かいんのか？

dialogue_en: Come out already!
dialogue_jp: コソコソすんな！

dialogue_en: ...Must be hearing things.
dialogue_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

dialogue_en: Huh... Aw, never mind.
dialogue_jp: おっと　勘違いか

dialogue_en: Huh? They run off or somethin'?
dialogue_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

dialogue_en: ...Don't scare me like that!
dialogue_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

dialogue_en: Maybe it was just a rat.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

dialogue_en: Guess it was just my imagination.
dialogue_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

dialogue_en: Nothin', huh? Oh, well.
dialogue_jp: おっと　勘違いか

dialogue_en: Huh... Bet I scared 'em off.
dialogue_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

dialogue_en: Ugh! Got me jumpin' at shadows...
dialogue_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

dialogue_en: Probably just a critter.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

dialogue_en: Guess it was all in my head.
dialogue_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

dialogue_en: Whoops... False alarm.
dialogue_jp: おっと　勘違いか

dialogue_en: Huh... Musta given up and run.
dialogue_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

dialogue_en: ...What am I doin'?
dialogue_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

dialogue_en: Prolly just a mouse.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

dialogue_en: Ugh... I need a vacation.
dialogue_jp: ふう～　気のせいか

dialogue_en: ...Guess it was nothin'.
dialogue_jp: おっと　勘違いか

dialogue_en: ...Maybe they made a break for it?
dialogue_jp: んん？　逃げちまったか

dialogue_en: ...Practically gave me a heart attack.
dialogue_jp: はあ　ビビらせんなよ

dialogue_en: Ugh! Stinkin' vermin...
dialogue_jp: う～ん　ネズミか～？

dialogue_en: Hey! What're you doing!?
dialogue_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

dialogue_en: Attaaack!
dialogue_jp: てて……敵襲～！

dialogue_en: It's him! The merc's coming for us!
dialogue_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

dialogue_en: They're tryin' to get our meat!
dialogue_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！
