dialogue_en: You're not s'posed to be here!
dialogue_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

dialogue_en: What're you doin' here?
dialogue_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

dialogue_en: They're gonna take our treasure!
dialogue_jp: てて……敵襲～！

dialogue_en: The merc─he found us!
dialogue_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

dialogue_en: Guard the treasure!
dialogue_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！

dialogue_en: You think you can sneak up on us? Think again!
dialogue_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

dialogue_en: Hey! Stop right there!
dialogue_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

dialogue_en: S-someone's here!
dialogue_jp: てて……敵襲～！

dialogue_en: I-it's the merc!
dialogue_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

dialogue_en: We're bein' intruded!
dialogue_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！

dialogue_en: Hurry 'n' protect the meat!
dialogue_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

dialogue_en: Hold it! What're you up to?
dialogue_jp: テメエ　なにしてやがる！

dialogue_en: I found some wannabe burglars!
dialogue_jp: てて……敵襲～！

dialogue_en: Shit! The merc's comin' for our meat!
dialogue_jp: なっ　なんでも屋だ～！

dialogue_en: No one's gonna steal from us!
dialogue_jp: 敵がきたぞ～！

dialogue_en: Hey! We got an intruder over here!
dialogue_jp: あやしいヤツ　発見！

dialogue_en: Shit! It's them!
dialogue_jp: あっ　おまえら！

dialogue_en: Run for it!
dialogue_jp: にっ　逃げろ～！

dialogue_en: But! The meat!
dialogue_jp: にっ　肉は？

dialogue_en: Ah! Not again!
dialogue_jp: また来やがった！

dialogue_en: Cheese it!
dialogue_jp: ずらかれ！

dialogue_en: We've been blown! Book it!
dialogue_jp: 見つかった　逃げるぞ！

dialogue_en: Aww...
dialogue_jp: ぐう～！

dialogue_en: Looks like they caught wind of you, huh?
dialogue_jp: 逃げられてしまいましたね

dialogue_en: Their hunger will get the best of them though.
dialogue_jp: 食べ物惜しさに　戻ってくるかもしれません

dialogue_en: You can either lie in wait for their return or temporarily vacate the area.
dialogue_jp:
しばらく隠れて待つか
いったん　この場を離れて様子を見ましょう

dialogue_en: They're more perceptive than I gave them credit for.
dialogue_jp: なかなか鋭い盗賊さんたちですね

dialogue_en: But I doubt they're gone for good.
dialogue_jp: そのうち　戻ってくるはずです

dialogue_en:
You have two options: hide nearby and wait,
or come back later.
dialogue_jp:
しばらく隠れて待つか
いったん　この場を離れて様子を見ましょう

dialogue_en: I can confirm that the bandits have returned.
dialogue_jp:
盗賊さんたちが
戻ってきているようです

dialogue_en: Might I recommend proceeding with a bit more caution this time?
dialogue_jp:
今度こそ見つからないよう
慎重に近づきましょう

dialogue_en: Phew. Looks like the coast is clear.
dialogue_jp: あいつら　どっか行ったみたいだな

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh... And they didn't steal our meat!
dialogue_jp: えへへ　肉はとられてないぜ

dialogue_en: Huh, that's kinda weird! D'you think they weren't hungry?
dialogue_jp:
よかった～　あいつら
腹へってなかったのかな？

dialogue_en: They're just birdbrains, that's all.
dialogue_jp: バカなやつらめ

dialogue_en: Anyway, gotta leave this baby on the fire a little longer to get it nice 'n' crispy.
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　それじゃあ
またじっくり火を通していくぞ

dialogue_en: Hamnah hamnah!
dialogue_jp: ふんが　ふんが！

dialogue_en: When can we eat?
dialogue_jp: 肉　まだか？

dialogue_en: Not yet!
dialogue_jp: まだだ

dialogue_en: How 'bout now?
dialogue_jp: もう　いいか？

dialogue_en: It's gotta be crispier!
dialogue_jp: もうすこし待て

dialogue_en: Is it ready yet!?
dialogue_jp: もう　食っていいか？

dialogue_en: I'll tell you when it's ready!
dialogue_jp: まだだつってんだろ！

dialogue_en: If that's not well-done, I dunno what is!
dialogue_jp: よっしゃあ　焼きあがったぞ！

dialogue_en: Presenting the finest food you'll ever eat: Beck's Blackened Bird!
dialogue_jp:
ベグ特製　鳥の丸焼きの完成だ！
うまそうだろ

dialogue_en: Turned out pretty good, if I do say so myself!
dialogue_jp:
じゅるる……うへへ
我ながらうまく焼けたぜ！

dialogue_en: Yeah, yeah, time to eat, time to eat some meat! Yeah! ...Hey! You're supposed to yell with me!
dialogue_jp:
へいへい食事　食事だ食事……
おまえら　もうちょっと合わせろ！

dialogue_en: Okay, boys! Time to chow down!
dialogue_jp: よし　おまえら　食事にするぞ～！

dialogue_en: Hnf...hnf...hnf...
dialogue_jp: すんすんすんすん……

dialogue_en: Oh, it smells so good!
dialogue_jp: いいニオイだな～！

dialogue_en: That's 'cause I used fancy seasonings. Only the best for you guys!
dialogue_jp:
ベグ特製スパイスを
ふんだんに使ったからな

dialogue_en: First, you gotta savor the aroma─breathe it in!
dialogue_jp:
まずは　かおりを楽しむのが
ツウってやつよ

dialogue_en: Yeah, that's some fine breathin'.
dialogue_jp: どうだ　うん？

dialogue_en: Oh, I know how to breathe!
dialogue_jp:
おお　ふんふんふんふん！
すーはーすーはーすーはー……

dialogue_en: Okay, 'nough talk. Let's dig in!
dialogue_jp: そんじゃあ　いただくとしようか

dialogue_en: I'll take a leg, seeing as I'm the one who─agh, hot!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　オレはモモ肉を……って熱っ！

dialogue_en: Oh shit, Boss! You okay?
dialogue_jp: アニキ　だいじょぶか？

dialogue_en: Whew. Guess we need to cool it down some first. Okay boys─blow on it as hard as ya can!
dialogue_jp:
こりゃ　冷まさねえとダメだな
よしおまえら　息を吹きかけろ！

dialogue_en: Oh! Yeah, we can help cool it off! On three. One, two...
dialogue_jp:
おお　よしよし行くぞ行くぞ！
え～っと　せ～の……

dialogue_en: Fwoo...fwoo...fwoo...!
dialogue_jp: ふ～　ふ～　ふ～　ふ～！

dialogue_en: Fwoo...fwoo...fwoo...!
dialogue_jp: ブッチョ

dialogue_en: Pffft...pffft...pffft...pffft!
dialogue_jp: ボンザ

dialogue_en: Yeah, that's it. No, you gotta blow harder! Harder, harder!
dialogue_jp:
よし　もっと強く
もっともっと！

dialogue_en: Ah! They found us! We're so dead!
dialogue_jp:
だあ　見つかった～！
もうダメだ～……

dialogue_en: Get a grip, wouldja!?
dialogue_jp: 慌てんじゃねえ！

dialogue_en: So. You want this thing that bad, huh?
dialogue_jp: てめえら　このお宝がそんなに欲しいのか？

dialogue_en: "You want the treasure that bad, huh?"
dialogue_jp: そんなにお宝が欲しいのか？

dialogue_en: Yes.
dialogue_jp: 欲しい

dialogue_en: Not really.
dialogue_jp: べつに

dialogue_en: Shut up and hand it over.
dialogue_jp: 黙って渡せ

dialogue_en: Heh heh... Way you came after us, I figured. Which means I was right all along─this thing's worth a fortune!
dialogue_jp:
ほほう　そんなに欲しいのか
やっぱりこいつは　ネウチモンみてえだな

dialogue_en: So we ain't just gonna give it up, dumbass!
dialogue_jp: 誰がやるもんか　バーカ！

dialogue_en: Then why the hell are you chasing us!?
dialogue_jp: じゃあなんで追っかけてくんだよ！

dialogue_en: Work.
dialogue_jp: 仕事だ

dialogue_en: Really? You know you could just tell us who you're workin' for! Cut out the middleman and deal with 'em direct!
dialogue_jp:
だったら　依頼したヤツを教えろ
オレたちが売りつけるからよ

dialogue_en: Ain't in the talkin' mood, huh? Well, we sure as hell ain't gonna just "hand it over"!
dialogue_jp:
話す気ゼロかよ
そんなやつに渡してたまるかってんだ！

dialogue_en: I don't have time for this.
dialogue_jp: 遊んでいる暇はない

dialogue_en: Uh, what now, Boss?
dialogue_jp: どどどどど　どうする？

dialogue_en: Relax, boys. I've got just the plan.
dialogue_jp: 安心しろ　とっておきの作戦がある

dialogue_en: I call it..."baitin' the hook"!
dialogue_jp: その名も『イケニエ作戦』だ！

dialogue_en: Yeah! Hookin' the bait!
dialogue_jp: おお　イケニエ　イケニエ！

dialogue_en: C'mere.
dialogue_jp: ベグ

dialogue_en: So, uh, what's the bait?
dialogue_jp: うん？　イケニエってなんだ

dialogue_en: For all intensive purposes...it's you!
dialogue_jp: イケニエは……おまえだー！

dialogue_en: Me!?
dialogue_jp: オレかー！

dialogue_en: Here. Take this.
dialogue_jp: ほら　コレやるよ

dialogue_en: Thanks! Can I eat it?
dialogue_jp: わあ～　食べていいか？

dialogue_en: Chuck it 'fore they getcha!
dialogue_jp: 食われるまえに　投げろ！

dialogue_en: No! Don't eat me!
dialogue_jp: オレ　食われたくない！

dialogue_en: Hah!
dialogue_jp: ブッチョ

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: うああああ～！

dialogue_en: Agh! My meat...!
dialogue_jp: うう　丸焼き～……

dialogue_en: That was so worth it!
dialogue_jp: ごちそうさまでした～！

dialogue_en: So, um...Cloud?
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　あの……

dialogue_en: The protorelic does not appear to be at your location...
dialogue_jp:
再び　エンシェントマターが
移動したようですが

dialogue_en: Whatever─you can track it, can't you?
dialogue_jp: エネルギー反応は　追跡できるんだろ？

dialogue_en: I most certainly can. Not only that, I've deduced where the bandits are headed next.
dialogue_jp:
はい　もちろんです
盗賊団の逃亡先も　すでに特定しています

dialogue_en: And on that note, I'll let you get back to it.
dialogue_jp: では　引き続き調査をお願いします

dialogue_en: Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん

dialogue_en: As you've been away from the grasslands for some time, let me refresh your memory.
dialogue_jp:
しばらくグラスランドから離れていたようなので
状況を説明します

dialogue_en: You were pursuing a group of bandits in possession of a protorelic.
dialogue_jp:
現在　盗賊団が
エンシェントマターを持って逃亡中です

dialogue_en: For now, they've taken up shelter inside that building.
dialogue_jp: いまは　あの建物に潜伏しているようです

dialogue_en: If you could retrieve the relic from them, I would be most appreciative.
dialogue_jp:
それでは　引き続き
調査　回収をお願いしますね

dialogue_en: Uh, you think Butch is gonna be okay?
dialogue_jp:
はあ　ブッチョのやつ
大丈夫かな？

dialogue_en: Yeah, yeah, he's fine. We'll see him at the hideout.
dialogue_jp: 生きてりゃ　アジトで合流できるだろ

dialogue_en: If you say so... Uh, Boss, is this treasure really gonna help us go clean? No more crimin'?
dialogue_jp:
はあ　アニキ
このお宝さえあれば足洗えるよな？

dialogue_en: Of course it is! Say goodbye to the badasses and hello to the businessmen!
dialogue_jp:
おうよ　盗賊はハイギョー
これからはカンパニーよ

dialogue_en: Eheheh!
dialogue_jp: ふんふん！

dialogue_en: We can't let anyone get their grubby hands on our treasure.
dialogue_jp: このお宝は　誰にも渡さねえぞ

dialogue_en: Ahaha! We'll be the best business that ever businessed!
dialogue_jp:
あはは　カンパニー
楽しみだな～

dialogue_en: Orh hehhh!
dialogue_jp: ふんふん！

dialogue_en: Hey, what'd you do with the hideout key?
dialogue_jp: おい　アジトの合鍵はどうした？

dialogue_en: Buried it underground so nobody could find it!
dialogue_jp:
あはは　ちゃんと見つからないように
そのへんに埋めといたぜ？

dialogue_en: You idiot! What if some good-for-nothing thugs break in and we get locked out!?
dialogue_jp:
バカやろう　いますぐ掘り出すぞ！
ドロボーにでも入られたらマズイ

dialogue_en: Where'd you come from!?
dialogue_jp: てめえら　いつの間に……

dialogue_en: Save everyone the trouble and hand it over.
dialogue_jp: そろそろ　あきらめたらどうだ

dialogue_en:
Not the trouble─anything but that!
Just do what he says, Boss!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　アニキ
ももももうダメだ～！

dialogue_en: Cool it. I've still got a trick up my sleeve─a trick I like to call "diversionary tactics"!
dialogue_jp:
安心しろ　とっておきの作戦がある
その名も『カクラン作戦』だ！

dialogue_en: Heh... I bet you couldn't guess who's got it even if ya tried!
dialogue_jp:
へへ　どうだ
誰が持ってるかわかんねえだろ！

dialogue_en: Burke
dialogue_jp: バド

dialogue_en: Burt
dialogue_jp: ボンザ

dialogue_en: Beck
dialogue_jp: ベグ

dialogue_en: Me? Uh, I... Y'see...
dialogue_jp: ええ～？　うう……いや　あば～！

dialogue_en: Hmm... Behhh!
dialogue_jp: ブブーッ！

dialogue_en: Haha! Wrong! What'd I tell ya?
dialogue_jp: ハハ～　残念ハズレだ～！

dialogue_en: The correct answer is...
dialogue_jp: さて　正解は～？

dialogue_en: Aduhba-duhba-duhb...!
dialogue_jp: ドルルルルル～……

dialogue_en: Ta-da!
dialogue_jp: ジャン！

dialogue_en: Me, me, me!
dialogue_jp: オレだー！

dialogue_en:
Look at these chumps.
Our tactics got 'em totally diversioned.
dialogue_jp: おい見ろ　すっかりカクランされてるぞ！

dialogue_en: So, uh, whadda we do now, Boss?
dialogue_jp: でも　これからどうすんだよ

dialogue_en: Isn't it obvious?
dialogue_jp: そりゃ決まってんだろ

dialogue_en: We make a run for it!
dialogue_jp: 逃げるんだよ！

dialogue_en: Wait a sec, Boss─what about the key?
dialogue_jp: ええっ　アニキ　アジトの合鍵は？

dialogue_en: The key ain't goin' nowhere. Just leave it!
dialogue_jp: そこに埋まってんだろ　ほっとけ！

dialogue_en: I suppose we all have our "off days."
dialogue_jp: ずいぶんと　手こずられているようですね

dialogue_en: I want them to get away.
dialogue_jp: 泳がせているだけだ

dialogue_en: That's the plan. Once they lead us to their hideout...then we hit 'em.
dialogue_jp:
アジトまで誘導させて叩く
最初から　そのつもりだった

dialogue_en: I'm sorry to have ever doubted you.
dialogue_jp: なるほど　さすがです

dialogue_en: Before you resume your hunt, however, I'll need you to unearth the key they buried.
dialogue_jp:
追跡を再開する前に
盗賊さんが埋めた鍵を探してみてください

dialogue_en: It shouldn't be too tough if you have a chocobo.
dialogue_jp: チョコボの嗅覚なら　発見できるはずです

dialogue_en: I think you might want to call a chocobo, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　チョコボを呼んでみてください

dialogue_en: To begin your search, have your chocobo sniff something with the bandits' scent.
dialogue_jp:
まず　盗賊さんのニオイが残っているものを
探してみてください

dialogue_en: As they buried the key, it's likely they used those shovels over there to do it.
dialogue_jp:
合鍵は埋められたようです
スコップを調べてみてはどうでしょう

dialogue_en: Cloud, just a friendly reminder. Those bandits buried a key you need nearby.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん　盗賊さんがこの辺りに
アジトの合鍵を埋めてしまいました

dialogue_en: You can use a chocobo to find it.
dialogue_jp: チョコボで探してみてください

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ！

dialogue_en: Looks like you found the key. Great!
dialogue_jp: 合鍵を発見されたみたいですね

dialogue_en: And in other news, the bandits have stopped running.
dialogue_jp: 逃げた盗賊団はアジトへ帰ったようです

dialogue_en: Let's hope that the fourth time will be the proverbial charm.
dialogue_jp:
今度こそ　エンシェントマターの回収を
お願いします！

dialogue_en: That's the building.
dialogue_jp: あの建物です

dialogue_en: At one point, it was used for the storage of Shinra property.
dialogue_jp: 元々は神羅が管轄していた倉庫だったようです

dialogue_en: But the bandits have since turned it into a hideout─and probably filled it with traps.
dialogue_jp:
どんな罠が仕掛けられているかわかりません
くれぐれも気をつけてください

dialogue_en: Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん

dialogue_en: This is your first time back in a while, so I'd like to remind you where things stand.
dialogue_jp:
しばらくグラスランドから離れていたようなので
状況を説明します

dialogue_en: You're in pursuit of some bandits who got their hands on a protorelic.
dialogue_jp:
現在　盗賊団が
エンシェントマターを持って逃亡中です

dialogue_en: Right now, they're holed up in that abandoned warehouse.
dialogue_jp: いまは　あの建物に潜伏しているようです

dialogue_en: There's no telling what kind of security measures they have in place, so be on your guard.
dialogue_jp:
どんな罠が仕掛けられているかわかりません
くれぐれも気をつけてください

dialogue_en: Hey, Boss. I don't get it. Why are we playing dead in the hideout?
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　なんでオレたち
アジトで死んだふりしてんだ？

dialogue_en: Oh...
dialogue_jp: ああ～

dialogue_en: Obviously so we can pull one over on the merc, dumbass!
dialogue_jp:
バカ　なんでも屋をだますために
決まってんだろ

dialogue_en: Pull one over while dead?
dialogue_jp: 死んだふりで　だませるのか？

dialogue_en: Try usin' that brain of yours.
dialogue_jp: ちったあアタマ使え

dialogue_en: You can't make a dead guy any deader, right? He'd be wastin' his time attackin' us─so he won't!
dialogue_jp:
死んでるヤツは　もうコロせないだろ？
だから　襲っても無駄ってワケだ

dialogue_en: 'Cause we're dead!
dialogue_jp: なるほど～！

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh...
dialogue_jp: へへへ……

dialogue_en: Exactly. That's why the possum posse trick is foolproof!
dialogue_jp:
これぞ　オレたちのオイエゲイ
『シンダフリ作戦』よ

dialogue_en: So...how long we gotta stay dead?
dialogue_jp:
うう……いつまで
死んだふりしてればいいんだ？

dialogue_en: Till the coast is clear. Now suck it up.
dialogue_jp: がんばれ　もうすこしのシンボウだ

dialogue_en: Yeah. It's not like we're gonna die for real.
dialogue_jp: このまま　本当に死んだりしないよね？

dialogue_en: It's all good.
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫だ

dialogue_en: Am I dead?
dialogue_jp: 死ぬかもな

dialogue_en: Zzz... Zzz...
dialogue_jp: ぐう……ぐう……

dialogue_en: Zzz... Ngah... Zzz...
dialogue_jp:
ぐう……ふがっ！
ぐう……ぐう……

dialogue_en: Ugh...
dialogue_jp: うう……

dialogue_en: Gah!
dialogue_jp: うあ……

dialogue_en: Argh!
dialogue_jp: ああ～……

dialogue_en: Ugh...
dialogue_jp: うう……

dialogue_en: Erg...
dialogue_jp: うう……

dialogue_en: Whar!
dialogue_jp: ふが……！

dialogue_en: The hell ya think you're doin'!?
dialogue_jp: おい　てめえら！

dialogue_en: Disfiguring defenseless corpses─you should be ashamed!
dialogue_jp:
死人をもてあそびやがって
血もナミダもねえのか

dialogue_en: "Corpses," huh?
dialogue_jp: 生きてんじゃねえか！

dialogue_en: Now listen. What I'm tryin' to say here is, we don't gotta resort to violence. We can talk things out like gentlemen.
dialogue_jp:
なあ　オレたちの仲じゃねえか
ここはシンシ同士　話し合いで解決しようぜ

dialogue_en: "We can talk things out like gentlemen."
dialogue_jp: 話し合いで解決しようぜ？

dialogue_en: Sure.
dialogue_jp: 話を聞く

dialogue_en: How much for the relic?
dialogue_jp: いくらだ？

dialogue_en: Got nothing to say to you.
dialogue_jp: 話すことはない

dialogue_en: Okay, so we may be thieves...
dialogue_jp: オレたちは　たしかに盗賊だ

dialogue_en:
But we didn't steal nothin' this time, I swear!
We found it!
dialogue_jp:
でもよ　これは盗んだんじゃねえ
見つけたもんだ

dialogue_en: And possession is nine-tenths of the law, ain't it?
dialogue_jp: ショユーケンはオレたちにある　だろ？

dialogue_en: Hmm, that's a good point.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　言われてみれば

dialogue_en:
How 'bout this? If you want it that badly,
we'll sell it to ya. Whaddya say?
dialogue_jp:
だからよ　どうしても欲しいんなら
売ってやるよ　どうだ？

dialogue_en: Ten grand sounds fair to me.
dialogue_jp: １万ギルで　どうだ？

dialogue_en: You wish.
dialogue_jp: ふざけるな

dialogue_en: Okay...nine.
Keep dreaming.
dialogue_jp: 話にならない

dialogue_en: Fine, seven Gs!
No.
dialogue_jp: ダメだ

dialogue_en: This dispute's goin' to arbitrary!
dialogue_jp: コーショーケツレツだ！

dialogue_en: I'm tryin' to be nice, and ya walk all over me!
dialogue_jp: こっちがシタテに出てりゃ　つけあがりやがって

dialogue_en:
You know what I think!?
You people are the real thieves!
dialogue_jp: てめえらのほうが　よっぽど悪党じゃねえか！

dialogue_en: Buncha scumbags!
dialogue_jp: ゴクアクニン！

dialogue_en: Real full bags!
dialogue_jp: ヒトデナシ！

dialogue_en: Hrmph-hmph!
dialogue_jp: ふんふん！

dialogue_en: Don't say I didn't try to keep it peaceful!
dialogue_jp: 後悔しても知らねえからな

dialogue_en: You guys messed with the wrong legitimate businessmen!
dialogue_jp: これがベグカンパニーの最終兵器だ！

dialogue_en: C'mon, ya gotta let us off the hook!
dialogue_jp: もう　カンベンしてくれ！

dialogue_en: Off the hook! Off the hook!
dialogue_jp: カンベン　カンベン

dialogue_en: Off the...off...hook...the...off?
dialogue_jp: ベンベン　ベンカン　ベベンべベン？

dialogue_en: All we wanted was to sell the treasure for some cash so we could stop stealin' and start fresh!
dialogue_jp:
オレたちはただ　お宝を売った金で
足を洗いたかっただけだ

dialogue_en: It's always been our dream to start a company and do honest work!
dialogue_jp:
カンパニーを作って
まっとうなショーバイをしたかったんだよう

dialogue_en: Hey, we could throw 'em a bone.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　ちゃんと交渉しない？

dialogue_en: Two thousand gil.
dialogue_jp: ２０００で　どうだ

dialogue_en: Woo! Done! You guys got yourself a deal!
dialogue_jp: おお　交渉セーリツだあ！

dialogue_en: Pay them 2,000 gil?
dialogue_jp: ２０００ギル払いますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: 払う

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: やっぱりやめる

dialogue_en: Huh? You're comin' up a little short there, pal.
dialogue_jp: うん？　手持ちが足りねえぞ

dialogue_en: Hmph... And here I thought you wanted this thing!
dialogue_jp: ふん　後悔しても知らねえからな！

dialogue_en: Was wonderin' how long you were gonna drag this out! Got that two thousand yet?
dialogue_jp:
おう　待ってたぜ
２０００だったよな？

dialogue_en: We're washin' our hands of the crimes? But how?
dialogue_jp:
２０００ギルで足を洗うのか？
どうやって洗うんだ

dialogue_en: "How?" Shit, that's easy. You take the cash and you rub it between your fingers.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　そりゃあれだ
カネで足をこするのさ

dialogue_en: Oh, I feel cleaner already!
dialogue_jp: おお　そうか！

dialogue_en: You think that's clean? There are folks out there so filthy-stinkin' rich that they bathe in money!
dialogue_jp:
おまえら知ってるか　大金持ちはよ
カネの風呂に入ってるんだぞ

dialogue_en: That's awesome! Maybe we should get a bathtub?
dialogue_jp:
すっげえ！
でもそれ　気持ちいいのか？

dialogue_en: Hmm...
dialogue_jp: う～ん……

dialogue_en: We still waitin' for the money?
dialogue_jp: ２０００ギル　まだかな？

dialogue_en: Easy now. Patience is key for runnin' an upright business.
dialogue_jp:
あせんじゃねえ
ショーバイは待つことも大切だ

dialogue_en: This is so great. We're gonna lead honest lives!
dialogue_jp:
オレたち　これからは
まっとうに生きような？

dialogue_en: Mm-hmm!
dialogue_jp: ふんふん！

dialogue_en: Honest!
dialogue_jp: まっとう！

dialogue_en: So honest!
dialogue_jp: うんうん

dialogue_en: Haha! Pleasure doin' business!
dialogue_jp: へへ　まいどあり～

dialogue_en: See that, boys!? That's how you broker an honest deal!
dialogue_jp: どうだおまえら　これがショーバイだ！

dialogue_en: And hey─no more bandit stuff.
dialogue_jp: 盗賊　やめるんだよね

dialogue_en: You better believe it! From now on, we're earning our money the honest way. As a business─Beck's Business, baby!
dialogue_jp:
おうよ　もう盗みはやらねえ
なんたってオレたちは『ベグカンパニー』だからな

dialogue_en: Beck's got a business! What kinda business? Honest business!
dialogue_jp: カンパニー　カンパニー！

dialogue_en: Right─let's talk corporate structure! I'm president and you're my employees! Got it?
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　今日からオレはシャチョー！
おまえたちはシャインだ

dialogue_en: Oh, I'm ployees! Burke's ployees! Wait.
dialogue_jp:
おっ　シャインか！
シャイン　シャイン……

dialogue_en: What's a ployee do anyway?
dialogue_jp: シャインって　なんだ？

dialogue_en: "What's a ployee do anyway?"
dialogue_jp: シャインってなんだ？

dialogue_en: Be a buddy.
dialogue_jp: 仲間だ

dialogue_en: Act as family.
dialogue_jp: 家族だ

dialogue_en: Work as a servant.
dialogue_jp: 奴隷だ

dialogue_en: We're buddies!? That's cool! Me and the buddies are gonna make our business real big!
dialogue_jp:
おお　仲間か～！
みんなでカンパニーをでっかくしような

dialogue_en: Oh, family! Heh! I always wanted one of those.
dialogue_jp:
そうか　家族か～！
へへへ……なんか　あったかいなあ

dialogue_en: Servants? So like...
dialogue_jp: ドレイ？　ドレイ……

dialogue_en: Don't be a dumbass, dumbass!
dialogue_jp: バカ　んなワケねえだろ！

dialogue_en: And you! Quit screwin' with his head!
dialogue_jp: てめえも　よけいなこと言うんじゃねえ！

dialogue_en: Alright, boys!
dialogue_jp: よ～し　おまえら！

dialogue_en: We got work to do! There's glittering riches out there, and your president's gonna lead you to it! Let's business!
dialogue_jp:
さっそく働くぞ　シャチョーについてこい
新しいお宝探しだ　イエーイ！

dialogue_en: Yessir, Mr. Prez!
dialogue_jp: リョーカイです　シャチョー！

dialogue_en: To the prez!
dialogue_jp: シャチョー！

dialogue_en: So, you think they've turned over a new leaf?
dialogue_jp: 更生　したのかな？

dialogue_en: Who knows.
dialogue_jp: さあな

dialogue_en: This stuff here ain't feed for the animals. It's their beddin'.
dialogue_jp:
こいつは　エサじゃなくて
あいつらの寝床なんだ

dialogue_en: When it ain't been dried enough, they get all bent outta shape─start peckin' at my head like it's a damn hay barrel!
dialogue_jp:
ちゃんと乾かしてないと機嫌悪くてな
おいらの頭　かじってくるんだ

dialogue_en: It's important to make sure they've got plenty to eat. Need to be nice and plump so they fetch a high price!
dialogue_jp:
エサは常に補充しておかないとね
まるまる太らせると　高く売れるからさ

dialogue_en: Was with my bird since he was hatched. And now he's gone.
dialogue_jp:
生まれた時からいっしょだった
相棒のチョコボが　死んじまったんだ

dialogue_en: I know I gotta "get it together" and move on...
dialogue_jp: いい加減　前に進まないといけないのに

dialogue_en: ...But knowin' it and doin' it are...
dialogue_jp: なかなか　踏ん切りがつかないのさ

dialogue_en: Well, I'll be. Not every day we get visitors.
dialogue_jp: ほう　こんなところにお客人かな？

dialogue_en: Every now and then some interesting junk floats in from Midgar or Junon.
dialogue_jp:
たまーに　ミッドガルやジュノンから
面白いガラクタが流れ着くんだ

dialogue_en: We used to go fishing here, you know. Oh, the memories...
dialogue_jp:
昔はここでも
魚が捕れたもんだけどねえ

dialogue_en: Apparently this port used to be bustling back in the republic days.
dialogue_jp:
この港はもともと
ジュノン共和国が使っていたそうよ

dialogue_en: Hey, perfect timing. Piko's all prepped.
dialogue_jp: おまたせ～　ピコの準備できたよ

dialogue_en: But first─here.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　これ

dialogue_en:
You just give that whistle a toot and
your chocobo'll come a-runnin'.
dialogue_jp:
この笛を吹けば
いつでもチョコボを呼び出せるから

dialogue_en: So, who here's never been on chocoback?
dialogue_jp: チョコボに乗るの　はじめての人もいるよね？

dialogue_en: I haven't!
dialogue_jp: はいは～い！

dialogue_en: Why don't we take a few laps to get you comfortable, then? Come with me.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　うちの練習場を使っていいよ
案内するね

dialogue_en: This way!
dialogue_jp: こっちだよ

dialogue_en: Where you goin'?
dialogue_jp: どこ行くの？

dialogue_en: Here's where we get our birds in shape for the races.
dialogue_jp: ここで　レースに出るチョコボを調整してるんだ

dialogue_en: What races?
dialogue_jp: レースって？

dialogue_en:
The Gold Saucer's, I mean.
They're a big deal in our community.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーで開催されている
チョコボレースのことだよ

dialogue_en:
Won't find a ranch around here
that doesn't compete.
dialogue_jp: 世界中のチョコボファームが参加するんだ

dialogue_en: So you guys race too?
dialogue_jp: グリン牧場も出るの？

dialogue_en: We've been sittin' it out since Mom and Dad left.
dialogue_jp:
父さんと母さんがいなくなってからは
一度も……

dialogue_en:
But we're gonna get back in the fight soon...
and kick the tar outta one particularly nasty weasel.
dialogue_jp:
でも　近いうちに出るつもりだよ
どうしても　勝ちたい相手がいるんだ

dialogue_en: But never you mind all that. You just focus on the basics─like makin' sure you don't get thrown from the saddle.
dialogue_jp:
お兄さんたちはレースに出るわけじゃないから
とりあえず　チョコボに振り落とされないようにね

dialogue_en:
Why don't you try hoppin' on Piko
and givin' me a holler?
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　チョコボに乗ったら声をかけて

dialogue_en: Remember now! Just give your whistle a blow to ride your chocobo!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボは　笛を吹くと来てくれるよ
乗ったら声をかけてよ

dialogue_en: C'mon, call Piko already, will ya?
dialogue_jp: チョコボに乗らないと　練習できないよ？

dialogue_en: Okay! But how's about we stretch his legs a bit?
dialogue_jp:
いい感じだね！
じゃあ　かるく走ってみようか

dialogue_en: Participate in Hustle de Chocobo?
dialogue_jp: 『ダッシュ・デ・チョコボ』に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: I'll be here when you're ready.
dialogue_jp: 準備ができたら　声をかけてよ

dialogue_en: Y'all ready to run?
dialogue_jp: 走る準備はできた？

dialogue_en:
That was somethin' else.
You and Piko are a perfect match.
dialogue_jp:
すごいね！
ピコとの相性もいいみたいだし

dialogue_en: Might even have what it takes to win a race or two at the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp:
もしかしたら　お兄さんとピコなら
レースでも勝てるかも！

dialogue_en: Not terrible... But hey─now that you got the basics, it's just a matter of practice.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　はじめは誰でもそんなもんさ
慣れればもっと　うまく乗れるようになるよ

dialogue_en: We can't thank you enough, Billy.
dialogue_jp: いろいろ　ありがとね

dialogue_en:
Oh, that reminds me.
Y'all mentioned you're flat broke, right?
dialogue_jp:
そういえば　お姉さんたち
お金ないんだよね？

dialogue_en: Then you might wanna swing by Kalm again.
dialogue_jp: カームなら　仕事があると思うよ

dialogue_en: Now that the troopers've cleared out, it's prob'ly safe for you to ask around for work.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の軍隊もいなくなって
落ちついたみたいだから　行ってみれば？

dialogue_en:
Though don't run off just yet.
My sister's lookin' for help.
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　ついでに
クリンの依頼を受けてやってくれない？

dialogue_en:
Not sure what the trouble is.
Didn't wanna confide in me for whatever reason.
dialogue_jp:
なんだか　困ってるみたいなんだけど
ぼくには話してくれないんだ

dialogue_en: Honestly, she hasn't been herself since Mom left. They did dang near everything together.
dialogue_jp:
クリン　ずっと元気がなくって
妹は　母さんが大好きだったから

dialogue_en: You wanna lend Chloe a hand?
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋　してく？

dialogue_en: We need to move on.
dialogue_jp: いや　急ぎたい

dialogue_en: True, but moving on costs money...
dialogue_jp: 旅　お金かかるよね

dialogue_en:
We had fun helping people in Sector 5, right?
Same deal!
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋　手伝うの楽しいし　ね？

dialogue_en: You lookin' to practice?
dialogue_jp: チョコボの練習していく？

dialogue_en: Track's yours if ya need it.
dialogue_jp: 練習場ならあいてるよ

dialogue_en: What's up?
dialogue_jp: 走ってく？

dialogue_en: Keep ridin' like that and you'll clean up at the races.
dialogue_jp: このタイムならレースでも通用すると思うよ

dialogue_en: You're a bona fide jockey alright!
dialogue_jp: 完璧にチョコボを乗りこなしてるね

dialogue_en: Got nothing left to teach you anymore.
dialogue_jp: もうアドバイスすることはないよ

dialogue_en: 'Nother lap wouldn't kill you...
dialogue_jp: もっと練習したほうがいいね

dialogue_en: Gotta be in sync with your bird to do well.
dialogue_jp: チョコボのことを考えて走らないと

dialogue_en: They'd boo you right outta the Saucer for that performance.
dialogue_jp: これがレースだったら　大恥かいてたよ

dialogue_en: Oh, hey! You're back!
dialogue_jp: あっ　クラウドさん

dialogue_en: I heard you might need some help.
dialogue_jp: なにか　困っているらしいな

dialogue_en: You did? Oh, I see. Billy talked to you, didn't he?
dialogue_jp:
えっ？　ああ
お兄ちゃんから聞いたんですね

dialogue_en: I've been meaning to go pick flowers, but the plains are way too dangerous for that.
dialogue_jp:
お花をつみに行きたいんですけど
モンスターのせいで行けないんです

dialogue_en:
I'm sorry to hear that.
As a flower lover myself, I sympathize.
dialogue_jp: そうか～　お花はガマンできないよね

dialogue_en: Well, the thing is, I wanna make a flower crown.
dialogue_jp: お花を集めて　これを作りたいんです

dialogue_en: Mom used to make 'em for us all the time.
dialogue_jp: お母さんが　よく作ってくれたんです

dialogue_en: So I wanted to give it a try, but...with all the monsters, I didn't know how I could.
dialogue_jp:
わたしも作りたいのに　モンスターが増えちゃって
お花のとこまで行けなくて

dialogue_en:
Here's an idea: maybe we could
do the picking for you?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　わたしたち　つんでもいい？

dialogue_en: Sure!
dialogue_jp: もちろん

dialogue_en: Cloud? Thoughts?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　どうかな？

dialogue_en: What will you say?
dialogue_jp: 依頼を引き受けますか？

dialogue_en: What happened to your parents?
dialogue_jp: 両親はどうしたんだ？

dialogue_en: How do you know Sam?
dialogue_jp: サムとの関係は？

dialogue_en: Ask your brother.
dialogue_jp: グリングリンに頼め

dialogue_en: We'll take the job.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en:
Truth is, our parents died in an accident
when I was really little.
dialogue_jp:
わたしが　もっと小さかった頃に
死んでしまいました

dialogue_en: Billy doesn't like to talk about it.
dialogue_jp: 事件に巻き込まれたんです

dialogue_en: Sorry.
dialogue_jp: そう……

dialogue_en: We used to go on these family picnics.
dialogue_jp: よく家族でピクニックをしたんです

dialogue_en: And after we were done eating, Mom would make flower crowns for me and Billy.
dialogue_jp:
お弁当を食べたあと
お母さんが花飾りを作ってくれて

dialogue_en: I'd wear mine for days.
dialogue_jp: すごく嬉しかったな

dialogue_en: I shouldn't tell you this, but he's the reason Mom and Dad died. That's what Billy says.
dialogue_jp:
サムのせいで　お父さんとお母さんが死んだって
お兄ちゃんが言ってました

dialogue_en: I dunno... He always changes the subject when I ask.
dialogue_jp: でも　くわしいことは教えてくれないんです

dialogue_en: I would, but it's a gift.
dialogue_jp: ナイショのプレゼントにしたいんです

dialogue_en:
He's had to work so hard since we're on our own.
I wanted to do something nice for him.
dialogue_jp:
お母さんとお父さんがいなくなってから
ずっと　がんばってるお兄ちゃんに

dialogue_en: Of course. I promise you we'll keep it a surprise.
dialogue_jp: うんうん　お兄ちゃんには頼めないね

dialogue_en: Really? You will?
dialogue_jp: 本当ですか！

dialogue_en:
The flowers grow on a hill that's
got a great view of Midgar.
dialogue_jp: お花はミッドガルが見える丘に咲いています

dialogue_en: It's kinda far, but a chocobo'll get you there quick!
dialogue_jp: ちょっと遠いけど　チョコボに乗ればすぐです

dialogue_en: Thank you so much!
dialogue_jp: よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: Wow, just look at all of them! I've never seen these kinds before!
dialogue_jp: わあ　知らないお花　いっぱい！

dialogue_en: So, know which ones to pick?
dialogue_jp: お花　選ばなくちゃね

dialogue_en: Yeah... I got this.
dialogue_jp: ああ……まかせる

dialogue_en:
As much as I want to believe you,
your face says otherwise.
dialogue_jp: その顔　あんまりよくないなあ

dialogue_en: Good thing you've got me here.
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと手伝うからね

dialogue_en:
Sorta reminds me of when we
picked flowers for the Leaf House.
dialogue_jp: リーフハウスに持ってくお花　選んだよね

dialogue_en: Wow, these smell heavenly! Definitely the right choice if you want something fragrant.
dialogue_jp:
わあ　いいかおり～
クラウド　引き寄せられちゃった？

dialogue_en: Pick foxtails?
dialogue_jp: 『ねこじゃらし』にしますか？

dialogue_en: Pick stalks of red gerbera?
dialogue_jp: 『赤色の花』にしますか？

dialogue_en: Pick stalks of yellow calendulas?
dialogue_jp: 『黄色の花』にしますか？

dialogue_en: Pick stalks of blue forget-me-nots?
dialogue_jp: 『青色の花』にしますか？

dialogue_en: Pick stalks of white daisies?
dialogue_jp: 『白色の花』にしますか？

dialogue_en: Yes.
dialogue_jp: この花にする

dialogue_en: Lemme think on it.
dialogue_jp: もうすこし考える

dialogue_en: So cute─and soft too. Perfect for a flower crown.
dialogue_jp:
かわいい！
やわらかいし　花飾りに向いてるね

dialogue_en:
Ooh, now these are vibrant.
So you like deep, passionate reds, do you?
dialogue_jp:
おお～　情熱的な色
クラウド　そういうの　好き？

dialogue_en: Hey, that's a good find!
dialogue_jp: さすが　お目が高い

dialogue_en: Those symbolize familial love. Pretty spot-on for our purposes, wouldn't you agree?
dialogue_jp:
この子の花言葉は『家族への愛』
プレゼントにぴったり

dialogue_en:
I just knew you'd go for the foxtails.
I swear, I can read you like a book.
dialogue_jp:
でた　ねこじゃらし！
クラウド　選ぶような気してたんだ

dialogue_en:
That's a start,
but we're definitely gonna need more.
dialogue_jp: 花飾りだから　もっと必要だね

dialogue_en: A few more couldn't hurt.
dialogue_jp: もうちょっと　つんでく？

dialogue_en:
Alright! That should probably be enough.
Let's go give 'em to Chloe.
dialogue_jp:
うん　これくらいあればじゅうぶん
クリンに届けよう

dialogue_en: Wow! Look at all of these! Thank you!
dialogue_jp:
わあ～！
こんなにたくさん　ありがとう

dialogue_en: It was our pleasure.
dialogue_jp: どういたしまして

dialogue_en:
I'm kinda worried, though.
What if mine's not as pretty as Mom's?
dialogue_jp: 花飾り　お母さんみたいに作れるかな

dialogue_en: Well, lucky for you, I just so happen to be a florist! I'd be more than happy to help you put one together.
dialogue_jp:
わたし　じつはお花屋さんなの
花飾り　手伝おうか

dialogue_en: Really?
dialogue_jp: ほんと？

dialogue_en: We'll make two. Right, Cloud?
dialogue_jp: いっしょに作ろ　ねっ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Sure.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Look!
dialogue_jp: できた

dialogue_en: Gosh...it's, uh...it's definitely unique! One of a kind.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　お花の組み合わせ　独特だね

dialogue_en: Maybe, but unique is exactly what I wanted! I love it. Thank you.
dialogue_jp:
でも　楽しくていいと思います
わたし　気に入りました！

dialogue_en: Look!
dialogue_jp: できた

dialogue_en: You like?
dialogue_jp: どう？

dialogue_en: It's not the same as Mom's, but yeah, I do!
dialogue_jp: お母さんのと違うけど　かわいい

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, both of you.
dialogue_jp: お姉さん　お兄さん　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Look!
dialogue_jp: できた～！

dialogue_en: It's just like Mom's.
dialogue_jp: お母さんが作ったみたい

dialogue_en: But this one's all yours.
dialogue_jp: クリンが作ったんだよ

dialogue_en: Yeah. I didn't think I could do it, but I did! You two are the best. I couldn't have made this without you.
dialogue_jp:
そっか　わたしでも作れるんだ
お姉さん　お兄さん　教えてくれてありがとう！

dialogue_en: Yeah, you could. Believe in yourself.
dialogue_jp: とにかく　やってみろ

dialogue_en: Thanks!
dialogue_jp: はい！

dialogue_en: There somethin' I can help ya with?
dialogue_jp: あれ　なにか問題？

dialogue_en: Oh, Billy!
dialogue_jp: お兄ちゃん！

dialogue_en: Here─for you.
dialogue_jp: お兄ちゃん　これ

dialogue_en: Chloe, did you make this?
dialogue_jp: これ　クリンが作ったの？

dialogue_en: Uh-huh.
dialogue_jp: うん

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: ありがとう
どうかな

dialogue_en: Cute, don'tcha think?
dialogue_jp: 似合ってる　ね？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Cute.
dialogue_jp: おそろいだ

dialogue_en: Billy is gonna like it...right?
dialogue_jp: お兄ちゃん　喜んでくれるかな

dialogue_en: He'll love it.
dialogue_jp: もちろん

dialogue_en: Won't he?
dialogue_jp: うれしいよね？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Cute.
dialogue_jp: おそろいだ

dialogue_en: I appreciate you helpin' out Chloe.
dialogue_jp: 妹を助けてくれて　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Can't remember the last time I saw her smile like that.
dialogue_jp: クラウドのおかげで　クリンが明るくなったよ

dialogue_en: Honestly? I never wanna take it off.
dialogue_jp: この花飾り　大切にしますね

dialogue_en: Do you think Grandpa would like one of my flower crowns too?
dialogue_jp: 次は　おじいちゃんの花飾りを作るつもりです

dialogue_en: Oh! Hi, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: あっ　クラウドさん

dialogue_en: Congrats on your big race with Piko! Billy told me everything.
dialogue_jp:
お兄ちゃんに聞きました
ピコでレースに出たんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Billy probably won't come back to the ranch for a while. He says he's gotta focus on training right now.
dialogue_jp:
お兄ちゃん　しばらくレースに集中するから
牧場には戻れないって

dialogue_en: I really wish I could've been there to see Piko win.
dialogue_jp: わたしもピコのレース　見たかったな

dialogue_en: I hope Billy isn't causing too much trouble.
dialogue_jp: お兄ちゃん　無茶してなきゃいいんだけど

dialogue_en: Oh, you're here! Great timing─I just heard from Billy!
dialogue_jp:
あっ　みなさん
お兄ちゃんから連絡がありました

dialogue_en: He says he's in Nibel training with the chocobo sage himself!
dialogue_jp:
伝説のチョコボ仙人のところで
修行してるそうです

dialogue_en: Billy told me about how you guys caught a chocobo that can travel on water!
dialogue_jp:
お兄ちゃんに聞きました
海チョコボを捕まえたんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Billy's talking about competing in the Gold Cup. But that's a big race...
dialogue_jp:
お兄ちゃん　このあとゴールドカップに
挑戦するって言ってるんですけど

dialogue_en: Do you think he's ready?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫かな～

dialogue_en: I bet it's a blast zooming across the water on those birds you just caught!
dialogue_jp: わたしもいつか　海チョコボで海を飛んでみたいな

dialogue_en: Cloud! I just wanna say congratulations on the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん
ゴールドカップ　お疲れさまでした

dialogue_en: I never thought in a million years our ranch could win! It's like a dream come true! Thank you!
dialogue_jp:
うちみたいな小さな牧場が勝てるなんて
いまでも信じられません　夢みたいです！

dialogue_en: Billy told me everything about Mom and Dad. What they were doing.
dialogue_jp:
お父さんとお母さんのこと
お兄ちゃんから　聞きました

dialogue_en: They risked their lives for the ranch and the chocobos.
dialogue_jp: ふたりが命がけで守ったチョコボや牧場を

dialogue_en: So we're gonna carry on their legacy. I think they'd like that.
dialogue_jp:
今度は　わたしとお兄ちゃんで
守っていこうと思います

dialogue_en: Billy started crying like a baby on the phone.
dialogue_jp: お兄ちゃん　電話の向こうで泣いてました

dialogue_en: Which made me start crying too! I was just so happy for him, you know?
dialogue_jp:
その声を聞いて
わたしも嬉しくて泣いちゃいました

dialogue_en: Our phone's been practically ringing off the hook ever since you won the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップに勝ってから
問い合わせの電話が鳴りやまないんですよ

dialogue_en: Heard how ya helped Chloe with that flower crown of hers. Awful sweet of ya.
dialogue_jp:
クリンの花飾りづくりを
手伝ってくれたんだって？

dialogue_en: Only wish Will and Clara were around to see it, but...they made their bed.
dialogue_jp:
両親のリングリンとチョイスに代わって
礼を言うよ

dialogue_en: Oh! Apologies. Will's my son...
dialogue_jp: わたし　グリンの息子がリングリン

dialogue_en: Clara's his wife. Billy and Chloe're theirs, if they haven't already told ya.
dialogue_jp:
リングリンとチョイスの子供が
グリングリンとクリン

dialogue_en: Bill, Will, Billy.
dialogue_jp: 覚えやすい名前だろ？

dialogue_en: Anyway...since Will and Clara took off...
dialogue_jp: リングリンとチョイスがいなくなって

dialogue_en: it's up to me to make sure Chloe and Billy are raised right. And here I was, plannin' for retirement...
dialogue_jp:
残された子供たちのためにも
まだまだ引退なんかしておられんよ

dialogue_en: Why, if it ain't my favorite customers! So, how're the birds treatin' ya?
dialogue_jp:
おお　いらっしゃい
チョコボの具合はいかがかな？

dialogue_en: Make sure 'n' stop by the shop should ya find yourself in need of provisions. Just give our Chloe a holler, and she'll see you're ready for the road.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボのことなら　グリン牧場におまかせあれ
まあ　詳しいことは奥にいるクリンに聞いてくれ

dialogue_en: There he is, the man of the hour! Heard how you 'n' Piko took home first!
dialogue_jp:
聞いたぞ
ピコに乗ってレースに勝ったんだって？

dialogue_en: Always knew there was somethin' special about you, boy. From the moment I laid eyes on ya, I thought "Now that one's a winner!"
dialogue_jp:
ひと目見た時から　やる男だとは思っていたが
やはり　わたしの見る目は正しかったな

dialogue_en: Just hope Billy doesn't let that trophy go to his head. Kid's a fighter, but he'll need to keep his cool round Sam, or he'll wind up in a whole mess of trouble.
dialogue_jp:
グリングリンのヤツ　調子に乗って
サムのとこと問題を起こさなきゃいいんだが

dialogue_en: Met the chocobo sage, didja? Man's an odd duck, ain't he─and that's puttin' it mildly!
dialogue_jp:
おお　ニブルのチョコボ仙人と会ったんだって？
あのじいさん　元気にしてたか

dialogue_en: Ain't that somethin', though? Billy followin' in his father's footsteps─literally! Guess it's true what they say: blood will out!
dialogue_jp:
まさか親子そろって
仙人のところへ押しかけるとは　血は争えんな

dialogue_en: You winnin' the Gold Cup was the best thing that ever happened to my ranch. Got customers out the wazoo!
dialogue_jp:
おまえさんがゴールドカップを
取ってくれたおかげで　お客がいっきに増えてな

dialogue_en: Which, frankly, is murder on these old bones.
dialogue_jp: 老体にムチ打って働いとるよ

dialogue_en: Fortunately for me, I got a young whippersnapper in Billy, and he's ready to put in the work─make sure your victory don't go to waste!
dialogue_jp:
グリングリンには　これを機に
グリン牧場の名前をしっかりと広めてもらわんとな

dialogue_en: I see so much of Will and Clara in Billy and Chloe... Their drive, ambition─their work ethic. Lookin' forward to seein' the people they become.
dialogue_jp:
両親の意志を引き継いだ孫たちが
どう育っていくのか　いまから楽しみだよ

dialogue_en: Howdy! Our carriages'll get you where you need to go!
dialogue_jp: こんにちは　チョコボ車をご利用ですか？

dialogue_en: Well, I say "our," but...I'm not a regular employee. I only fill in from time to time, whenever the farm I work isn't busy.
dialogue_jp:
私　いつもは近くの農場で働いてるんですけど
ときどきグリン牧場のお手伝いをしてるんです

dialogue_en: Spare your legs and catch a ride!
dialogue_jp: チョコボ車でおでかけですか？

dialogue_en: Where ya headed to today?
dialogue_jp: どちらに行かれます？

dialogue_en: Just smell that fresh air... Sure beats the city!
dialogue_jp: す～は～　草のいいニオイ～

dialogue_en: Come back anytime!
dialogue_jp: いつでもどうぞ～

dialogue_en: We'll be here whenever you need a lift!
dialogue_jp: また遊びにきてくださいね

dialogue_en: Don't you just love the wide open plains and sun on your face?
dialogue_jp: 草原に寝転ぶのって最高ですよね

dialogue_en: Welcome!
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい

dialogue_en: New around here, I take it?
dialogue_jp: お客さん　新顔だね

dialogue_en:
Want a drink?
Little early, but we got an excuse...
dialogue_jp: 今日は特別営業中だ　１杯どうだい？

dialogue_en: Hate to say it, but the mess in Midgar's been good for business.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの騒ぎで
ひと儲けさせてもらってるよ

dialogue_en: Hey, how you doin'...
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい……

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: なんだ

dialogue_en:
Hey, mister...
You a winner?
dialogue_jp: お客さん　デキる人だな？

dialogue_en: Some say.
dialogue_jp: たいていはな

dialogue_en: Awesome! That's good enough for me!
dialogue_jp: おお　すばらしい！

dialogue_en: The name's Vash, and I could really use your help.
dialogue_jp:
俺はヴァル
ぜひ頼みたいことがあるんだ

dialogue_en: Truth is, I bungled a Queen's Blood match─hard.
dialogue_jp: 君たち　クイーンズ・ブラッドは知ってるだろ？

dialogue_en: So, not only did my ego take a lickin'...but I lost a card near and dear to my heart.
dialogue_jp:
実は　カードバウトに負けて
大切なカードを奪われてしまってね

dialogue_en:
What I'm gettin' at is...
think ya'd be able to win it back for me?
dialogue_jp: そのカードを　なんとか取り返してきてくれないか

dialogue_en: What will you say?
dialogue_jp: 依頼を引き受けますか？

dialogue_en: What card is it?
dialogue_jp: どういうカードだ？

dialogue_en: Get it back yourself.
dialogue_jp: 自分で取り返せ

dialogue_en: We'll take the job.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en: The chocobo and moogle one. It's rare, and the one high-value card in my whole deck.
dialogue_jp:
『チョコボ＆モーグリ』
俺が持っていた唯一のレアカードだったんだ

dialogue_en: It was the only thing gettin' me through the daily grind. I mean, the bullshit I have to put up with at this job! The fights, the late nights, the drunks!
dialogue_jp:
酔っ払いにからまれても　酒が薄いってクレームも
レアカードを持ってたから耐えられたんだ

dialogue_en:
And that slimy bastard...
He... He stole it!
dialogue_jp: それをあいつが……

dialogue_en: Hey, I get it... I'm a bartender too.
dialogue_jp:
気持ち　わかります
私もバーテンダーだから

dialogue_en: So tough...
dialogue_jp: ヴァル

dialogue_en:
You...you are?
So then you know just how tough it can be.
dialogue_jp:
へえ　そうなんだ
ほんと　いろいろ大変だよな

dialogue_en: Don't you think I would if I could!? God, I'm a shit player! Don't you get that!?
dialogue_jp:
それができないから頼んでるんだろ！
自慢じゃないけど　俺は弱いんだ

dialogue_en: Whatever you say...
dialogue_jp: そうか……

dialogue_en:
Hardcore players're willing to throw down
hella gil for rare cards!
dialogue_jp:
『クイーンズ・ブラッド』のレアカードは
高値で取引されてるんだ

dialogue_en: Please, I'm begging you, you've gotta get it back before that asshole tries to sell it!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　はやく取り戻さないと
売られてしまうかも

dialogue_en: Oh, thank you. Thank you!
dialogue_jp: 本当か　助かるよ！

dialogue_en: But first, I gotta make sure I'm puttin' my baby's fate in the right hands. Mind if we go a round?
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　依頼する前にいちおう
君の腕前を確かめさせてもらっていいかな

dialogue_en: Just lemme know when you're ready to play. I'll be here.
dialogue_jp: カードバウトの準備ができたら　声をかけてくれ

dialogue_en: Alright! Ready to prove you got what it takes to beat that jerk and win back my Chocobo & Moogle card?
dialogue_jp:
それじゃあ『チョコボ＆モーグリ』を取り戻せるか
カードバウトの腕を見させてもらうよ

dialogue_en: How's about a match?
dialogue_jp: カードバウトしていくかい？

dialogue_en: Feelin' the call of the cards?
dialogue_jp: バウトするかい？

dialogue_en: Gimme a holler when you're ready to throw down.
dialogue_jp: やる気になったら　また声をかけてくれ

dialogue_en: Hoo boy. You lost against me? No way you're gonna be able to win my card back! Gotta do better if you want the job.
dialogue_jp:
おいおい　俺に負けるようじゃ依頼できないよ
もうすこし腕を磨いてきてくれ

dialogue_en:
Okay! That's the kinda skill I'm talkin' about!
You'll beat Virgil no prob!
dialogue_jp:
うん　いい腕だ
これなら申し分ない

dialogue_en: That's the guy you gotta play, the one who took my card. He works at the clock tower.
dialogue_jp:
カードを奪ったのは
塔の係員をやってるビルゴってやつだ

dialogue_en: Mind kickin' his ass for me?
dialogue_jp: かたき討ち　頼んだぞ

dialogue_en: And when you're done, come straight back. I'll have a special cocktail waiting with your name on it.
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　カードを取り戻してくれたら
とっておきのカクテルを　ごちそうするよ

dialogue_en: Got this great recipe I've been itchin' to try again!
dialogue_jp: すこし前に　いいレシピを手に入れてね

dialogue_en: Holy shit, I won? Well I'll be!
dialogue_jp: まさか勝てるとは　自分でもビックリだ

dialogue_en: Maybe I do have some skills...
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　自信がついてきたな

dialogue_en: Yeah, yeah. You won, I lost. Big frickin' deal.
dialogue_jp:
ふん　俺に勝ったからって
自慢にならないぜ

dialogue_en: Damn, am I ever gonna win a match...?
dialogue_jp: どうやったら勝てるんだ

dialogue_en: You'll find there's no finer view of the plains than from our clock tower.
dialogue_jp:
塔の上から
美しい草原を眺めてみませんか？

dialogue_en: The climb is worth it, I promise.
dialogue_jp: 塔からの絶景をお楽しみください

dialogue_en: We're here for the card you took from the bartender.
dialogue_jp: 酒場のマスターから奪ったカードを返してくれ

dialogue_en: Ah...the card.
dialogue_jp: へえ　なるほど

dialogue_en:
So Vash's resorted to this?
Hiring people to win his games for him?
dialogue_jp:
ヴァルのやつ　自分では勝てないからって
刺客を送り込んできたワケですね

dialogue_en:
Fine. But word of warning:
I'm not a pushover like some folks.
dialogue_jp:
ふふん　いいですよ
僕に勝てたら　返してあげますよ

dialogue_en: Gettin' cold feet, huh?
dialogue_jp: いつでも相手になりますよ

dialogue_en: This one's for ol' Vash, yeah? Well...let's hope you put up a better fight than he did.
dialogue_jp:
マスターの代理戦ですね
いいですよ　やりましょう

dialogue_en: Oh, care for a match?
dialogue_jp: 勝負しますか？

dialogue_en: Good by me.
dialogue_jp: 受けて立ちますよ

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh... You're free to try again if you're so inclined.
dialogue_jp:
ふっふっふ
再戦はいつでも受け付けてますよ

dialogue_en: Aw, damn... I really lost?
dialogue_jp: あちゃ～　負けてしまいました

dialogue_en: It was one helluva match, though, am I right? You and I're definitely gonna have to play again sometime!
dialogue_jp:
なかなか熱い勝負でしたね　くやしいなあ
またリベンジさせてくださいね

dialogue_en:
But uh, not today.
Gotta run!
dialogue_jp: えっと　じゃあ今日はこのへんで

dialogue_en: Hold it. Aren't we forgetting something?
dialogue_jp: ストップ　なにか忘れてない？

dialogue_en: Right, the card!
dialogue_jp: あっはは　ですよね～

dialogue_en:
The one I won off Vash, right?
Uh, shoot... Which card was that again?
dialogue_jp:
ヴァルから奪ったカードでしたっけ
えっと　どれだったかなあ

dialogue_en: Ah crap. I remember. The chocobo and moogle one.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　ヴァルのカードって
『チョコボ＆モーグリ』か……

dialogue_en:
So, this is kinda awkward, but...
I don't have it anymore.
dialogue_jp:
すいません　そのカード
もう手放してました

dialogue_en: Is that so?
dialogue_jp: 俺が探そう

dialogue_en: No, seriously! I-I flipped it!
dialogue_jp: いやいや　ホントですって

dialogue_en:
I was on my last gil,
so I had to sell it to a card collector.
dialogue_jp:
ちょうど　金欠だったんで
カードコレクターに売っちゃったんです

dialogue_en:
A guy named Thorin.
He runs this card shop outside of town.
dialogue_jp:
街の外で　カードショップをやってる
トゥロンって男です

dialogue_en: Maybe check with him?
dialogue_jp: 訪ねてみてくださいよ

dialogue_en: A merc's job is never done, am I right?
dialogue_jp: もうひとがんばりだね　なんでも屋さん

dialogue_en: Hope to play you again soon.
dialogue_jp: リベンジ　お待ちしてますね

dialogue_en: Not half bad!
dialogue_jp: ナイスバウトでした

dialogue_en: You're full of surprises, aren't you?
dialogue_jp: 負けてしまいました　さすがです

dialogue_en: Might be time to rethink my strategy...
dialogue_jp: 戦術を見直したほうがいいかもな

dialogue_en: Hey there. You folks buyin' or sellin'?
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい　カードの取引かい？

dialogue_en: We're here for the Chocobo & Moogle card.
dialogue_jp: 『チョコボ＆モーグリ』のカードが欲しい

dialogue_en:
'Course ya are. Hate to break it to ya,
but ain't no way I'm givin' up that beaut.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　すまない
そのカードは販売してないんだ

dialogue_en:
At least, not to some dabbler
who fancies himself a collector.
dialogue_jp:
レアカードは　それ相応の実力者に
持ってもらいたくてね

dialogue_en: Unless you more than dabble.
dialogue_jp: だから　そうだな

dialogue_en:
Tell you what.
You beat me, and that card is all yours.
dialogue_jp:
もしカードバウトで私に勝てれば
無償で進呈しよう

dialogue_en: So, you game?
dialogue_jp: さあ　どうする？

dialogue_en: What will you do?
dialogue_jp: 用件はなんですか？

dialogue_en: Ask what Queen's Blood is.
dialogue_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッドについて聞く

dialogue_en: <button=quest> Challenge him to a game.
dialogue_jp: <button=quest>カードバウトを申し込む

dialogue_en: Challenge him to a game.
dialogue_jp: カードバウトを申し込む

dialogue_en: Purchase cards.
dialogue_jp: カードを購入する

dialogue_en: Leave.
dialogue_jp: 用はない

dialogue_en:
Why, only the most popular
card game in recent memory.
dialogue_jp: いま世界中で流行っているカードゲームさ

dialogue_en: Name comes from that legend of the queen who ruled the world till she was deposed and killed by her people.
dialogue_jp:
かつての世界を支配していた女王が
民衆の手によって処刑された

dialogue_en: And from that royal blood spilt, sprouted the fiends of the world... C'mon, you know the story.
dialogue_jp:
そのとき流れた女王の血からモンスターが
生まれたって伝承が　名前の由来

dialogue_en: At any rate, game's really taken off. No matter where you go, you'll find people willin' to play.
dialogue_jp:
各地にプレイヤーがいて　どこかしらで
カードバウトを繰り広げているよ

dialogue_en: Then bust out those cards, boy.
dialogue_jp: ふふ　そうこなくては

dialogue_en: If you want a challenge, I'll be here.
dialogue_jp: バウトは　いつでも大歓迎だよ

dialogue_en: Thank you for your patronage.
dialogue_jp: また　いつでもどうぞ

dialogue_en: If you got the gil, I got the cards.
dialogue_jp: よいカードと出会えますように

dialogue_en: Only one way to get that Chocobo & Moogle card back─beat me, fair and square.
dialogue_jp:
『チョコボ＆モーグリ』が欲しければ
カードバウトに勝って　つかみとるんだね

dialogue_en: Hey. You been working on your deck at all?
dialogue_jp: クイーンズ・ブラッドの調子はどうだい？

dialogue_en: So, what can I do for you today?
dialogue_jp: 今日はどういったご用で？

dialogue_en: Y'know, you're pretty good. Not good enough, obviously, but with some practice...
dialogue_jp:
筋は悪くない
鍛え直して　また挑戦するんだね

dialogue_en:
You've got some serious skills, son.
Joke's on me for thinkin' otherwise.
dialogue_jp: なるほど　君の力を見くびっていたようだ

dialogue_en: Deal's a deal. Here's your card.
dialogue_jp: これは約束のカードだ

dialogue_en:
But next time you go up against me,
I'll be bringin' my A game.
dialogue_jp: 次やるときは　本気で戦わせてもらうよ

dialogue_en: The cards have a voice, and you gotta heed their wisdom.
dialogue_jp: カードの声に耳を傾けてみるといい

dialogue_en: A solid match all around. Thanks for that.
dialogue_jp: いい刺激になった　感謝するよ

dialogue_en: That's some kinda deck you've built, son...
dialogue_jp: いいカードをそろえているな

dialogue_en: Right. Best I leave the playin' to you, and you leave the collectin' to me. Sound good?
dialogue_jp:
プレイヤー道は君にまかせて
私はコレクター道を極めることにするよ

dialogue_en: You did it! You got my baby back!
dialogue_jp: おお　取り戻してくれたか

dialogue_en: To be honest, this isn't the first card I've lost.
dialogue_jp: 実は　こういうことは初めてじゃなくてね

dialogue_en:
And considering just how many I've lost,
one this rare is definitely wasted on me.
dialogue_jp:
思うに　俺の実力じゃあ
このカード　不相応なんだろうな

dialogue_en:
Here...
It's prob'ly better off with you.
dialogue_jp: なあ　君が使ってくれないか

dialogue_en: Really...?
dialogue_jp: いいのか？

dialogue_en: But only until I've gotten good enough to win it back!
dialogue_jp: 強くなったら　自力で取り戻すさ

dialogue_en: Whew... That's a weight off my mind.
dialogue_jp: はあ～　スッキリした

dialogue_en:
Right, enough of that!
How 'bout I fix you two your drinks?
dialogue_jp:
よし　おふたりさん
１杯おごらせてくれ

dialogue_en:
So this guy moved here recently from Midgar.
Left after the Sector 7 tragedy─you know how it is.
dialogue_jp:
ほら　ミッドガルの七番街で事件があったろ？
それで　引っ越してきたヤツがいてね

dialogue_en: Anyway, he kept raving about this incredible cocktail served at a famous bar in the undercity.
dialogue_jp:
そいつが　スラムで飲んだカクテルが
忘れられないって言うんで　再現してみたんだ

dialogue_en: Seventh Heaven─dunno if you've heard of the joint.
dialogue_jp:
『セブンスヘブン』っていう店なんだけど
知ってる？

dialogue_en:
They called it the "Cosmo Canyon."
Pretty, don'tcha think?
dialogue_jp: 『コスモキャニオン』　きれいな色だろ

dialogue_en: Go on. Drink up.
dialogue_jp: さあ　どうぞ

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: いただきます

dialogue_en: You know... That was just what I needed.
dialogue_jp: ごちそうさま　おいしかったです

dialogue_en: Knew you'd like it!
dialogue_jp: だろ？

dialogue_en: Although apparently, my version "pales in comparison" to the undercity original.
dialogue_jp:
でも　オリジナルのコスモキャニオンは
もっとうまかったらしい

dialogue_en: So much so, the guy flat out refuses to order it again.
dialogue_jp: 残念ながら　もう飲めないみたいだけどな

dialogue_en:
Pinch of salt.
That'll give it the kick it needs─trust me.
dialogue_jp:
もしかしたら
岩塩をひとつまみ　加えるといいかも

dialogue_en:
Salt, huh? Hey, that's pretty clever!
Yeah, maybe I'll try that.
dialogue_jp:
なるほど　岩塩か
なるほどなあ

dialogue_en: Wait. Don't tell me... You're the one who invented the Cosmo Canyon, aren't you!? You're that Seventh Heaven bartender!
dialogue_jp:
えっ　もしかしてあんたが考案者？
セブンスヘブンの　七番街スラムの

dialogue_en: Not today, but someday soon.
dialogue_jp: セブンスヘブンは　きっと再開します

dialogue_en:
When we do open up a new place, swing by.
I'll make you a Cosmo Canyon myself.
dialogue_jp:
その時は　遊びに来てくださいね
ごちそうしますから

dialogue_en: Okay, but I'm holding you to that! I'll be there opening night─with bells on! Promise!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　そりゃ楽しみだなあ
絶対行くから頑張れよ　応援するよ

dialogue_en: Make sure my Chocobo & Moogle card gets its day in the sun, alright? Don't let it go to waste.
dialogue_jp:
『チョコボ＆モーグリ』は　君に託したよ
ぞんぶんに使ってやってくれ

dialogue_en:
Still can't believe it.
I met the Seventh Heaven bartender!
dialogue_jp: しかし　カクテルの考案者に会えるとはね

dialogue_en: Close call with that card─nearly lost it forever. Least it's in good hands now.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　冷や汗もんだったけど
これで　本家公認ってことだよな

dialogue_en: Town's on edge after Wutai's announcement, so everyone's doing what they can to keep themselves occupied.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの放送があってから　客足が増えたよ
みんな不安なんだろうな

dialogue_en: And what better way to forget your fears than drinking and gaming?
dialogue_jp: 気をまぎらわせるなら　酒とカードバウトだよな

dialogue_en: Our clock tower was designed to double as an observation post in wartime, and has functioned as such in the past.
dialogue_jp:
知ってます？　有事の際は
この塔も　見張り塔として活用されるんですよ

dialogue_en: I've been so busy trying to memorize the town's evacuation procedures, I haven't had time to reorganize my deck...
dialogue_jp:
避難マニュアルの見直しをすることになって
最近　カードデッキをいじれてないんですよね

dialogue_en: There's a theory that Queen's Blood's actual origins can be traced back to an ancient war.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドの起源は
かつて実際にあった戦争だという説もある

dialogue_en: And here we are again, on the brink of a fresh one.
dialogue_jp: 現実が　カードの世界のようにならなければいいが

dialogue_en: Lotta folks been comin' in lately to unload their cards, now that war's in the offing.
dialogue_jp:
戦争にそなえてなのか
カードを手放す客が増えていてね

dialogue_en: Guess people don't got time for games no more...
dialogue_jp: 同志としては　すこし寂しいよ

dialogue_en: Everyone, please! One at a time!
dialogue_jp: みなさん　どうか落ち着いて！

dialogue_en: We are working as hard as we can to get the power grid back online!
dialogue_jp:
修理を手配中ですから
もうしばらくの辛抱です

dialogue_en: I was starting to worry!
dialogue_jp: ああ　修理の方々――

dialogue_en:
I thought you were here to fix the─
Never mind.
dialogue_jp: ……じゃないですね　失礼

dialogue_en:
Yeah, we're more like "demolition experts,"
so unless you want us to blow somethin' up...
dialogue_jp: おう　修理よりはぶっ壊すのが得意だな

dialogue_en:
How can you make jokes at a time like this?
It's downright distasteful.
dialogue_jp: こんな時です　そういう冗談は感心しませんな

dialogue_en: Anyway, what's goin' on?
dialogue_jp: で　なんかあったのか？

dialogue_en: It's the mako pipeline. It's sprung a leak.
dialogue_jp: パイプから　魔晄が漏れているようです

dialogue_en:
I paid a wandering merc to patch the thing up.
I certainly wasn't about to fiddle with critical infrastructure as a layman.
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋さんが応急修理をしてくれていますが
やっぱり　本職の修理じゃないと不安ですからね

dialogue_en: Though I thought I'd hear back from them by now...
dialogue_jp: こうして到着を　お待ちしているわけです

dialogue_en: A "merc"?
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋？

dialogue_en:
Yep! Some hotshot from Midgar's undercity...
or so they claimed.
dialogue_jp:
ええ　ミッドガルのスラム界隈では
有名なんだとか

dialogue_en: Sounds like a pro we oughta get to know.
dialogue_jp: そりゃあ　会ってみてえなあ

dialogue_en: Oh, you'd like to meet them?
dialogue_jp: では　ご紹介しましょう

dialogue_en: Well, if you're that keen, would you mind delivering a message for me while you're at it?
dialogue_jp:
その代わりと言うわけではありませんが
伝言をお願いしてもいいですか？

dialogue_en: What will you do?
dialogue_jp: 依頼を引き受けますか？

dialogue_en: Inquire about the pipeline.
dialogue_jp: パイプとは？

dialogue_en: Ask about this "merc."
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋とは？

dialogue_en: Take the job.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en: It's your standard mako pipeline, really.
dialogue_jp: いわゆる　魔晄パイプですな

dialogue_en: Carries a portion of Midgar's yield straight to us. We'd be lost without it.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルからパイプを引き
魔晄を送ってもらっているのですが

dialogue_en: Hence my anxiety. We need it fixed, ASAP.
dialogue_jp: そのパイプが不調で　魔晄が来ないのです

dialogue_en:
Our tank's got some left, but we'll
soon be running on fumes.
dialogue_jp: タンクに貯えがあるものの　どれぐらい持つか

dialogue_en: Makes me sick to my stomach to watch our supply slowly dwindle like this.
dialogue_jp:
徐々に減っていく魔晄を
ビクビクしながら確認する日々です

dialogue_en: That's rough, man.
dialogue_jp: そりゃ大変だ

dialogue_en:
But hey! Good opportunity to
wean yourselves off that poison.
dialogue_jp:
でもよ　いっそ
魔晄ナシで生活すりゃいいじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Okay, now that one was funny.
dialogue_jp: あっははは　またご冗談を

dialogue_en: Our town technician's laid up in bed at the moment─recovering from a fiend attack.
dialogue_jp:
この街の設備保守担当が
モンスターに襲われて　入院中なんです

dialogue_en: We asked Shinra to send someone to fill in─anyone who knows the work─but we haven't heard back.
dialogue_jp:
神羅本社に応援を要請したのですが
いまはミッドガルが大変でしょう

dialogue_en: Fortunately for us, that mercenary rolled into town. Without 'em, we would've been up a creek!
dialogue_jp:
そこに現れたのが　なんでも屋さんです
本当に助かりましたよ

dialogue_en: You will? Capital!
dialogue_jp: おお　助かります

dialogue_en:
Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet.
I'm Fritz Bellenger, the mayor here.
dialogue_jp:
申し遅れましたが　わたくし
町長の　フラット・ベレージと言います

dialogue_en: I'm sure that mercenary is hard at work over at the warehouse outside of town.
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋さんは
街の外にある工房で作業中のはずです

dialogue_en: Mind asking them to give us an update on the repairs? A simple "it's coming along" would suffice.
dialogue_jp:
私からの伝言は
『状況と進捗の報告をお願いします』です

dialogue_en: I understand the company has their hands full right now─that Midgar's their top priority, but I hope they haven't forgotten about us.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の技術者さん　いつ来てくれますかねえ
ミッドガルが最優先でしょうからねえ

dialogue_en: I'm losing sleep at the thought of our mako supply running out...
dialogue_jp: 魔晄タンクの残量が心配で　夜も眠れません

dialogue_en: Mercs ain't rare, but I think you're the only one who's made a name for themselves in the undercity...
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋がほかにいたとしても
スラムで有名ったら　おまえじゃねえのか

dialogue_en: So you don't know who he was talking about?
dialogue_jp: スラムは　あんたのほうが詳しいだろう

dialogue_en: Nope. Not a clue.
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋ねえ……

dialogue_en: You're the only "hotshot" I know.
dialogue_jp: やっぱり　おまえしか知らねえな

dialogue_en: Most undercity mercs don't go braggin' about bein' ex-SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp:
ほかのヤツなら
もちっと気の利いた看板あげるだろうしよ

dialogue_en: This the warehouse the mayor was talkin' about?
dialogue_jp: 工房って　これか？

dialogue_en: Huh... Place looks fresh outta mercs to me.
dialogue_jp: ああ？　誰もいねえじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Did someone say "merc"?
dialogue_jp: 俺になにか用か

dialogue_en: I know you!
dialogue_jp: おまえ！

dialogue_en:
You're that Sector 5 chick who was
shittin' on Avalanche!
dialogue_jp:
アバランチのガセネタをわめいてた
ガキじゃねえか

dialogue_en:
Wha─ Is that Cloud?
But I was sure this wasn't your turf!
dialogue_jp:
えっうそ　クラウド！
ここも縄張りなの？

dialogue_en: Don't tell me─you're the merc the mayor hired?
dialogue_jp: パイプ修理を引き受けたなんでも屋は　おまえか

dialogue_en: "Kyrie doesn't work for free─or cheap."
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋のキリエだ　報酬は安くない

dialogue_en: How either of you get any work is a mystery to me.
dialogue_jp: おまえら　商売に向いてねえなあ

dialogue_en:
We're here on behalf of the mayor.
Man wants a progress report.
dialogue_jp: 町長から伝言だ　進捗を報告しろってよ

dialogue_en: Yes, progress is...what I've been making.
dialogue_jp: そうだよね　そりゃそうだよね

dialogue_en:
And I'm just dying to tell him all about it.
But the thing is...
dialogue_jp: わたしも　報告したい気持ちは人一倍あるけど……

dialogue_en:
I haven't actually, like, done anything?
I need more parts.
dialogue_jp: 補修に必要な部品が足りなくて　まだ全然

dialogue_en: Wouldn't it be fun if we looked for 'em together?
dialogue_jp: いっしょに　部品を集めてくれない？

dialogue_en: Hell no.
dialogue_jp: ふざけるな

dialogue_en: I could really use a guiding hand from a vet in the industry─like you! I swear, I'll do anything!
dialogue_jp:
前途有望な後輩を助けると思って　ね？
なんでも言うこと聞くから

dialogue_en: "Anything"?
dialogue_jp: なんでも？

dialogue_en:
Fine. I'll help...
if you stop calling yourself a "merc."
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋を名乗るのをやめろ　それが条件だ

dialogue_en:
You, sir, have a deal!
Okay─so these are the parts that I need.
dialogue_jp:
交渉成立！　さっそくだけど
これが最低限必要な部品

dialogue_en:
More'd probably be better,
but that number there's the bare minimum.
dialogue_jp:
本当は　もっと欲しいところだけど
ぜいたくは言うまい

dialogue_en: So! Any questions?
dialogue_jp: そろったら　持ってきて

dialogue_en: Any questions?
dialogue_jp: 依頼を引き受けますか？

dialogue_en: Where are the parts?
dialogue_jp: 部品はどこにある？

dialogue_en: Nope, let's do this.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en:
You can prob'ly find 'em in
scrap heaps somewhere nearby?
dialogue_jp: この先のパイプのスクラップ置き場にあると思うな

dialogue_en: I mean, I know you can!
dialogue_jp: ある　きっとある！

dialogue_en: Sweet! See ya soon!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　よろしくね～！

dialogue_en: I thought you were comin' with us.
dialogue_jp: いっしょに探すんじゃねえのか

dialogue_en:
No, I need to stay here and...
look for...screws...and bolts!
dialogue_jp:
わたしはここで　ほら
細かいネジとか探さないと

dialogue_en: I believe in you, fellow merc!
dialogue_jp: 部品集め　よろしくね～！

dialogue_en:
Being a merc's hard.
People don't talk about that enough.
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋って　思ってたより大変だねえ

dialogue_en:
Please hurry.
I don't wanna be out here after dark.
dialogue_jp: はやく集めないと　日が暮れちゃう！

dialogue_en: Didja find what we need?
dialogue_jp: 部品　そろった？

dialogue_en: What will you do?
dialogue_jp: 集めた部品を渡しますか？

dialogue_en: Give her everything you collected.
dialogue_jp: 持ってるだけ渡す

dialogue_en: Ask about the parts.
dialogue_jp: 部品について聞く

dialogue_en: Hold on to them for now.
dialogue_jp: 渡さない

dialogue_en: This isn't gonna cut it.
dialogue_jp: 足りないな～

dialogue_en: You forget how to count, or...?
dialogue_jp: えっと足りないんですけど

dialogue_en: I mean... It's not not enough? C-plus effort.
dialogue_jp: ああ　うんまあ　ギリギリ最低限だね

dialogue_en: Always pictured you as a "Gotta do the extra credit!" kinda guy... I misjudged you─but y'know what? That's on me.
dialogue_jp:
もうちょっと集めてくれると思ったけど
まあ　わたしの魅力がその程度ってことか

dialogue_en: Wow, look at all this! You guys went above and beyond! You get an official Kyrie Gold Star!
dialogue_jp:
そろってる　そろってる！
ちょっと多めに集めてくれたんだ

dialogue_en: And for your information, I don't give those to just anyone!
dialogue_jp: さっすが評判のなんでも屋　なっるほど～

dialogue_en: Holy mother of scrap metal!
dialogue_jp: わお　こんなにたくさん！

dialogue_en: Way to go, guys! When we're finished, that pipe'll be good as new! I bet we could even charge extra.
dialogue_jp:
これだけあれば　本職みたいに直せそう
報酬も割り増しで請求できるかも？

dialogue_en: Now then! Follow me, would you?
dialogue_jp: よ～し　じゃあついてきて

dialogue_en: Let's not keep my money─I mean the pipe─waiting!
dialogue_jp: 魔晄パイプの修理へ　レッツ・ゴー！

dialogue_en: Grandma didn't send you out here to find me, did she? 'Cause if she did, I'm not going back!
dialogue_jp:
実はわたし　家出中なんだよね
おばあちゃんとケンカしちゃって

dialogue_en: I'm sick of her treating me like a little kid, never letting me join her on a job.
dialogue_jp:
いつまでも子供扱いで
仕事をまかせてくれなくて

dialogue_en: So I packed up and hit the road.
dialogue_jp: 頭にきて　飛びだしちゃった

dialogue_en: Now I'm out here, makin' my fortune! I can't wait to rub my success in her smug face.
dialogue_jp:
だからね　ミッドガルの外でしっかり稼いで
おばあちゃんを見返してやるの

dialogue_en: Hello?
dialogue_jp: どこ行くの？

dialogue_en: It's this way!
dialogue_jp: こっちだよ

dialogue_en: Fellow merc! Defend me!
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋さん　やっちゃって！

dialogue_en: Time to take out the trash!
dialogue_jp: おそうじ　お願いね！

dialogue_en: Okay! Shall we?
dialogue_jp: さあ　こっちこっち

dialogue_en: Let's get going!
dialogue_jp: 行きますよ～

dialogue_en: Well, here we are!
dialogue_jp: とうちゃ～く！

dialogue_en: And you're sure that you can fix this?
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと修理できんだろうな

dialogue_en:
You shouldn't underestimate an undercity girl!
I can spin garbage into gold─and will!
dialogue_jp:
スラム育ちをナメないでよね
ジャンクパーツの扱いはまかせてよ

dialogue_en: Company!
dialogue_jp: なんだ！

dialogue_en: Stay back.
dialogue_jp: こっちはまかせろ

dialogue_en: Yes, sir!
dialogue_jp: かっこい～い！

dialogue_en: Damn, that was a tough bastard.
dialogue_jp: なんだってんだよったく

dialogue_en: Mako probably mutated 'em.
dialogue_jp: 漏れた魔晄の影響だろう

dialogue_en: Look at mister know-it-all.
dialogue_jp: 物知り～！

dialogue_en: Okay, that oughta do it! Mission accomplished, and my reward secured.
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　かんせ～い！
これでバッチリ　報酬もガッポリ

dialogue_en:
Let's go and grab a drink─celebrate
the birth of our great Mercenary Union!
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋同盟の結成を祝して
おつかれさまのカンパイでもする？

dialogue_en: Forget our deal already?
dialogue_jp: 約束を忘れたのか

dialogue_en: C'mon, fellow merc! With my brains and your brawn, we could clean up!
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋同士
手を取り合ってがんばろ～って約束？

dialogue_en: I'm not your "fellow" anything.
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋を名乗るのは　やめろ

dialogue_en:
Oh, stop being such a tight-ass.
The point is I can help you! I can talk you up!
dialogue_jp:
え～いいじゃん　減るもんじゃないし
宣伝してあげるからさあ

dialogue_en: Please don't.
dialogue_jp: 営業妨害だ

dialogue_en: Ugh! ...Huh?
dialogue_jp: ぐぬぬぬ……あっ！

dialogue_en:
Welp, since you're the only merc in town,
guess this one's all yours!
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　なんでも屋さん
あと片付け　よろしく～！

dialogue_en: Hey! Get back here!
dialogue_jp: コラ　待ちやがれ！

dialogue_en: What're we gonna do about the kid?
dialogue_jp: あのガキ　どうするよ

dialogue_en:
Nothing. Forget her.
Repairs're done, let's go see Fritz.
dialogue_jp:
修理は完了したらしい
町長に報告して終わろう

dialogue_en:
There you are!
I heard everything from the merc herself.
dialogue_jp:
おお　みなさん
なんでも屋さんに聞きましたよ

dialogue_en: She told me how you helped with the pipeline repairs. And sure enough, thanks to you, the mako is flowing again!
dialogue_jp:
みなさんも　修理を手伝ってくださったとか
おかげさまで魔晄の供給が再開しました

dialogue_en: We're in your debt.
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: Where's your merc now?
dialogue_jp: そのなんでも屋は　どこだ？

dialogue_en:
I'm not sure. She left just as soon as I paid─
for another job, perhaps?
dialogue_jp: 次の仕事があるとかで　慌てて出ていかれました

dialogue_en:
Guess that's what fame buys you!
Plenty of work and never enough time in between!
dialogue_jp:
さすが　噂にたがわぬ実力者
大忙しですなあ

dialogue_en: Sounds like you still got competition, merc.
dialogue_jp: 思わぬ商売ガタキの登場だな

dialogue_en:
Before you run off, she set this aside for you─
insisted that her fellow mercs be compensated.
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　心優しいなんでも屋さんから
みなさんの分の報酬を預かっております

dialogue_en: It's such a relief to no longer be literally scraping the bottom of the barrel.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄タンクに魔晄が溜まっていると
安心しますな

dialogue_en: Maybe I'll finally get a restful sleep tonight.
dialogue_jp: 今夜は　ぐっすり眠れそうです

dialogue_en: Just thinking about our poor town running out of mako gives me palpitations.
dialogue_jp:
からっぽの魔晄タンクを想像するだけで
足が震えます

dialogue_en: Kalm has a lot to offer tourists, you know. Our mako tank, the views from the clock tower, our one-of-a-kind bailey...
dialogue_jp:
魔晄タンク　見晴らし塔　堅牢な外壁
カームならではの光景はいかがですかな？

dialogue_en: Our quiet town is the perfect getaway for all those looking to escape that urban circus of Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの喧騒に疲れた方には
カームの穏やかな生活がオススメです

dialogue_en: Ever consider moving out here and joining us?
dialogue_jp: どうです　移住されませんか？

dialogue_en: Did you see that Wutai broadcast? I'm telling you, they're just jealous of our mako! Why else would they go to war?
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの映像　ご覧になられましたか
あいつら魔晄欲しさに　戦争をしかける気ですよ

dialogue_en: Don't you worry! If Wutai does decide to invade, Kalm's famous bailey'll keep our residents safe and sound, mark my words!
dialogue_jp:
たとえウータイと戦争になったとしても
わが町は堅牢な壁に守られているので　安心ですな

dialogue_en: Though I'm sure it won't come to it, we're setting up evacuation routes just in case.
dialogue_jp:
万がいちに備えて
カームでは　防災訓練を計画中です

dialogue_en: I was starting to worry!
dialogue_jp: ああ　修理の方々――

dialogue_en: Oh, I thought you were here to fix the... Never mind.
dialogue_jp: ……じゃないですね　失礼

dialogue_en: Yeah, we're more like "demolition experts," so unless you want us to blow somethin' up...
dialogue_jp: おう　修理よりはぶっ壊すのが得意だな

dialogue_en: How can you make jokes at a time like this? It's downright distasteful.
dialogue_jp: こんな時です　そういう冗談は感心しませんな

dialogue_en: Anyway, what's goin' on?
dialogue_jp: で　なんかあったのか？

dialogue_en: It's the mako pipeline. It's sprung a leak.
dialogue_jp: パイプから　魔晄が漏れているようです

dialogue_en: I paid a wandering merc to repair the thing, but then she up and ran off with our money!
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋さんに　応急処置を依頼したのですが
逃げてしまったようで

dialogue_en: A "merc"?
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋？

dialogue_en: Some hotshot from Midgar's undercity. She'd made quite a name for herself there. Or so she claimed...
dialogue_jp:
ええ　可愛らしい感じの娘さんで
腕前は　ミッドガルで評判なのだとか

dialogue_en: I bought it hook line and sinker...
dialogue_jp: すっかり　信じてしまったのですが

dialogue_en:
You don't know the merc, do you?
Regardless, we still need help, so...
dialogue_jp:
もしや　お知り合いで？
でしたら　これもご縁です

dialogue_en: Perhaps you could do the repairs?
dialogue_jp: 修理をお願いできませんか

dialogue_en: Could you do the repairs instead?
dialogue_jp: 依頼を引き受けますか？

dialogue_en: What's this about a mako pipeline?
dialogue_jp: パイプとは？

dialogue_en: Can't hire a technician?
dialogue_jp: 修理工はいないのか？

dialogue_en: Yeah, I'll do them.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en: Our town technician's laid up in bed at the moment, recovering from a fiend attack.
dialogue_jp:
街の設備保守担当は
モンスターに襲われて　入院中なんです

dialogue_en: We asked Shinra to send someone to fill in─anyone who knows the work─but we haven't heard back.
dialogue_jp:
神羅本社に応援を要請したのですが
いまはミッドガルが大変でしょう

dialogue_en: I understand Midgar takes priority, but still...
dialogue_jp: 待ってはいるのですが　いつになることやら

dialogue_en: You will? Capital!
dialogue_jp: おお　助かります

dialogue_en: Oh, haven't introduced myself yet! I'm Fritz Bellenger, mayor of Kalm.
dialogue_jp:
申し遅れましたが　わたくし
町長の　フラット・ベレージと言います

dialogue_en: I sent that no-good merc to the warehouse outside of town.
dialogue_jp: では　街の外にある工房へ向かってください

dialogue_en: Head there first and finish what I hope she at least started...
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋さんが放り出した仕事の
引き継ぎをお願いします

dialogue_en:
Oh, there you are!
Excellent timing.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　みなさん
いいところにいらっしゃった

dialogue_en: I've got a leaky mako pipe in need of fixing, but the merc I sent to handle the repairs ran off to take another job.
dialogue_jp:
実は　魔晄パイプの修理をお願いしていた
なんでも屋さんが　ほかの仕事があるとかで

dialogue_en: And here I thought we were out of the woods...
dialogue_jp: どこかへ　行ってしまわれました

dialogue_en: I can't just send anyone either. Fiends're nesting near the site and they'll attack anyone who gets close.
dialogue_jp:
なにしろ　パイプ周辺はモンスターが多くて
わたしらでは　手が出せないのです

dialogue_en: Where am I going to find someone who can repair a pipeline and handle monsters?
dialogue_jp:
せめて　状況の確認だけでも
代行してくれる人がいれば……

dialogue_en: Hello, hello, hello! It's everyone's favorite merc: Kyrie!
dialogue_jp:
やっほ～！
わたし　なんでも屋のキリエ

dialogue_en: So, here's the sitch: I was s'posed to fix that pipeline...
dialogue_jp: 実は　魔晄パイプの修理をするはずだったんだけど

dialogue_en: but I accidentally double-booked myself─whoops! So I had to peace out.
dialogue_jp:
ほかの仕事が入っちゃって
ここを離れることになったの

dialogue_en: Ah, the burden of being the golden girl.
dialogue_jp: いやはや　売れっ子はツライねえ

dialogue_en: Anyway! I left you─whoever you are─an itemized list of everything you need.
dialogue_jp:
というわけで　メモに
パイプ修理に必要な部品を書いておいたから

dialogue_en: Although...if you wanna make sure the pipe stays fixed, the more parts, the better.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　しっかり修理するなら
部品はたくさんあるといいけど

dialogue_en: But who's counting, right? Oh, which reminds me...
dialogue_jp:
そのへんはまかせるね～
ああ　そうそう

dialogue_en: You should find a few scrap heaps near the pipelines─rummage through those for materials.
dialogue_jp:
部品は　この先の
パイプのスクラップ置き場にあるから探してみて

dialogue_en: And I think that about covers it! Thanks and good luck!
dialogue_jp:
そんじゃ　あとは頼んだ
バイバ～イ！

dialogue_en: Greetings, my fellow merc! Are we working hard, or hardly working?
dialogue_jp:
やっほ～　なんでも屋さん
部品集めは順調ですか～？

dialogue_en: Speaking of work, I just stumbled on another job, so I'm gonna leave this one in your capable hands.
dialogue_jp:
いきなりなんだけど　実は他の仕事が入っちゃって
ここを離れることになったの

dialogue_en: I hate to bounce, but I'm sure you'll get that pipe patched up.
dialogue_jp:
というわけで
魔晄パイプの修理　よろしくね！

dialogue_en: Catch ya later. Peace!
dialogue_jp: そんじゃ　バイバ～イ！

dialogue_en: Use the parts you've collected to fix the pipe?
dialogue_jp: 集めた部品で修理しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: 修理する

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: 修理しない

dialogue_en: And you're sure that you can fix this?
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと修理できんだろうな

dialogue_en: Company!
dialogue_jp: なんだ！

dialogue_en: Damn, that was a tough bastard.
dialogue_jp: なんだってんだよったく

dialogue_en: Mako probably mutated 'em.
dialogue_jp: 漏れた魔晄の影響だろう

dialogue_en: Let's head back.
dialogue_jp: 報告に戻ろう

dialogue_en: Oh good, you're back.
dialogue_jp: ああ　みなさん

dialogue_en: Our mako supply's looking better by the minute─the tank's filling up, bit by bit.
dialogue_jp:
おかげさまで　魔晄がちょろちょろとですが
流れ始めました

dialogue_en: The flow isn't quite what it should be, but so long as we can provide power, it will suffice for our needs.
dialogue_jp:
たとえ　最低限の応急処置だとしても助かりました
ありがとうございます

dialogue_en:
You did an impressive job on those repairs.
Thank you all so much.
dialogue_jp:
みなさん　いい感じに修理してくださり
ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: Now that we've got some mako to spare, we can finally restore power to most homes. What a relief!
dialogue_jp:
おかげさまで　魔晄の供給が再開しました
いやはや　これでひと安心です

dialogue_en: Ah, you're back!
dialogue_jp: おお　みなさん

dialogue_en:
You must've done a real bang-up job out there.
Tank's practically full again!
dialogue_jp:
頑丈に修理していただいたみたいで
まことに　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en:
I don't think our supply's ever been this good.
We've more than enough for our needs!
dialogue_jp:
おかげさまで　魔晄がじゃぶじゃぶと
タンクに流れ始めました

dialogue_en:
Don't know what you did to that pipe,
but thank god you did!
dialogue_jp: 前より　勢いがよくなった気がします

dialogue_en:
Here, a little something for your troubles.
Please, I insist.
dialogue_jp:
では　こちらが報酬です
お納めください

dialogue_en: Oh, y'all must be the ones with Avalanche, right? Broden told me a little bit about ya.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　あんたらアバランチだろ？
宿屋のブロードから　話は聞いてるよ

dialogue_en: On the run from Shinra, eh?
dialogue_jp: うまく神羅から逃げてるみたいだな

dialogue_en: Hey. Glad to see Shinra hasn't caught you yet.
dialogue_jp: あんたらか　うまく逃げてるみたいだな

dialogue_en:
Seein' as you're here,
mind helpin' me with something?
dialogue_jp: ちょうど良かった　仕事を頼めないか

dialogue_en: I'm Oliver, by the way. Owner of this farm.
dialogue_jp: 俺はオリバー　ここの農場主だ

dialogue_en:
Got fiend trouble.
Every night it comes after my livestock.
dialogue_jp:
実は　夜な夜な
うちの家畜が襲われて困ってるんだ

dialogue_en:
Least I assume a fiend's to blame.
Think you could find and deal with it?
dialogue_jp:
犯人は　モンスターだろう
探し出して　退治してくれないか？

dialogue_en: What will you say?
dialogue_jp: 依頼を引き受けますか？

dialogue_en: What do you know about it?
dialogue_jp: モンスターの特徴は？

dialogue_en: How do you know Broden?
dialogue_jp: あんたとブロードの関係は？

dialogue_en: Sure, we'll deal with it.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en:
Not much, save the bastard's smart as hell.
Managed to evade every trap I've set.
dialogue_jp:
おそろしく頭のいいヤツさ
罠を仕掛けても　ものともしない

dialogue_en:
Even hired a hunter to get rid of it,
but that was a bust.
dialogue_jp: ハンターも雇ってるが　いまのところ成果ナシだ

dialogue_en: The ecosystem here is somethin' special─worth protectin'. Don't want Shinra messin' it up, and I'm not afraid to say so out loud.
dialogue_jp:
俺は　グラスランドの自然が大好きでね
守りたいと思えば　反神羅の旗を掲げることになる

dialogue_en: One day some like-minded folks came round.
dialogue_jp: そんな俺たちみたいのを　繋ぐヤツがいるのさ

dialogue_en: They put me in touch with Broden and Avalanche.
dialogue_jp:
ブロードやアバランチとは
その縁で知り合ったんだ

dialogue_en:
Impressive, the way that committee's
able to connect people.
dialogue_jp: 立場は違うけど　情報交換は欠かさないよ

dialogue_en: 'Preciate it!
dialogue_jp: 助かる

dialogue_en: That your dog there? Mind if I pet him?
dialogue_jp: そのワンちゃん　あんたが飼ってるのか？

dialogue_en: I don't...but he might.
dialogue_jp: 犬扱いは　やめたほうがいい

dialogue_en: Who's a good boy? It's you!
dialogue_jp: おお　よしよし　かわいいねえ

dialogue_en: Somethin' tells me he's not all bark! Hey, y'know, your pup might be able to track the fiend's scent.
dialogue_jp:
あはは　元気がいいな
犬の嗅覚なら　追跡できるかもしれない

dialogue_en: Maybe try sniffin' around the scene of the crime?
dialogue_jp: いちど　犯行現場を調べてみてくれないか？

dialogue_en: Truth be told, I'm one murdered animal away from losin' the whole farm. Goddamn fiends...
dialogue_jp:
これ以上　家畜が減ると
廃業もありえない話じゃない　まいるよ

dialogue_en: Shinra'd never cop to it...
dialogue_jp: 神羅は認めてないが

dialogue_en: but all these monsters wouldn't be runnin' around if it wasn't for their reactors.
dialogue_jp:
凶暴なモンスターが増えたのは
魔晄炉のせいに決まってる

dialogue_en: Here.
dialogue_jp: ここか

dialogue_en: This is it.
dialogue_jp: ここだね

dialogue_en: So?
dialogue_jp: わかるか？

dialogue_en: It's been several days since the attack, so the scent isn't fresh. Other animals have come and gone as well.
dialogue_jp:
犯行から数日経過しているな
生ぐさいほかの獣のニオイも混ざっている

dialogue_en: This won't be easy.
dialogue_jp: 追跡は難しいだろう

dialogue_en: The smell's really faded. Not sure how much help my nose is gonna be here.
dialogue_jp:
かなりニオイが消えちゃってる
追いかけるのは難しいかも

dialogue_en: Think a chocobo could handle it?
dialogue_jp: チョコボに嗅がせてみるか

dialogue_en:
Hmph. Their sense of smell is indeed impressive,
but this trail is still quite poor...
dialogue_jp:
ふん　チョコボの嗅覚が優れているとはいえ
これは無理だろう

dialogue_en: Though if you wish to try, I won't stop you.
dialogue_jp: ……が　試したいなら止めはしない

dialogue_en: It's worth a try. They might be able to pick up more than I can, but I wouldn't bet on it...
dialogue_jp:
やってみてもいいけど
チョコボの鼻でも　どうかなあ

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ！

dialogue_en: He's got something.
dialogue_jp: わかったみたいだぞ

dialogue_en: Wha─?
dialogue_jp: んん？

dialogue_en: What? Really?
dialogue_jp: えっ　ホント？

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ！

dialogue_en: Hmph... Well, I still have a faint impression of the scent. Together we can find the beast.
dialogue_jp:
ふん　私も見当はついている
答えあわせといこうか

dialogue_en: Wow... Not gonna lie, I couldn't smell anything. I had no idea chocobos were that good at tracking!
dialogue_jp:
へえ～　オイラはまったくわかんなかったのに
チョコボの嗅覚って　やっぱりすごいね

dialogue_en: There was a struggle here not long ago.
dialogue_jp: ここで新たな獲物を襲ったようだな

dialogue_en: Smells like a really fresh kill here.
dialogue_jp: ここでまた獲物を襲ったみたい

dialogue_en: You wanna track it from here on out?
dialogue_jp: 今度はレッドが調べてみるか？

dialogue_en: You wanna track it from here on out?
dialogue_jp: 今度はナナキが調べてみるか？

dialogue_en: No. The chocobo has led us this far, after all.
dialogue_jp: いや　まずはチョコボにまかせてみよう

dialogue_en: Nah... Think the chocobo's got this.
dialogue_jp: ううん　チョコボにまかせるよ

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ！

dialogue_en: I can help guide the bird─ensure it doesn't stray.
dialogue_jp: 私はチョコボが間違えないように　サポートしよう

dialogue_en: Well, I'm happy to lend my nose if needed!
dialogue_jp: オイラ　がんばってサポートするね

dialogue_en: Maybe a chocobo could track it.
dialogue_jp: チョコボに嗅がせてみるか

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ！

dialogue_en: There!
dialogue_jp: あいつだ

dialogue_en: Found 'em!
dialogue_jp: あいつ？

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: It's my sense of smell. Since my imprisonment in the Shinra Building, it hasn't been the same.
dialogue_jp:
神羅のビルに居たせいで
私の鼻は　すっかりなまってしまったらしい

dialogue_en: Before, I wouldn't have had any trouble tracking that scent. Now, though...
dialogue_jp:
私だけでは　ここまで追跡できなかっただろう
チョコボのおかげだ

dialogue_en: Tracking's always been kind of "my thing," but...I was worse than useless today.
dialogue_jp:
オイラ　なんの役にも立たなかった
鼻には自信があったのに

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ！

dialogue_en: Heh... Perhaps this bird is willing to take on an apprentice.
dialogue_jp: ふん　チョコボに弟子入りすべきかもな

dialogue_en: Thanks for trying to cheer me up.
dialogue_jp:
へへへ……
なぐさめてくれて　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Going to have to seriously step up my sniffing game if I'm ever gonna be a real Watcher.
dialogue_jp:
オイラ　立派な戦士になるためにも
この鼻から鍛え直すよ

dialogue_en:
You got him, didja? Made that bastard pay?
Nice goin'.
dialogue_jp:
おおそうか　倒してくれたか
大変だったろ

dialogue_en: And I bet you were a big help too, weren't ya!
dialogue_jp: もしかして　君が活躍してくれたのかな

dialogue_en: You'll be singing a different tune when you see what I got for ya.
dialogue_jp:
あはは　ご機嫌ナナメなワンちゃんに
ごほうびだ

dialogue_en: Here!
dialogue_jp: ほら！

dialogue_en: Don't worry, I didn't forget you.
dialogue_jp: こっちは　あんたへの報酬だ

dialogue_en: Changin' gears a bit, but...I heard Broden's not feeling so hot.
dialogue_jp: 話は変わるが　ブロードが体調を崩しているらしい

dialogue_en: If you swing by Kalm again, mind checkin' on him?
dialogue_jp:
もしカームに寄ることがあったら
見舞ってやってくれ

dialogue_en: Much as I wanna look in on Broden myself, I can't leave the farm unattended.
dialogue_jp:
俺も　ブロードの見舞いに行きたいんだが
家畜の世話が忙しくてね

dialogue_en: Bit of an ask, I know, but you mind checking on him?
dialogue_jp: 俺の代わりに　ブロードを見舞ってやってくれ

dialogue_en: We've gotta preserve what's left of the grasslands, y'know?
dialogue_jp: 俺は　グラスランドの自然を守りたいんだ

dialogue_en: Land won't last much longer if Shinra keeps doin' what they do.
dialogue_jp: 自然を守るためにも　神羅をなんとかしないと

dialogue_en: What─you found him where? Nibelheim?
dialogue_jp: そうか　ブロードはニブルにいるのか

dialogue_en: Can't believe Broden was mako poisoned this whole time... Goddamn Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
まさか魔晄中毒だったとは……
クソ　ぜんぶ神羅のせいだ

dialogue_en: Saw that broadcast outta Wutai. 'Bout time Shinra got a taste of their own medicine!
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの放送　見たか
ようやく神羅を叩きのめす時がきたんだ

dialogue_en: You're onboard, right? With the war.
dialogue_jp: もちろん　あんたらも参加するよな

dialogue_en: Hey, you think someone from Avalanche would know who to contact about joining the SRC?
dialogue_jp:
反神羅連絡会への参加方法は
アバランチに聞けばわかるかな

dialogue_en:
Oh, you're back...
I guess that means you managed to shake Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 君たちか　神羅をうまくまいたようだな

dialogue_en: Back again? Well, you're always welcome.
dialogue_jp: 君たちか　元気そうだな

dialogue_en: We heard that you've been feelin' under the weather lately.
dialogue_jp: あんたは　体調が良くないらしいな

dialogue_en:
Word gets around fast...
Didn't expect you to worry about me.
dialogue_jp: へえ　情報が早いな　心配してくれるのか
