dialogue_en: But since you're here...can I ask you a favor?
dialogue_jp: だったら　頼みを聞いてくれ

dialogue_en: A friend of mine wanted me to help her fix one of the old republic windmills, but...I'm in no condition to do that.
dialogue_jp:
知り合いに　風車の部品の仕入れを
頼まれていたんだが　この体調じゃ難しい

dialogue_en: Do you think...you could instead?
dialogue_jp: 代わりに　やってくれないか？

dialogue_en: I think we should help. If not for him, we'd probably be back in Hojo's lab.
dialogue_jp:
どうする　彼には世話になった
借りは返すべきだろう

dialogue_en: Let's help him out. I mean, he did save our skins when we were on the run from Shinra. We owe him.
dialogue_jp:
ほら　この街から逃げる時に助けてもらったし
恩は返さないと

dialogue_en: What will you say?
dialogue_jp: 依頼を引き受けますか？

dialogue_en: You don't look so good. What's wrong?
dialogue_jp: 体調は大丈夫なのか

dialogue_en: How involved with Shinra were you?
dialogue_jp: あんたと神羅の関係は？

dialogue_en: Why're you pissed at Shinra?
dialogue_jp: なぜ神羅と敵対している？

dialogue_en: We'll do it.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en: You know, headaches and dizziness.
dialogue_jp: 頭痛とめまいが　ひどくてね

dialogue_en: Probably my misspent youth. Paying the price for it now. Hindsight's twenty-twenty...
dialogue_jp:
若い頃に　色々無理をしたせいかな
ガタがきているのかもしれない

dialogue_en: Headaches and dizziness, huh...? Anything else?
dialogue_jp: 頭痛とめまい　ほかには？

dialogue_en: Sometimes I hear...voices, I guess? Calling for me─urging me to go somewhere.
dialogue_jp:
ときどき　声が……
私を呼ぶ声が　聞こえる気がするんだが

dialogue_en: Sounds pretty crazy, saying it aloud.
dialogue_jp: いや　なんでもない

dialogue_en: I was a company grunt years ago.
dialogue_jp: 若い頃は　軍に所属していた

dialogue_en: But when my parents died, I got out to take care of the family business. Been running the place ever since.
dialogue_jp:
両親が亡くなったのを機に
神羅を抜けて　家業を継いだってわけさ

dialogue_en: I'll spare you the grisly details, and just say they stole my life from me. My family. My home.
dialogue_jp:
話せば長くなる
簡潔に言えば　家族と故郷を奪われた

dialogue_en: Is that reason enough for you?
dialogue_jp: 恨むには　じゅうぶんな理由だろ

dialogue_en: But I thought Kalm was your home.
dialogue_jp: 故郷は　ここではないのか

dialogue_en: Wait... I thought Kalm was your home.
dialogue_jp: あれ　ここは故郷じゃないの？

dialogue_en: Not anymore. This isn't the Kalm I grew up in. My Kalm was destroyed by Shinra, and this? A soulless imitation...
dialogue_jp:
この街はいちど　神羅によって破壊されてる
再建されても　故郷という気はもうしない

dialogue_en: but I stayed, 'cause I won't let myself forget what those bastards took.
dialogue_jp: ここにいるのは　恨みつらみを忘れないためさ

dialogue_en: Hmph. Living in hate can poison a man.
dialogue_jp: ふん　不健康な生き方だ

dialogue_en: I...I can't even imagine how that must feel. C'mon, Cloud. Let's lend him a hand.
dialogue_jp:
つらいね　悔しいね
ねえクラウド　力になろうよ

dialogue_en: Thank you.
dialogue_jp: 助かる

dialogue_en: My friend's name is Mildred. You should be able to find her somewhere around the old settlement, out on the cliffside.
dialogue_jp:
詳しいことは　ミルドという女に聞いてくれ
海沿いの廃集落に住んでいる

dialogue_en: Look for the windmills.
dialogue_jp: 風車が目印だ

dialogue_en:
Oh, you're back...
I guess that means you managed to shake Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 君たちか　神羅をうまくまいたようだな

dialogue_en: You never know who might be a Shinra collaborator. Watch what you say and who you say it to.
dialogue_jp:
どこに神羅の関係者がいるかわからない
あまり目立たないようにな

dialogue_en: You're welcome to stay the night, if you want.
dialogue_jp: 休んでいくなら　歓迎するよ

dialogue_en: Sorry to put you to the trouble. Just to reiterate, my friend's name is Mildred. She's an odd duck, but a true sweetheart.
dialogue_jp:
すまんな　依頼人の名前はミルドだ
ちょっと変わってるが　悪いヤツじゃない

dialogue_en: I'll go ahead and tell her that...that help's on the way. Thanks again for doing this.
dialogue_jp:
ミルドには　凄腕が行くと伝えておこう
よろしく頼むよ

dialogue_en: Did Broden send you?
dialogue_jp: ブロードの友達？

dialogue_en: I'm glad for the company.
dialogue_jp: 来てくれて　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Ain't she a sight to behold?
dialogue_jp: どうだい　美しいだろ

dialogue_en:
A relic of the Republic of Junon.
Shinra can't make 'em like this, lemme tell ya.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代のものだ
神羅とは設計思想から違う

dialogue_en:
I'm itching to scrape the rust off─
get her moving again.
dialogue_jp: 私はこいつを　どうしても動かしてみたくてね

dialogue_en: Easier said than done, unfortunately. The rotor's missing a key component, one that's a bitch to find.
dialogue_jp:
それなのに　ピッチ制御用のギアだけが
どうしても手に入らないんだ

dialogue_en: Which is where you come in! I'm gonna need your help to get me that part.
dialogue_jp:
というわけで　君たちには
ギアを手に入れてきてもらいたい

dialogue_en: So, whaddya wanna know?
dialogue_jp: なにか　質問はあるかな？

dialogue_en: What do you want to know?
dialogue_jp: なにか　質問はあるかな？

dialogue_en: How to obtain the part.
dialogue_jp: ギアの入手方法

dialogue_en: What transmutation materials we need.
dialogue_jp: ギアを作るための素材

dialogue_en: How you know Broden.
dialogue_jp: ブロードとの関係

dialogue_en: What happened between Broden and Shinra.
dialogue_jp: ブロードは神羅でなにを？

dialogue_en: If Broden will get better.
dialogue_jp: ブロードは治るのか？

dialogue_en: Nothing. We're good.
dialogue_jp: 特にない

dialogue_en: Not through any shop, that's for sure. It's outta production, so you'll have to make it yourself.
dialogue_jp:
現在は生産されていない部品だ
アイテムクラフトで作れるはずだ

dialogue_en: But that oughta be easy for you, seein' as you already found the chip. Nice work. Broden was right to send you my way.
dialogue_jp:
おっ　すでにクラフトチップは持ってるみたいだね
さすがブロードの友達　優秀じゃないか

dialogue_en: Now all that's left to do is put that transmuter of yours to work.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　次は
レシピどおりの素材を集めてきてくれ

dialogue_en: So, first things first...the transmuter chip.
dialogue_jp:
まずは　クラフトチップを
手に入れるところからだね

dialogue_en: Once you got that squared away, it should be as easy as poppin' in the materials ya need. Piece of cake, right?
dialogue_jp:
レシピがわかれば　そのあと
素材をそろえてクラフトするだけさ　簡単だろ？

dialogue_en: Perhaps I can be of service.
dialogue_jp: お話はうかがっていました

dialogue_en: If you wish to learn more about the Republic of Junon, I recommend visiting lifesprings.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代の情報でしたら
ライフスポットを解析してみてください

dialogue_en: The knowledge they contain will reveal the location of transmuter chips...
dialogue_jp:
クラフトチップが眠る場所や
ほかにも　色々とわかるはずです

dialogue_en: as well as other points of interest. I hope that helps your search!
dialogue_jp:
というわけで　ワールドレポートの調査
よろしくお願いしますね！

dialogue_en: Okay. Lifesprings it is.
dialogue_jp: ライフスポットの解析を進めよう

dialogue_en: Fine by me. Only fitting that we learn the history of the planet as we seek to cross her.
dialogue_jp:
草原を駆け巡りながら
いにしえの知識を探索するのも悪くない

dialogue_en: Oh boy! An adventure! C'mon!
dialogue_jp: おさんぽ　おさんぽ　おっさんぽ～！

dialogue_en: So, first things first...the transmuter chip.
dialogue_jp:
まずは　クラフトチップを
手に入れるところからだね

dialogue_en: Once you got that squared away, it should be as easy as poppin' in the materials ya need. Piece of cake, right?
dialogue_jp:
レシピがわかれば　そのあと
素材をそろえてクラフトするだけさ　簡単だろ？

dialogue_en: Right. Let's check some lifesprings.
dialogue_jp: ライフスポットの解析を進めよう

dialogue_en: Step one was scoring a transmuter chip─which you did. So now we put that baby to work.
dialogue_jp:
クラフトチップは見つけたようだね
じゃあ次は　アイテムクラフトだ

dialogue_en: As for the ingredients...you'll need to bag the quetzalcoatl─this rare bird─to get what you need.
dialogue_jp:
必要な素材は　グラスランドに生息する
ケツァルコアトルという鳥から採れるんだが

dialogue_en: Huh? Oh, you already procured the stuff? Well, aren't you an efficient one. In that case, only thing left to do is to transmute the part.
dialogue_jp:
なんだ　すでに素材はそろってるじゃないか
あとはアイテムクラフトでギアを作るだけだよ

dialogue_en: Not that anyone's seen it lately. Sure Shinra's to blame for that too...but maybe you'll have better luck.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉の影響か　最近は見かけなくてね
どうだい　探せそうかい？

dialogue_en: Time to tap into some lifesprings.
dialogue_jp: ライフスポットの解析を進めよう

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: うん

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: We go way back... Like, way back.
dialogue_jp: ふむ　いわゆる幼馴染みというやつだな

dialogue_en: The two of us skipped town when we were young, y'know. Thought we'd experience what the world had to offer.
dialogue_jp:
ふたりとも　若い頃に街を出てね
世界中の風景を見てまわったよ

dialogue_en: Eventually, we went our separate ways. He joined the military, and I became an engineer.
dialogue_jp:
それから彼は神羅軍に入隊し
私はエンジニアになったというわけだ

dialogue_en: Well, turned out he was a natural-born trooper.
dialogue_jp: 優秀な兵士として　活躍していたみたいだよ

dialogue_en: Was even handpicked to take part in a "supersecret" experiment. It wasn't long after that we lost contact.
dialogue_jp:
しばらくして　なにか特別な実験に参加すると言って
連絡が取れなくなってね

dialogue_en:
By the time we reconnected,
he'd already put that life behind him.
dialogue_jp: 再会した時には　彼は神羅を抜けていた

dialogue_en: What "experiment"?
dialogue_jp: なんの実験だ？

dialogue_en: Have to ask him...though I doubt he'd tell you.
dialogue_jp: さあ　詳しくは教えてくれない

dialogue_en: Certainly won't tell me, at any rate. Whatever they did to him, though, has somethin' to do with his condition. I just know it.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　彼の体調の悪化は
その実験の後遺症ではないかと私は考えている

dialogue_en: He's been to doctor after doctor, but all the tests come back inconclusive.
dialogue_jp:
医者にも診てもらったようだが
原因がわからないらしい

dialogue_en: So I'm digging through old republic archives, looking for something that might help─something a doctor might overlook.
dialogue_jp:
私も　かつて失われた技術の中に
治療方法がないかと調べているんだが

dialogue_en: Just hope I find what he needs soon...
dialogue_jp: いまのところ　おてあげだ

dialogue_en: Windmill's countin' on ya, friend.
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　よろしく頼むよ

dialogue_en: Magnificent, isn't it? A republic original.
dialogue_jp: 共和国の風車だ　美しいだろ

dialogue_en: If only there were some way to get it moving again.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　なんとか動かせないものか

dialogue_en: So, what d'ya wanna know?
dialogue_jp: なにか　質問はあるかな？

dialogue_en: Excellent! It seems you've found the transmuter chip.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん
いま発見されたクラフトチップが

dialogue_en: With it, you'll be able to create the item Mildred needs.
dialogue_jp:
ミルドさんが探されている
『風車のギア』のレシピです

dialogue_en: You need only collect the requisite materials and craft the part.
dialogue_jp:
あとは　レシピどおりの素材をそろえて
作るだけですね

dialogue_en: If you're having trouble tracking them down, then you may want to try analyzing more lifesprings.
dialogue_jp:
もし　素材が見つからない場合は
ライフスポットの解析を進めてみてください

dialogue_en: That's quite the transmuter chip you've found.
dialogue_jp: 珍しいクラフトチップを発見しましたね

dialogue_en: In fact, it was once used in the construction of windmills.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代に使われていた
風車の部品が　作れるようです

dialogue_en: Given its rarity, I would not be surprised if someone had need of such technology.
dialogue_jp:
現在は入手困難な部品なので
もしかしたら　誰か探されているかもしれません

dialogue_en: Confirmed: quetzalcoatl defeated.
dialogue_jp: ケツァルコアトルの討伐を確認しました

dialogue_en: Amazing work as always, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: コングラチュレーション　クラウド様！

dialogue_en: Your heroic victory over that vicious creature was a feast for the eyes!
dialogue_jp:
皆様の勇姿　わたくし
しかと目に焼きつけましたよ

dialogue_en: I suppose it falls to me to make MAI's presence more tolerable.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん　ＭＡＩがうるさかったら
いつでも言ってくださいね

dialogue_en: How do you─ Volume levels decreasing!? Wait!
dialogue_jp:
あれ？
音量が小さく……ちょっと――

dialogue_en: Now then, allow me to congratulate you on your victory over that beast...
dialogue_jp:
あらためましてクラウドさん
モンスターの討伐　ご苦労様でした

dialogue_en: and thank you for the valuable biological data!
dialogue_jp: おかげさまで　貴重な生体データが手に入りました

dialogue_en: You were likewise able to obtain something of great import: the beast's talon!
dialogue_jp:
それと　入手された『ケツァルコアトルの爪』は
とても珍しい素材です

dialogue_en: I suspect that it can be used in the creation of something astounding!
dialogue_jp:
クラフトで　使えるかもしれません
なくさないようにしてくださいね

dialogue_en: You should now be able to craft the requisite part for the windmill.
dialogue_jp: それに　これで『風車のギア』を作成できますね

dialogue_en: No doubt Mildred is impatiently awaiting its delivery.
dialogue_jp:
早速クラフトして
ミルドさんに届けてあげましょう

dialogue_en: Hand over the gear?
dialogue_jp: 風車のギアを渡しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: 渡す

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: 渡さない

dialogue_en: Now that is a quality design! No Shinra knockoffs can compare to republic ingenuity!
dialogue_jp:
おお　すばらしい！
やっぱり共和国スタイルの部品は美しいなあ

dialogue_en: Okay, time to see if she works!
dialogue_jp: 早速　風車にセットしてみよう

dialogue_en: Hahaha! Hot damn, look at that!
dialogue_jp: わははは　きたきたきた～！

dialogue_en: It's amazing─incredible! Wow...
dialogue_jp: すごいすごいすごい　見てくれ！

dialogue_en: The blades are spinning─actually spinning! What a sight!
dialogue_jp:
海風を受けてブレードがまわっている
興奮する～！

dialogue_en: Oh, I can't wait to find out how much power it can generate!
dialogue_jp: あとは　どれぐらいエネルギーを生み出せるかだな

dialogue_en: I wish Broden was here for this. He'd've loved to see these windmills running again. Maybe one day.
dialogue_jp:
願わくば　昔みたいにブロードといっしょに
この光景を見たかったんだがな

dialogue_en: Well, anyway...thank you. You've helped me fulfill a dream of mine.
dialogue_jp:
とにかく　ありがとう
夢がひとつ叶ったよ

dialogue_en: Guess you're heading back to Kalm?
dialogue_jp: これから　カームへ戻るのかい

dialogue_en: That's the plan.
dialogue_jp: そのつもりだ

dialogue_en: When you see Broden, you tell him...
dialogue_jp: ブロードに会ったら　伝えてくれ

dialogue_en: "Hurry up an' get better, wouldja? We got a whole wide world to see..." Or, something along those lines.
dialogue_jp:
『さっさと体調を治せ
　そして　いつかまた旅に出よう』ってね

dialogue_en: I wish Broden was here for this. He'd've loved to see these windmills running again. Maybe one day.
dialogue_jp:
願わくば　昔みたいにブロードといっしょに
この光景を見たかったんだがな

dialogue_en: When you see Broden, you tell him...
dialogue_jp: ブロードに会ったら　伝えてくれ

dialogue_en: "Hurry up an' get better, wouldja? We got a whole wide world to see..." Or, something along those lines.
dialogue_jp:
『さっさと体調を治せ
　そしていつかまた　旅に出よう』ってね

dialogue_en: Something about republic tech just speaks to me...
dialogue_jp: やはり　共和国の技術は面白いなあ

dialogue_en: But when it comes to energy output, it can't hold a candle to mako.
dialogue_jp:
さすがに　魔晄と比べれば
エネルギー変換率はおとるか

dialogue_en: Once I figure out how these windmills work, I bet I can get even more old tech running!
dialogue_jp:
風車のデータをとったら
次は　なにを蘇らせようかな

dialogue_en: Imagine combining Junon engineering with Shinra's. I mean, the possibilities'd be endless!
dialogue_jp:
共和国と神羅の技術のいいところどりができたら
すばらしいと思わないかい？

dialogue_en: Oh...so Broden's getting treatment near Nibelheim, huh?
dialogue_jp: なるほど　ブロードはニブルで療養中か

dialogue_en: Guess I'll just have to keep those travel plans of ours on the back burner.
dialogue_jp: いっしょに旅に出るのは　しばらくおあずけだな

dialogue_en: That so...? If Mildred's happy, I'm happy.
dialogue_jp:
そうか
ミルドのやつ　はしゃいでたろ

dialogue_en: She said you've got a world to see.
dialogue_jp: 『また旅に出よう』と伝えろと

dialogue_en:
She just wants an excuse to travel.
But...I am overdue for a vacation.
dialogue_jp:
そりゃ楽しみだ
ずっと　働きづめだったからな

dialogue_en: Think I've been working myself too hard lately.
dialogue_jp: 思いきって　長期休暇もいいかもな

dialogue_en: Rest would do you good.
dialogue_jp: そうしたほうがいい

dialogue_en: Yeah... Think some rest would do you good.
dialogue_jp: うん　そうだね

dialogue_en:
What is this terrible scent?
It's reminiscent of...Hojo's lab.
dialogue_jp:
ひどく嫌なニオイがする
まるで宝条の実験室にいた――

dialogue_en:
Do you smell that? It's terrible...
and it reminds me of...Hojo's lab?
dialogue_jp:
あのね　すごく嫌なニオイがするんだ
まるで宝条の実験室にいた――

dialogue_en: It's time... Time to go. To leave...
dialogue_jp:
旅だ……
そうだな　旅に出ないと

dialogue_en: It's time... Time to go. To leave...
dialogue_jp:
旅だ……
そうだな　旅に出ないと

dialogue_en: Urng... Eh... Uh...
dialogue_jp: うう　ああ……

dialogue_en: Aaah...hih... Aaah!
dialogue_jp: うう　ああ……

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫か？

dialogue_en: It's just...the degradation. Every SOLDIER's gotta make their peace with it.
dialogue_jp:
元ソルジャーの宿命さ
いわゆる……劣化だ

dialogue_en: Now you know why I can't see any old doctor.
dialogue_jp: だから　普通の医者にはわからない

dialogue_en: You're a SOLDIER too, aren't you?
dialogue_jp: おまえも　ソルジャーなんだろ

dialogue_en: Ex-SOLDIER, actually.
dialogue_jp: 元ソルジャーだ

dialogue_en: Didn't mean to scare you. The symptoms aren't always the same. And who knows? You might be one of the lucky ones...
dialogue_jp:
悪いな　不安にさせるつもりはなかった
それに必ずこうなるわけじゃない

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Just...don't take your youth for granted, alright?
dialogue_jp: まだ若いんだ　まっすぐ生きろ

dialogue_en: You only get one shot at life...and you can't let Shinra take it from you. You can't let them win.
dialogue_jp:
やりたいことをやれ
神羅の呪縛に屈するものか　なあ？

dialogue_en: Need to rest...get my strength up. So I can see Mildred's windmills.
dialogue_jp:
ミルドの風車を見るためにも
はやく体を治さないとな

dialogue_en: People love to spread rumors about SOLDIERs. Don't you pay them any mind.
dialogue_jp:
ソルジャーには　いろんな噂がある
いちいち気にするな

dialogue_en: I'd heard the rumors about cellular degradation, but didn't believe 'em. Didn't want to believe 'em─till I had no choice.
dialogue_jp:
劣化の噂は聞いていたが　正直なところ
実際に襲われるまで　信じていなかったんだ

dialogue_en: I left the service to keep this place and my parents' memory alive. I'll be damned if I lose it too 'cause of this...illness.
dialogue_jp:
軍から抜けて再開した宿屋だ
病気なんかで　たたむわけにはいかない

dialogue_en:
Oh, you're looking for Broden?
I'm sorry, but he's not here at the moment.
dialogue_jp:
申し訳ありません
オーナーのブロードは　ただいま不在です

dialogue_en:
Where in the world could he have gone...
And when's he coming back?
dialogue_jp:
はあ……
ブロードさん　どこ行っちゃったんだろ

dialogue_en:
Well hello.
You must be the friends Broden mentioned.
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃいませ
ブロードさんから　話は聞いております

dialogue_en: The Avalanche friends?
dialogue_jp: アバランチの　みなさんですよね

dialogue_en: I'm so glad you're here.
dialogue_jp: いいところにいらっしゃいました

dialogue_en:
The truth is, Broden's gone.
Just...up and vanished.
dialogue_jp:
実は……ブロードさんが
突然いなくなってしまいまして

dialogue_en: So could you take on a bit of unfinished business?
dialogue_jp: かわりに　仕事を引き受けていただきたいのです

dialogue_en: An old friend of Broden's, Mildred, came by hoping to get his help.
dialogue_jp:
依頼人は　オーナーの知り合いで
ミルドさんという方です

dialogue_en: Not sure what for, so best to ask her yourself. She mentioned she'd be out near the windmills─on the cliffside.
dialogue_jp:
海沿いにある　風車のところにいらっしゃるので
詳しいことは彼女から聞いてください

dialogue_en: I'm not sure what she wants, but Mildred said she'd be out near the windmills on the cliffside. Try there first.
dialogue_jp:
詳しいことは　ミルドさんに聞いてください
海沿いにある風車が目印です

dialogue_en: Between you and me, I'm worried about Broden. I've never seen him this...tired.
dialogue_jp:
オーナー　最近はずっと体調が悪かったので
すこし心配です

dialogue_en: Mildred and Broden grew up together, were thick as thieves at one point...and got into all kinds of trouble, to hear people tell it.
dialogue_jp:
ミルドさんとオーナーは　幼馴染みなんです
ふたりとも　昔はヤンチャだったと聞いてます

dialogue_en: Hello there!
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ

dialogue_en: Broden has, uh, stepped out and may not be back anytime soon, but he's brought me up to speed.
dialogue_jp:
ただいま　オーナーのブロードが不在のため
わたくしが代わりに承っております

dialogue_en: So has Mildred, actually.
dialogue_jp: ミルドさんから聞きました

dialogue_en: I understand that you helped her out with her work. That was very kind of you.
dialogue_jp:
なんでも　オーナーの代わりに
仕事を引き受けてくださったとか

dialogue_en: And I know that Mildred appreciates it too.
dialogue_jp: 助かりました　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: It may not be much, but...we'd like you to have this.
dialogue_jp:
こちら　報酬です
お受け取りください

dialogue_en: You're back! I just heard from Mildred. Can't believe she really got the windmill working again.
dialogue_jp:
みなさん　ミルドさんから聞きました
無事　風車が動いたみたいですね

dialogue_en:
Sounded like you were a big help too.
Thank you.
dialogue_jp: 本当に助かりました　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: This isn't much, but to show our gratitude...
dialogue_jp:
こちら　報酬です
お受け取りください

dialogue_en: I'm sure Broden will make it a point to thank you himself once he gets back.
dialogue_jp:
あとは　オーナーが
無事に帰ってくればいいのですが

dialogue_en: Whenever that is...but in the meantime, we have things under control.
dialogue_jp:
それまでは我々スタッフで
この宿を　守っていこうと思います

dialogue_en: Broden would've wanted to see the windmills in motion, I'm sure...
dialogue_jp:
オーナーも　ミルドさんの風車
見たかったでしょうね

dialogue_en: I won't let this place fall by the wayside while Broden's away. I'll keep it running somehow.
dialogue_jp:
オーナーがいない間は　わたくしがしっかり
お客様をおもてなしします

dialogue_en: "Beck's Business"? Never heard of it.
dialogue_jp:
ベグカンパニー？
聞いたことねえぞ

dialogue_en: Wait, what? Somebody's hiring?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　仕事もらえるのか？

dialogue_en: "Accepting Applications"? Dunno if I'd wanna work for them.
dialogue_jp:
あやしいなあ
応募する人　いるのかな

dialogue_en: Uh, what's up with those guys?
dialogue_jp: なになに　なんの騒ぎ？

dialogue_en: They running a business or a racket?
dialogue_jp: あの人たちって　ワルモノよね

dialogue_en: So...would it be okay to work in Midgar?
dialogue_jp: え～っと　ミッドガルで就職できるの？

dialogue_en: Step right up! Beck's Business is hiring, and we want you!
dialogue_jp:
は～い　ベグカンパニーの面接会場は
こちらで～す

dialogue_en: We're a respectable company that offers great job security─and our salaries are nothin' to sneeze at!
dialogue_jp:
ベグカンパニーは　安心安全の優良企業
キューリョーもタンマリもらえるぞ

dialogue_en: Nobody sneezes on our sal─sel─celeries!
dialogue_jp:
は～い
キューリョー　キューリョー！

dialogue_en: Wait, why d'we got celery?
dialogue_jp:
うん？
キューリョーってなんだ

dialogue_en: It's "salary," and it's the cash you get paid when gainfully employed by a company like ours!
dialogue_jp:
バカだな　キューリョーってのはな
社員がもらえるカネのことだよ

dialogue_en: Wow, that's so cool! We get money for doin' work!
dialogue_jp:
おお　それがキューリョーか
いいな　キューリョー！

dialogue_en: Uh, but Boss? I don't get paid any money for workin' here.
dialogue_jp:
うん？
オレ　キューリョーもらってないぞ

dialogue_en: That's because, as president, I'm hangin' on to your salary. Y'know, for safekeepin'.
dialogue_jp:
あ～　おまえのキューリョーは
社長が預かってるから　安心しろ

dialogue_en: Gather round, folks! Beck's Business is looking for new talent!
dialogue_jp:
は～い　ベグカンパニーは
社員をボシュー中で～す

dialogue_en: Come work with us! We're a happy family!
dialogue_jp:
ユカイな仲間といっしょに
働きませんか～

dialogue_en: Come on down to Beck's Business for all your fiend-slaying needs!
dialogue_jp:
モンスター退治なら
ベグカンパニーにおまかせ！

dialogue_en: Heh heh!
dialogue_jp: うおおおおお！

dialogue_en: Well, look who it is!
dialogue_jp: おお　おまえら！

dialogue_en: "Beck's Business"?
dialogue_jp: ベグカンパニー？

dialogue_en: That's right, buddy!
dialogue_jp: そのとおり

dialogue_en: And right now, we just so happen to be looking to hire new talent.
dialogue_jp: しかも　ベグカンパニーは社員募集中だ！

dialogue_en: Say, since you're here, how about I pencil you in for an interview? Sound good?
dialogue_jp:
おお　そうだ
おまえらも面接を受けてけよ　なあ？

dialogue_en: Ooh, yeah! Sign 'em up, Boss!
dialogue_jp: おお　いいな～それ

dialogue_en: So, you gonna get penciled!?
dialogue_jp: メンセツ　メンセツ！

dialogue_en: Hell no!
dialogue_jp: 受けるかよ！

dialogue_en: So, prospective employee.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　始めるぞ

dialogue_en: First things first: what is your full name?
dialogue_jp: まずは　名前を聞かせてもらおうか？

dialogue_en: What is your full name?
dialogue_jp: 名前を聞かせてもらおうか

dialogue_en: Cloud Strife.
dialogue_jp: クラウド・ストライフ

dialogue_en: Not answering that.
dialogue_jp: 答えない

dialogue_en: Cloud Strife.
dialogue_jp: クラウド・ストライフ

dialogue_en: Seriously?
dialogue_jp: 答えんのかよ！

dialogue_en: "Cloud Strife"... Nice name. Real poetic.
dialogue_jp:
『くらうど・すとらいふ』と
かっこいい名前じゃねえか

dialogue_en: Hm... Applicant has a "rebellious disposition"...
dialogue_jp: ふむふむ　『反抗的態度アリ』と

dialogue_en: Next up, I'm gonna need your employment history.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　次は
ケーレキを教えてもらおうか

dialogue_en: What is your employment history?
dialogue_jp: ケーレキを教えてもらおうか

dialogue_en: I'm ex-SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: 元ソルジャーだ

dialogue_en: Done odd jobs for people.
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋だ

dialogue_en: Not answering that.
dialogue_jp: 答えない

dialogue_en: Ooh, doesn't get much more prestigious than that, does it?
dialogue_jp: それはそれは　すばらしいケーレキですね

dialogue_en: Explains why you're so strong too.
dialogue_jp: どーりで　強えワケだ

dialogue_en: Aha! A merc, you say? That mean you're willin' to do anything so long as the pay's good?
dialogue_jp:
ほほう～　なんでも屋
つまり　ナンデモやってくれるワケか

dialogue_en: You'll go far in the corporate world.
dialogue_jp: せいぜい　コキ使ってやるぜ

dialogue_en: Uh-huh. "Unemployed" then...
dialogue_jp: ふむふむ　『無職』と

dialogue_en: As you know, we here at Beck's Business make a living by slaying fiends and keeping folks safe.
dialogue_jp:
え～　我がベグカンパニーは
モンスター退治をナリワイにしているワケだが

dialogue_en: If you were to join us, what sort of skills would you bring to the table?
dialogue_jp: キミは　どのようにコーケンしてくれるのかな？

dialogue_en: What would you bring to the table?
dialogue_jp: どのようにコーケンしてくれるのかな？

dialogue_en: Pest control.
dialogue_jp: モンスターを倒す

dialogue_en: Guerrilla marketing.
dialogue_jp: 広告塔になる

dialogue_en: Comic relief.
dialogue_jp: 場をなごませる

dialogue_en: Not answering that.
dialogue_jp: 答えない

dialogue_en: Oh yeah, I can vouch for him on that one, Mr. President. This guy'll mash monsters in seconds flat!
dialogue_jp:
シャチョー　こいつの腕は間違いナシです
ソクセンリョクとして雇うべきかと

dialogue_en: Yeah, just like he did to us!
dialogue_jp: オレたち　ボコボコにされたもんな

dialogue_en: Ohoho! In that case, maybe we'll have you hold up a sign and sing a little jingle for us!
dialogue_jp:
おお　そんじゃあ
カンバン持って　宣伝ソングでも歌ってもらうか

dialogue_en: "Don't need to beg, just call up Beck at Beck's Business!" or somethin'.
dialogue_jp: ベグベグ　ベグベグ　ベグカンパニ～ってな

dialogue_en: That so? You don't look funny.
dialogue_jp: おお　意外だ

dialogue_en: And that's why he gets laughs.
dialogue_jp: こりゃあ　傑作だ！

dialogue_en: Hm... Applicant has an "uncharitable spirit"...
dialogue_jp: ふむふむ　『コーケンする気はナシ』と

dialogue_en: Let me just confer with my associates.
dialogue_jp: なるほど　なるほど

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: おい！

dialogue_en: We can get this shlub to do all the heavy lifting for us!
dialogue_jp:
ちょうど　モンスターが倒せなくて
困ってたところだ

dialogue_en: Our monster troubles are over, boys!
dialogue_jp: あいつにぜんぶ　まかしちまおうぜ

dialogue_en: After thorough deliberation, our council has decided to approve your candidacy. Congratulations!
dialogue_jp:
ゲンセンな話し合いをした結果
見事サイヨーとなりました　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: Congratulations!
dialogue_jp: おめでとう！

dialogue_en: You can did it!
dialogue_jp: オメデト！

dialogue_en: Crngrtrlrtrns!
dialogue_jp: フガメデトォオ！

dialogue_en: We've been holding out hope for a qualified applicant, and your accomplishments speak for themselves, Mr. Strife.
dialogue_jp:
ケーレキも能力も申し分ナシ
我々は　キミのようなジンザイを待っていた

dialogue_en: Indeed, I think you have the potential to become a mentor to your new colleagues.
dialogue_jp:
ぜひ　ほかの社員のお手本となって
引っぱっていってくれたまえ

dialogue_en: Welcome to the BB family!
dialogue_jp: よろしく頼んだぞ

dialogue_en: Some might call you "surly," but I can tell you're just shy.
dialogue_jp:
ちょっとばかし不愛想なところが
むしろチャーミング

dialogue_en: And I have full confidence your superiors will help get you outta that shell in no time.
dialogue_jp:
これからは　センパイたちを見習って
しっかりと働いてくれたまえ

dialogue_en: Welcome to the family!
dialogue_jp: よろしく頼んだぞ

dialogue_en: Hold up. He didn't say a damn thing and he still got the job?
dialogue_jp: ああ？　なんにも答えてなかったろうが

dialogue_en:
We're not lookin' for a yes-man,
and a man's better than no man!
dialogue_jp:
そのコビない姿勢
ハンコツセーシンが気に入った

dialogue_en: Besides, he's all-business, and so are we. It ain't called "Beck's Business" for nothin'!
dialogue_jp:
我が社に入っても　そのまま群れることなく
のしあがってくれたまえ

dialogue_en: I'm your superior, and you're my you-perior!
dialogue_jp:
オレ　センパイ
オマエ　コウハイ！

dialogue_en: We've got some big expectations for you, rookie!
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと　センパイを見習ってがんばれよ

dialogue_en: Okay! Now that the formalities are outta the way, it's time for your first assignment.
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　んじゃあさっそく
モンスター退治を手伝ってもらおうか

dialogue_en: There's an old highway on the outskirts of town.
dialogue_jp: 場所は　街ハズレの廃道だ

dialogue_en: Go on ahead─and prep for battle while you're at it. We've got some, uh, paperwork.
dialogue_jp:
おら　シンジンは先に行って
モンスターと戦う準備をしてこい

dialogue_en: You ain't serious about this, are you?
dialogue_jp: おまえ　本気か？

dialogue_en: Ain't I always serious?
dialogue_jp: そう言われると困る

dialogue_en: Never know. Could be a nice change of pace.
dialogue_jp: なんだ……息抜きかもな

dialogue_en: You gonna start wearin' a mask too?
dialogue_jp: そんな理由で就職すんな！

dialogue_en: I want ya to take care of some monsters on the old highway outside of town.
dialogue_jp:
依頼は　街ハズレの廃道に出る
モンスターの掃除だ

dialogue_en: Our company's rep is on the line, so don't screw it up.
dialogue_jp: ベグカンパニーの一員として　しっかり働けよ

dialogue_en: This "business" stuff is harder than it looks. We ain't been doin' so hot.
dialogue_jp:
実はオレたち　カンパニーになったものの
シッパイしっぱなしでよ

dialogue_en: Hiring you was the only thing we've done right!
dialogue_jp: おまえがきてくれて　助かったぜ

dialogue_en: Idiot! Don't tell 'em that!
dialogue_jp: おい　バラすんじゃねえ！

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: I'm superior to your-perior!
dialogue_jp: ブッチョセンパイって　呼んでくれてもいいぞ

dialogue_en: I super ee-or too.
dialogue_jp: ボンザ　センパイ

dialogue_en: On behalf of Beck's Business, let's get to work.
dialogue_jp: ベグカンパニーの仕事といくか

dialogue_en: Hey, newbie! How's it lookin' over there?
dialogue_jp:
お～い　シンジンども
どんな感じだ～？

dialogue_en: You done with our work?
dialogue_jp: もう倒しちまったか？

dialogue_en: He ain't done shit!
dialogue_jp: って　まだいるじゃねえか！

dialogue_en: Goddammit. Was hopin' they'd be dead.
dialogue_jp: チキショウ　来んのが早すぎた

dialogue_en: Go on─get 'em, rookie!
dialogue_jp: シンジン　やっちまえ～！

dialogue_en: Hey! Work harder, dammit!
dialogue_jp: おら　働け働け！

dialogue_en: You better pull your weight, rookie!
dialogue_jp: やっちまえ　シンジンども！

dialogue_en: Show those uglies how Beck's Business does it!
dialogue_jp: ベグカンパニーの意地　見せてやれ

dialogue_en: Not half bad, rookie!
dialogue_jp: やるじゃねえか　シンジン

dialogue_en: Looks like you got things pretty well handled.
dialogue_jp: センパイの出番はなさそうだな

dialogue_en: Mop the floor with 'em!
dialogue_jp: 片付けちまえ！

dialogue_en: Fight! Fight! Fight!
dialogue_jp: コウハイ　ファイト～！

dialogue_en: We got your back!
dialogue_jp: オレたちがついてるぞ

dialogue_en: Kill 'em!
dialogue_jp: ガンバレー！

dialogue_en: Gar!
dialogue_jp: うおお！

dialogue_en: Kill! Kill!
dialogue_jp: フガんばれー！

dialogue_en: Go! Go!
dialogue_jp: ンゴー　ンゴー！

dialogue_en: You showed 'em who's boss!
dialogue_jp: よくやった　おまえら

dialogue_en: And as your boss, I'll keep that in mind during your performance evalua... Huh?
dialogue_jp:
その調子で　我がベグカンパニーに
コーケンして――

dialogue_en: Look who it is: Beck's Buttmunches!
dialogue_jp: やっと見つけたぜ　ベグ盗賊団！

dialogue_en: What'd you say!?
dialogue_jp: てめえら！

dialogue_en:
You ran outta Midgar so fast
we didn't get to say goodbye.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルから逃げ出して
なにをしてるかと思えば

dialogue_en: Heard you went straight and started a business.
dialogue_jp: 足を洗って　会社を作ったって言うじゃねえか

dialogue_en: So me and the boys thought we oughta pay you a visit─celebrate this exciting new venture of yours!
dialogue_jp:
だからよ　ベグカンパニーの設立を祝うために
わざわざ来てやったぜ

dialogue_en: It'll be a party.
dialogue_jp: 覚悟はいいか！

dialogue_en: Aah!
dialogue_jp: ひゃあ！

dialogue_en: Well, ain't that thoughtful. Okay─let's do it!
dialogue_jp: おうおう　やってやろうじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Hey, you! Rookie!
dialogue_jp: おい　シンジンども！

dialogue_en: Get the party started!
dialogue_jp: ここは　まかせた！

dialogue_en: Yeah, start it!
dialogue_jp: まかせた～！

dialogue_en: I love parties!
dialogue_jp: マカセタ！

dialogue_en: Hrng grah!
dialogue_jp: ふんがふんが！

dialogue_en:
Get ready, 'cause you're finally
gonna get what's comin' to ya!
dialogue_jp:
てめえら　これまでの借り
返させてもらうぜ！

dialogue_en: I don't even know who the hell you are!
dialogue_jp: オレたちゃ　関係ねえだろうが！

dialogue_en: Hahaha! That's whatcha get for thinkin' you can go toe-to-toe with big business!
dialogue_jp:
ハッハッハ！
どうよ　これがベグカンパニーの力よ

dialogue_en: You're nothing but a sellout!
dialogue_jp: なにが　カンパニーだよ

dialogue_en: Huh!? What'd you say to me?
dialogue_jp: ええ　なんか言ったか？

dialogue_en: We're supposed to be rebels!
dialogue_jp: オレたちは　アウトローだろうが！

dialogue_en:
Folks didn't want nothin' to do with us.
They kicked us to the curb─spit in our faces!
dialogue_jp:
スラムのやつらにも爪弾きにされて
笑われて　バカにされて

dialogue_en: And that's exactly what set us free!
dialogue_jp: それでも　自由に生きてきたじゃねえか

dialogue_en: But you─you lost your way after blondie whooped your ass!
dialogue_jp:
なのに　強えヤツに負けたからって
逃げ出しやがってよ

dialogue_en: When we get knocked down, we don't cut and run. We play dead and live to fight another day!
dialogue_jp:
何度負けたって　死んだフリをして
しぶとく生き残んのがオレたちだろ！

dialogue_en: "Business"? More like "bullshit"! Now you're just fallin' in line! You ain't outlaws.
dialogue_jp:
カンパニー？　ふざけんな
なんにも縛られないのがアウトローだろうがよ

dialogue_en: You're in-laws!
dialogue_jp: 目え覚ませよ！

dialogue_en: Boss?
dialogue_jp: アニキ……

dialogue_en: I don't wanna be in-laws!
dialogue_jp: オレたち　やっぱり

dialogue_en: Heh... Well ain't that some shit. One taste of civil society and I almost lost my edge.
dialogue_jp:
ふっ　オレとしたことが
いつの間にか　まるく収まろうとしてたみてえだな

dialogue_en: Listen up, boys!
dialogue_jp: おい　てめえら！

dialogue_en: Effective today, Beck's Business is closed!
dialogue_jp: ベグカンパニーは　今日をもって廃業だ

dialogue_en: And in its place, I'll be forming Beck's Bikers─a band of outlaws born to rule the open road!
dialogue_jp:
そして新たに　世界をまたにかけるアウトロー
『ベグライダーズ』の設立を宣言する！

dialogue_en: Yeah, Boss!
dialogue_jp: アニキ！

dialogue_en: Yeah, Boss!
dialogue_jp: ブッチョ

dialogue_en: Meh Blar!
dialogue_jp: フンガー！

dialogue_en: Ready, boys? Then let's burn rubber!
dialogue_jp: 全員　オレ様についてこい！

dialogue_en: You got it, Boss!
dialogue_jp: へい　アニキ！

dialogue_en: You got it, Boss!
You got it, Boss!
Sorry, rookie. You're fired.
dialogue_jp: 悪いが　おまえらクビだ

dialogue_en: But, hey, lotsa bumps like that in the ride of life. Gotta hang on tight.
dialogue_jp:
つぎ会うときゃあ
ミグルミはがされないよう　気をつけな

dialogue_en: One helluva life they're livin'...
dialogue_jp: 自由すぎるぜ

dialogue_en: Gotta admit─kinda jealous.
dialogue_jp: ああ　うらやましい

dialogue_en: ...Psych.
dialogue_jp: なんつって

dialogue_en: ...Psych.
dialogue_jp: なんつって

dialogue_en: I hear Midgar's a mess right now.
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルが大変な状況らしいな

dialogue_en: Two reactors get bombed, and then they get hit by some freak cyclone?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉爆破に続いて
巨大ハリケーン発生だって？

dialogue_en: I dunno how Avalanche and Wutai did it, but they did it.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチとウータイが組んで
破壊工作してるんだろ

dialogue_en: Who do those Avalanche assholes think they are? Buncha jerks.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチってのは　何様だ
ぶっとばしてやりてえ

dialogue_en: It won't affect the mako pipeline, will it?
dialogue_jp:
カームの魔晄エネルギーは
どうなっちゃうんだろう

dialogue_en: What'll happen to us if another war really does break out?
dialogue_jp:
ウータイとの戦争が始まったら
どうなっちゃうの

dialogue_en: You're telling me the Sector 7 plate, like, fell?
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの七番プレートが
落ちたって　本当？

dialogue_en: If you're expectin' a friendly howdy-do, look elsewhere!
dialogue_jp:
『カームへようこそ！』なんて
期待すんじゃねえぞ

dialogue_en: We have our hands full dealing with the refugees.
dialogue_jp:
現在は　ミッドガル事件への
対応が最優先！

dialogue_en: Midgar's under lockdown, so no point headin' up that way.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル方面は封鎖中だ
不用意に街を出るな

dialogue_en: The Kalm monster advisory level is currently at critical!
dialogue_jp:
現在のモンスター注意報は
危険警報状態だ

dialogue_en: The mako outflow from Midgar has stirred up the monster population, making them especially dangerous.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル方面から流出した
魔晄の影響で　グラスランドの
モンスターも暴れだしている

dialogue_en: Leaving town is strictly forbidden!
dialogue_jp: 街を出るのは禁止だ！

dialogue_en: That sweet, fresh air... Hats off to Avalanche for the mandatory vacation.
dialogue_jp:
はあ～　空気がうめえ
アバランチ様のおかげで束の間の休日だ

dialogue_en: Savor these brief respites.
dialogue_jp: せいいっぱい　楽しまねえとな

dialogue_en: When you can get off those pothole-riddled roads and give your sore behind a rest.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルへのガタゴトロードは
ケツが痛くてたまらねえ

dialogue_en: Shinra really oughta do something about that.
dialogue_jp: このイスは　揺れねえだけで最高だ

dialogue_en: Hey, quit slacking! We haven't got all day.
dialogue_jp:
ほら　サボんないで
さっさと終わらせるよ！

dialogue_en: I wanna see the windmills! My teacher said that they're "remnants" from when the republic was still around.
dialogue_jp:
風車村を見に行きたい　ボク知ってるよ
共和国時代の廃墟なんだよね

dialogue_en: It'll be like a history field trip.
dialogue_jp: 歴史の勉強にもなるしさ

dialogue_en: I'm sorry, buddy.
dialogue_jp: ガマンしなさい

dialogue_en: But all the windmill tours have been canceled.
dialogue_jp: 遺跡めぐりのツアーが中止なんだ

dialogue_en: I just spied the cutest chick. Light pink dress, ribbon in her hair... I think I'm in love, man! Can't let this one get away.
dialogue_jp:
聞け弟よ　すげえカワイイ子がいたんだ
ピンクのスカートで　髪にはリボン！

dialogue_en: Seriously, bro? Well, I spotted a girl with the best physique I've ever seen!
dialogue_jp:
本当かい兄さん
僕も　腹筋ピッチピチの新顔発見！

dialogue_en: Wow, I can't believe I missed her! As a founding member of the Singles Club, I should've been paying more attention!
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　新顔をチェックするぞ
モテない男同盟のために！

dialogue_en: You do know we're the only ones in that club, right?
dialogue_jp: その同盟　僕らふたりだけだけどね

dialogue_en: So, uh... What exactly are we supposed to do after we spot a cute chick?
dialogue_jp:
でもさ　カワイイ子を発見したあとは
どうすりゃいいの？

dialogue_en: Fear not, brother!
dialogue_jp: 案ずるな　弟よ

dialogue_en: All you gotta do is channel your inner elphadunk, then charge!
dialogue_jp:
エレファダンクのように
ドカーンと当たってくだけろだ！

dialogue_en: Okay! I picture myself as more of a wolf, but I can do that!
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ僕は　カームファングのように
まっしぐら作戦だ！

dialogue_en: That's the spirit! Say g'bye to single life and say hello to girls galore!
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　モテない男同盟
解散の時は近い！

dialogue_en: God, it was a bitch and a half gettin' out here from Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルから避難してきたけど
大変だったよ

dialogue_en: The roads were a mess─not to mention all the monsters.
dialogue_jp: 道も悪いし　モンスターもヤバくてさ

dialogue_en: Well, it was your bright idea to pack up and flee to Kalm!
dialogue_jp:
あなたが急に
カームに避難しようなんて言うから

dialogue_en: So what're we supposed to do now!?
dialogue_jp: どーすんのよ　これから

dialogue_en: Well, go ahead and make yourselves at home.
dialogue_jp: まあ　ゆっくりしていってくれよ

dialogue_en: Though I imagine it'll take you some time to get used to life here in the sticks.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルに比べたら
仕事も娯楽も　なにもないけどな

dialogue_en: Been no end to the overtime ever since the boss decided to take on a buncha new orders.
dialogue_jp:
工場長が新商品作るって言って
ここんとこ　ず～っと残業ですよ

dialogue_en: Yeah, it's the same with me. Making wooden dolls day in, day out.
dialogue_jp:
うちも　そんな感じですなあ
『カームこけし』で街おこしするって

dialogue_en: Meanwhile, we've all been forced to take leave 'cause of Midgar gettin' locked down.
dialogue_jp:
こっちは休みだよ
ミッドガル封鎖のおかげでな

dialogue_en: Unpaid leave.
dialogue_jp: 給料も出ない

dialogue_en: The meter on the mako tank's clearly gone down.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄タンクのメーター
減ってるよな？

dialogue_en: Avalanche's downright crazy. How the hell d'they expect us to live without mako!?
dialogue_jp:
アバランチ　やりすぎだよ
魔晄がなきゃ生活できないのに

dialogue_en: If a twister like that hit us, I could kiss my house goodbye.
dialogue_jp:
ここにも竜巻がきたら
家が吹っ飛ぶよな？

dialogue_en: I heard those Avalanche guys left Midgar and are on the run now.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチの一味が
ミッドガルから逃亡中らしい

dialogue_en: I can't get a hold of my friend! What should I do? What if they're...
dialogue_jp:
友達が心配だけど
全然電話つながらない　どうしよう

dialogue_en: My washing machine's given up the ghost. You don't think it's got something to do with the drop in mako, do you?
dialogue_jp:
うちの洗濯機　動かなくなっちゃったの
魔晄エネルギーが減ってるせいかな

dialogue_en: It's honestly frightening how many people have evacuated from Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルから避難してきた人
けっこう　いるね

dialogue_en: Oh, please. Does Avalanche really think we can get by without Shinra?
dialogue_jp:
アバランチ恨むわ～
神羅抜きじゃ暮らせないのに

dialogue_en: You know why Rufus had to step up, don't you? Everyone's saying it's 'cause his dad caught something─the man's on his deathbed.
dialogue_jp:
新社長就任のウワサって知ってる？
プレジデント　病気で重体なんだって

dialogue_en: The Midgar news broadcasts back it up.
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルニュース放送局で言ってた

dialogue_en: According to your "sources" maybe.
dialogue_jp: アンタの　その情報の出どころ

dialogue_en: I wouldn't trust anything Wall Market Radio says.
dialogue_jp:
ウォール・マーケットラジオとかいう
あやしいやつでしょうが

dialogue_en: Just thinking about what might've happened to my family makes me sick.
dialogue_jp:
あの子　災害に
巻き込まれてないだろうね

dialogue_en: I've tried to contact them so many times now, but...nothing. I can only pray that they're safe.
dialogue_jp:
連絡してもかけ直せばかりで通じないし
本当に無事なんだろうか

dialogue_en: Our inspection team conducts routine surveys of Midgar's reactors─or we used to.
dialogue_jp:
我らが魔晄炉視察団は　定期的に
ミッドガルの魔晄炉視察を実施してきた

dialogue_en: Goes without saying the bombings put a hard stop to all that. I live for the on-site work. Job's just not the same without it.
dialogue_jp:
だが　今期は魔晄炉爆破の影響で中止
はあ……行きたかったな　魔晄炉視察

dialogue_en: I feel that. I'm the same way with my dog. I just gotta snap a pic of everything he does.
dialogue_jp:
わかるわかる　うちのワンコも可愛くて
もう毎日写真撮ってるよ

dialogue_en: I know, right? I swear I have, like, a million photos of Cactie.
dialogue_jp:
そうだよね　同じ姿勢なのに
ついつい撮っちゃう

dialogue_en: Wanna see 'em? I'm telling you, she's adorable.
dialogue_jp:
みんなも見る？
サボちゃんの写真　可愛いよ～

dialogue_en: How did you even get your hands on a cactuar? They're not local, right?
dialogue_jp:
ほんと　どこでサボテンダー拾ったの
この近くには　いないよね？

dialogue_en: She's late. Too late... Or am I here too early?
dialogue_jp:
遅い……遅すぎる　いや
俺が早すぎたのか？

dialogue_en: Was getting here a day ahead of time overkill?
dialogue_jp: １日前から待つのは　早すぎたか！

dialogue_en: Maybe I got a little carried away with this whole proposal business... But the weekly horoscope was crystal clear!
dialogue_jp:
今日こそ告白するからって
気合い入れすぎたか？　でも
週刊恋愛占いモテオとモテコには

dialogue_en: "Preparation is key." How else am I supposed to interpret that?
dialogue_jp:
出会いを気長に待つべしって
書いてあったし

dialogue_en: I wanna go up the clock tower next! You can see Midgar from there.
dialogue_jp:
次は　見晴らし塔に登りたい
ミッドガルが見たい！

dialogue_en: I gotta check to make sure Sectors 2 and 3 are alright!
dialogue_jp:
弐番と参番のプレートが無事なのか
確認しなくちゃ

dialogue_en: Always looking out for your city, aren't you?
dialogue_jp: あなたは本当にミッドガルが好きねえ

dialogue_en: One day, I'll be telling everyone how you made it into SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp:
将来はソルジャーになって
ミッドガルを守るんだもんね

dialogue_en: Guess what!? I'm gonna get to dance in the harvest festival!
dialogue_jp:
やったわ！
収穫祭の踊り子に選ばれたの

dialogue_en: Congratulations! Have you gotten your costume yet?
dialogue_jp:
すごいじゃないか
じゃあ　もう衣装は届いたの？

dialogue_en: I'd love to see it.
dialogue_jp: 見せてほしいな

dialogue_en: That's so cool! I hope I can be a dancer too when I grow up!
dialogue_jp:
いいな～　早くわたしも
踊り子に選ばれたいな

dialogue_en: Hey, Dad, have you heard of Queen's Blood?
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドって
カードゲーム　知ってる？

dialogue_en: All the kids at school are playin' it! You gotta buy it for me.
dialogue_jp:
みんなやってるから
やりたいんだ　買ってよ

dialogue_en: Sure thing, son. Was thinking of givin' it a try myself.
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　買ってあげよう
僕もやりたかったんだ

dialogue_en: Hoho... Looking adorable as ever, my darling little mako tank.
dialogue_jp:
へへ　魔晄タンクちゃん
今日も可愛いなあ

dialogue_en: Oh no! You've got a bit of a stain. Don't worry, I'll take care of that for you.
dialogue_jp:
ここ　汚れてるな
いまキレイにしてあげるからね

dialogue_en: That weirdo's whispering sweet nothings to the mako tank again. Can't he see the pipes've got it going on?
dialogue_jp:
あのセンパイ　またタンクなでてるよ
いやいや　可愛いのはパイプだろ

dialogue_en: The way they glisten in the sunlight...
dialogue_jp: この　磨かれたツヤがいいんだよな

dialogue_en: Reactors are terrible for nearby farmlands.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉のある場所の土地は
やせてしまう

dialogue_en: Which is why I'm glad we get our mako from Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
カームの魔晄は
ミッドガルから来てるんだ

dialogue_en: Let them deal with the fallout while we reap the benefits.
dialogue_jp:
エネルギーだけ供給してもらうのが
いちばんいい

dialogue_en: Hello! Welcome to the Inn at Kalm.
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　カーム・インをご利用ですか？

dialogue_en: Please, make yourself at home.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ　どうぞごゆっくり

dialogue_en: Safe travels!
dialogue_jp: いってらっしゃいませ

dialogue_en: We hope you found your stay with us refreshing.
dialogue_jp:
カーム・インのご利用
ありがとうございました

dialogue_en: I need to keep this place looking spick-and-span. Don't wanna let Broden down.
dialogue_jp:
お客様が心地よく過ごせるように
念入りに掃除しておかないと

dialogue_en: Especially after he insisted I focus exclusively on cleaning!
dialogue_jp:
掃除だけはうまいって
ブロードさんにも　ほめられたんだから

dialogue_en: Of course, this is only the most recent in a series of crises.
dialogue_jp:
現在　ミッドガルは
かつてない危機にさらされています

dialogue_en: Multiple reactor bombings, followed by the fall of the Sector 7 plate...
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉爆破事件
七番プレート崩壊につづき

dialogue_en: culminating in this unprecedented destruction...
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル・ハイウェイに
突如発生した竜巻が

dialogue_en: caused by a massive tornado, which swept through Sectors 0, 1, and 2.
dialogue_jp:
零番街から　弐番街にいたる区画に
甚大な被害をもたらしました

dialogue_en: After a briefing with Shinra investigators, Mayor Domino released a statement...
dialogue_jp:
ドミノ市長と市当局は
神羅カンパニーの助言を得て

dialogue_en: declaring the tornado to be, quote, "weather warfare..."
dialogue_jp:
この竜巻は　反神羅勢力
『アバランチ』による

dialogue_en: perpetrated by the infamous insurgent group known as Avalanche.
dialogue_jp:
未知の兵器を使った攻撃である
という見解を発表しました

dialogue_en: The administration also suspects the involvement of Wutai─and has begun investigations into the matter.
dialogue_jp:
現在停戦中の
ウータイの関与も視野に入れて
引き続き　調査するとのことです

dialogue_en: Between the reactor bombings and a whole plate falling, hard to see how Midgar'll ever be the same.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉爆破とか　プレート落下とか
ミッドガルはどうなっちまうんだろうな

dialogue_en: If Wutai really does declare war, Kalm'll be in the crosshairs.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイと神羅の戦争が始まったら
カームは前線基地だ

dialogue_en: Where would we go?
dialogue_jp: 巻き込まれるかもな

dialogue_en: Kalm's wine grapes are very delicate. The slightest change in conditions and bam─your crop is ruined.
dialogue_jp:
カームのワインは繊細です
些細なことで　すぐに味が落ちてしまう

dialogue_en: Feels like every new vintage has been more bitter than the last.
dialogue_jp:
このご時世では
苦みが増すでしょうな

dialogue_en: Might even get to the point where I can't choke it down. That'd be a crying shame.
dialogue_jp:
渋みにまで至るやもしれん
いやはや　心配です

dialogue_en: I finally got my hands on that super rare card I've been after!
dialogue_jp:
ついに手に入れたのよ
欲しかったレアカード！

dialogue_en: Wow! Congratulations!
dialogue_jp: ほほう　やりましたねえ

dialogue_en: Now you're one step closer to creating your ideal deck.
dialogue_jp:
これでまた
理想のデッキに近づいたのでは？

dialogue_en: So, where'd you get it?
dialogue_jp: どこで手に入れたんだ？

dialogue_en: At that specialty shop out in the grasslands, of course. The owner used his "special connections" to get it for me.
dialogue_jp:
もちろんグラスランドのカードハウスよ
裏ルートで　特別に仕入れてもらったの

dialogue_en: Really? So does that mean I'm your "one and only"?
dialogue_jp:
え～　ホント～？
わたしが　お星様ってこと？

dialogue_en: Or are you just giving me the same line you give all the girls?
dialogue_jp: このわたしを　口説いてるの～？

dialogue_en: Crap, I'm gonna be so late! That's what I get for keeping up with the news.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　遅刻遅刻！
ニュース聞いてたら遅れちゃったよ

dialogue_en: Shinra's getting a new president, huh? Hope he does something for the economy.
dialogue_jp:
神羅は社長交代だって
景気よくなるといいねえ

dialogue_en: Please tell me this won't rekindle the war with Wutai. That's the last thing we need.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイとこのまま戦争突入なんて
勘弁してくれよ

dialogue_en: I hope they catch those Avalanche guys soon.
dialogue_jp: アバランチ　早く捕まるといいよな

dialogue_en: Did they really lock down the whole city?
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルが封鎖されてるって
ほんと？

dialogue_en: Might be time to start hoarding supplies.
dialogue_jp: 今日は多めに買い物　買い物っと

dialogue_en: Avalanche? I'm worried about the poor rats caught in the cross fire.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチ？
ネズミ被害のほうが困るのよ

dialogue_en: Hey, do you know what's going on in Midgar?
dialogue_jp: ミッドガル　いま大変なの？

dialogue_en: This is where it all began─the first Maghnata Books.
dialogue_jp:
ここは　魔導書店マグナタの
１号店なんだよ

dialogue_en: Here we have the very first Maghnata Books, which has since grown into a worldwide chain.
dialogue_jp:
ここは　全国展開されています
魔導書店『マグナタ』の１号店です

dialogue_en: It is their mission to spread knowledge of planetology...
dialogue_jp:
コスモキャニオン発祥の
星命学を起源とする

dialogue_en: through the distribution of their trademark folios, in the hopes of creating a brighter future for people everywhere.
dialogue_jp:
難解なスキルブックの知見を
民衆に広めようと努力を続けている
歴史ある本屋さんです

dialogue_en: The original manager of this historic location has since retired, leaving it in the care of one of his pupils.
dialogue_jp:
初代の店長さんは引退され　現在は
お弟子さんが経営を引き継いでいます

dialogue_en: And here we have the weapon shop, Selvacarsa.
dialogue_jp:
こちらは
武器屋『セルヴァカーサ』です

dialogue_en: Our blacksmiths work endlessly to supply the people of Kalm with arms to defend themselves and their homes.
dialogue_jp:
グラスランドのモンスターに
負けないように　カームの熟練の職人が
鍛錬した武器がそろっています

dialogue_en: Why not browse their wares─maybe take home a souvenir?
dialogue_jp:
お土産にひとつ
護身用に　もうひとつ

dialogue_en: The craftsmanship is second to none!
dialogue_jp: お買い上げになってはいかがでしょうか

dialogue_en: Kalm's iconic clock tower provides a commanding view of the surrounding grasslands.
dialogue_jp:
こちらは　グラスランドの眺望を
一望できる　見晴らし塔です

dialogue_en: Local legend claims that a proposal made at the top is sure to be accepted...
dialogue_jp:
塔の上で告白したカップルは
結ばれるという伝承もあり

dialogue_en: so─naturally─it's become one of the most popular date spots.
dialogue_jp:
恋人たちに人気の
デートスポットとなっています

dialogue_en: After all, what could be more romantic than standing atop the world and professing your undying love?
dialogue_jp:
永遠の幸せを願いながら
広大な世界の風を　感じてみてください

dialogue_en: And here's the market that furnishes our dinner tables with the freshest produce.
dialogue_jp:
このあたりは
カームのご家庭の食卓を彩る市場です

dialogue_en: It opens early in the morning with the very first shipment of local vegetables.
dialogue_jp:
朝は　採れたての野菜が並ぶ
朝市が開催されています

dialogue_en: Visit in the afternoon to be treated to some of the best lunches in Kalm...
dialogue_jp:
お昼は　素朴な味のランチを楽しむ
お客様でにぎわい

dialogue_en: then swing by in the evening to spend time with the locals picking up ingredients for supper.
dialogue_jp:
夕方には　家族の晩ごはんを
作る人たちが　多く訪れます

dialogue_en: Finally, finish off your day with a hearty Kalm meal that'll leave you raring for a new day of sightseeing.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルやジュノンとはひと味違う
栄養満点の　新鮮な食材で作られる

dialogue_en: You won't find anything like it in Midgar or Junon!
dialogue_jp:
故郷の料理を味わってみては
いかがでしょうか

dialogue_en: This mako tank allows us to live in comfort, with every modern convenience.
dialogue_jp:
この魔晄タンクは　カームの
日々の生活を支えています

dialogue_en: Our supply of mako comes to us all the way from the great city of Midgar, through a giant pipe that travels both above- and belowground.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄エネルギーは　地面の下や
地上を通る大きなパイプを通じて
ミッドガルから供給されています

dialogue_en: The tank itself is modeled after Kalm's old republic-era water tower...
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代の給水塔を
モチーフにした形状となっており

dialogue_en: and is one of our town's most famous landmarks.
dialogue_jp:
カームを象徴する
モニュメントのひとつです

dialogue_en: Landed yourself a cutie, huh? Congrats.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボみたいに可愛い恋人が
できたんだって？

dialogue_en: You gotta introduce me.
dialogue_jp: 俺にも紹介してくれよ

dialogue_en: I wouldn't call 'im a "cutie."
dialogue_jp: チョコボみたいじゃなくて

dialogue_en: He's more dashing. Like a wolf.
dialogue_jp:
カームファングみたいな
かっこいい彼氏だよ

dialogue_en: Oh. Hey, that's great, man. I'm glad you found the one for you. Seriously, congratulations.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　彼氏？
なんだ　そうだったのか
おめでとう

dialogue_en: Damn... Who knew there was so much gil to be made in this wooden doll business?
dialogue_jp:
最近　カームコケシ作り始めたから
いい感じに稼げてるんだ

dialogue_en: Get out─you make those? My wife picked one up recently. Said it's the cutest!
dialogue_jp:
おお　コケシ！
うちのかみさんも買ってたな
可愛いってよ

dialogue_en: "Cute," huh? I'd say they look like the stuff of nightmares, but to each their own.
dialogue_jp:
あれが可愛いのか……
夢で　あれに追いかけられて怖いんだ

dialogue_en: That's the twenty-seventh time I've bombed the interview... I'm never gonna get the job at this rate!
dialogue_jp:
また面接落ちたよ
２７回目　もう嫌になるよ

dialogue_en: I just wish I knew what I was doing wrong.
dialogue_jp: いったい　なにが悪いんだよ

dialogue_en: Why are you so hung up on getting a job in Midgar? Just take over your family's business.
dialogue_jp:
こっちで林業継げば　安定してるし
あんなにかわいい嫁もいるのに

dialogue_en: Besides, you've already built up a life here.
dialogue_jp:
どうして　ミッドガルの仕事に
こだわるのよ

dialogue_en: No! I've dreamt of being a honeyboy my entire life, and I'm not gonna give up now!
dialogue_jp:
オレは蜜蜂になりたいんだ
キレイな　蜜蜂になりたいんだよ！

dialogue_en: When I grow up, I'm gonna be a SOLDIER and fight bad guys!
dialogue_jp:
ぼく　大きくなったら
神羅のソルジャーになるんだ

dialogue_en: So I gotta start training hard now or I'll never make it!
dialogue_jp:
そのために　いまから
モウクンレンしてるんだ！

dialogue_en: Breathe in that fresh air! Take in the never-ending sky! Goodbye Midgar, hello freedom.
dialogue_jp:
きれいな空気　どこまでも広い空
プレートがないだけで　この解放感！

dialogue_en: This is just what I needed to put that creep behind me.
dialogue_jp:
ここなら彼氏とケンカ別れしたこと
忘れられそうね

dialogue_en: Ugh, that absolute pig...
dialogue_jp: そうそう　アイツ

dialogue_en: I can't believe he dumped both of us! The nerve!
dialogue_jp:
まさか私も振るなんてありえないわ
ホント

dialogue_en: Wait, you were dating him too? How am I only finding out about this now!? What the hell!?
dialogue_jp:
えっ　あんたもアイツと付き合ってたの
そんな話　聞いたことないんですけど！

dialogue_en: Oh crap. I wasn't supposed to tell you that part.
dialogue_jp: しまった　これ秘密だったわ

dialogue_en: Took a wrong turn the other day and wound up at the lookout on the cliff.
dialogue_jp:
このまえ　道に迷って
物見やぐらまで行ったら

dialogue_en: It was crawling with bandits. Do not recommend.
dialogue_jp:
盗賊団みたいなのに追いかけられて
大変だったよ

dialogue_en: You gotta pay more attention to where you're going.
dialogue_jp: 相変わらず方向音痴ね

dialogue_en: I'll never forget the time you set off for the farms and somehow wound up at the swamp, surrounded by monsters.
dialogue_jp:
このまえも農場に行こうとして
船着き場に行っちゃって
モンスターに追いかけられてたじゃない

dialogue_en: Yeah, you think I would've learned by now that staring up at the sky as I walk is a recipe for disaster.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　空の鳥を眺めながら歩いてると
変なとこいっちゃうんだよなあ

dialogue_en: "I am Baron Kylegate! Behold the towering wall that I have built!"
dialogue_jp:
『我はカイルゲイト伯爵！
　見よ　この凛々しくそそり立つ壁を』

dialogue_en: "The future of Kalm is bright indeed!"
dialogue_jp: 『ああ　カームの未来は幸いなり！』

dialogue_en: No, no! That won't do at all.
dialogue_jp: いや　こうじゃないな

dialogue_en: We'll never draw crowds to the theater with hackneyed drivel like this.
dialogue_jp:
カーム歌劇団のために
もっと　いい話を書かないとな

dialogue_en: Morning! Whaddaya wanna do today once everyone gets here?
dialogue_jp:
おはよう　みんな集まったら
今日はなにする？

dialogue_en: We are, don't worry! We'll decide who's "it" when the others come.
dialogue_jp:
そうそう！
集まったらオーガ決めないとね

dialogue_en: I was really looking forward to going into Midgar this weekend...
dialogue_jp:
週末にミッドガルでイベントだったのに
封鎖なんて

dialogue_en: That materia pop eating contest was my chance to try the flavors I haven't yet.
dialogue_jp:
マテリアイスの大食い大会
今度こそ　全制覇狙ってたの

dialogue_en: What about next week? They're bringing back that limited edition Titan pop. You liked that one, didn't you?
dialogue_jp:
来週なら限定タイタンアイスが出るから
それまで待つと思えばいいんじゃない？

dialogue_en: Thing is, I gotta finish it, but that one's so big that by the time I have, I'll be way too full to try any of the other types.
dialogue_jp:
あれ　大きすぎてお腹いっぱいになるの
マテリアイス全制覇できなくなるのよね

dialogue_en: Oh my god, tell me you've read the latest issue of Cactuar King. It's legit amazing!
dialogue_jp:
そういえばさ　モーグリ書店が出してる
『サボテン大王』の新作読んだ？

dialogue_en: No worries, I'll lend you my copy. Oh, but don't spoil anything for other people, 'kay?
dialogue_jp:
貸したげるからあんたも読んで
あっ　みんなにネタバレ厳禁だからね！

dialogue_en: My boy and I had a big falling-out.
dialogue_jp: 息子がミッドガルで働いてる

dialogue_en: He moved to Midgar because of it. Word is he's a well-known singer now...
dialogue_jp:
ケンカ別れしちまったが
プロの歌手になって成功したって聞いた

dialogue_en: I finally got my hands on the new issue of Mysteryc!
dialogue_jp:
やっと『月刊ミステリック』
買えたんだ～！

dialogue_en: Pretty cool, isn't it?
dialogue_jp: ほら　見てよ

dialogue_en: It's got pics of republic tanks, and windmills, and─everything!
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代の戦車や風車が
きれいに載ってる！

dialogue_en: You like lookin' at rusted hunks of crap?
dialogue_jp: 遺跡の写真集なんて見て楽しいか？

dialogue_en: Chocoboy Weekly is way better. Check out these sweet birds!
dialogue_jp:
『週刊チョコボーイ』じゃ
チョコボグラビアなんてのもあるんだぞ

dialogue_en: Yeah, no thanks.
dialogue_jp: いいんです～

dialogue_en: I'll take historic, educational artifacts over cheap cutesy crap every time.
dialogue_jp:
可愛いものより　古いもの
歴史が感じられるものがいいのよ

dialogue_en: One of these days I gotta make it out to Cosmo Canyon...
dialogue_jp:
はあ　いつかコスモキャニオンに
旅行にいきたいわ～

dialogue_en: It's not your machine; it's the mako pipeline!
dialogue_jp:
そりゃ　ミッドガルからの
魔晄が減ってるからよ

dialogue_en: The town's been runnin' on fumes since those terrorist attacks.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチの連中が
魔晄炉を爆破したから

dialogue_en: Either way... It's a good excuse to get your husband to buy you a new one!
dialogue_jp:
どっちにせよ
旦那に新しいのを買わせるチャンスよ

dialogue_en: Technology sure has come a long way since our younger days.
dialogue_jp:
いまでは　なんでもかんでも
魔晄エネルギーで動く

dialogue_en: Hard to think we got by without mako.
dialogue_jp: 便利な世の中になったものだ

dialogue_en: You know, I thought Kalm was some hick town in the middle of nowhere. Surprised it's actually kinda liveable.
dialogue_jp:
田舎だと思ってたけど　いいなあカーム
もうここに住んじまおうかな

dialogue_en: So...you guys got anything here like the Honeybee Inn?
dialogue_jp:
でさ　ここにも
蜜蜂の館とか　ある？

dialogue_en: Why don't you just stick to regular bars for now?
dialogue_jp: ねえよ　酒場で我慢しとけって

dialogue_en: The Honeybee Inn is the whole reason you're out here, man. You wanna rack up more debt?
dialogue_jp:
踊り子に貢ぎまくって
借金取りに追われてるの知ってるんだぞ

dialogue_en: How much is this one here?
dialogue_jp: これ　いくらだ？

dialogue_en: Yeah, I better pick me up one of these.
dialogue_jp:
こういうのも
持ってたほうがいいんだろうな

dialogue_en: Mm, this one looks sharp.
dialogue_jp: おっ　いいわねこの剣！

dialogue_en: Extra bullets, a couple cans of oil... Gotta be prepared for anything these days.
dialogue_jp:
弾の補充に　整備用の油
物騒だから予備も……と

dialogue_en: Chocobo Express! Delivery!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボ運送の荷物
お届けでーす

dialogue_en: Got a package with your name on it!
dialogue_jp: お待たせしました　っと

dialogue_en: Yeah, looking good!
dialogue_jp: う～ん　いいねえ！

dialogue_en: Okay, say cheese!
dialogue_jp: はい　笑顔ちょうだい！

dialogue_en: That's perfect!
dialogue_jp: 最高だよ！

dialogue_en: Beautiful. You got it!
dialogue_jp: きれいだ　いいよ～

dialogue_en: Ahaha.
dialogue_jp: ふふふっ

dialogue_en: Hehe.
dialogue_jp: うふふ

dialogue_en: This okay?
dialogue_jp: どうかな？

dialogue_en: I need a break!
dialogue_jp: 疲れる～

dialogue_en: Whaddya think?
dialogue_jp: こんなのはどう？

dialogue_en: Hahaha!
dialogue_jp: あっははは！

dialogue_en: Am I good or what?
dialogue_jp: いいだろ

dialogue_en: How's this pose?
dialogue_jp: はい　ポーズ！

dialogue_en: Yeah, that's the stuff!
dialogue_jp: いいよ～　ステキ！

dialogue_en: What do I press?
dialogue_jp: どうやるの？

dialogue_en: Like this?
dialogue_jp: こうかな？

dialogue_en: Ah! Out of focus...
dialogue_jp: あっ　ピンボケ……

dialogue_en: It's so tall! I wanna draw a picture of Midgar. Come on!
dialogue_jp:
すごーい！
ミッドガルの絵　早く描きたい

dialogue_en: What's that? You...want my business card?
dialogue_jp: うひょ　名刺が欲しい？

dialogue_en: I was a supervisor in Shinra's Space and Aeronautics Division.
dialogue_jp:
わしは神羅の宇宙開発部門で
働いてたんだ

dialogue_en: We worked day and night developing new rockets.
dialogue_jp: ロケット開発で毎日忙しくてな

dialogue_en: Barely had time to squeeze in a nap, we were so busy.
dialogue_jp:
居眠りするヒマもない
労働の日々だ

dialogue_en: Though it paid well enough. One day's earnings were about what an average man makes in a month.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　きみが毎月稼ぐ金を
１日で稼いでいたぞ

dialogue_en: Well? Jealous? I'll bet you want my business card now, don't you?
dialogue_jp:
うひょ　うらやましいだろ
名刺いるか　うん？

dialogue_en: So, what's new with you?
dialogue_jp: 景気はどうですかな

dialogue_en: As for me, the hotel I left my son in Costa del Sol seems to be doing well.
dialogue_jp:
私のほうは　息子に譲った
コスタに出してるホテルが順調でして

dialogue_en: Well, that's excellent news!
dialogue_jp: おお　いいですな

dialogue_en: Personally, I'm thinking of investing in a chocobo racing team.
dialogue_jp:
私はチョコボレースに投資しようかと
計画中です

dialogue_en: If it's chocobos you're interested in, you'd be better off buying a ranch of your own. That's where the real money's at.
dialogue_jp:
ほう　チョコボ遊びなら
ファームまるごと買っちゃうほうが
安いかもしれませんな

dialogue_en: Our candy uses locally produced cherries and chocolate!
dialogue_jp:
地元のチェリーと
チョコレートを使ったお菓子よ

dialogue_en: Free samples available!
dialogue_jp: どうぞ　試食していって！

dialogue_en: We've got Midgar-style too!
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルアレンジもあるわよ

dialogue_en: They're as sweet as can be, all with zero calories!
dialogue_jp:
甘～い甘～いシロップだけど
ノンカロリー！

dialogue_en: You won't find coffee like this anywhere else, I guarantee!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボが作った
不思議なコーヒーはいかがですか？

dialogue_en: Try a relaxing cup of coffee─made by chocobos!
dialogue_jp:
不思議なチョコボコーヒーで
ステキなひとときを

dialogue_en: You heard the rumors about this "chocoffee" stuff?
dialogue_jp:
チョコボコーヒーのウワサ
知ってる？

dialogue_en: It's made from saraha nuts chewed by chocobos.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボに
サラハの実を噛ませて作るんだって

dialogue_en: Finally, we're in. It's crowded today.
dialogue_jp:
やっと入れたね～
ホント　今日は混んでる

dialogue_en: So, um...
dialogue_jp: こんな日だけど

dialogue_en: They say if you go to the top and tell someone how you feel, you'll live happily ever after.
dialogue_jp:
この塔の上で告白をすれば
幸せな結婚ができるって逸話は
変わらないよ

dialogue_en: Sorry, but, uh, I don't really believe in that kinda stuff.
dialogue_jp:
おっと　わたし違うから
告白はナシね

dialogue_en: Need something for the kids? How 'bout a handmade wooden doll?
dialogue_jp:
カームこけし
カームこけしはいらんかえ～！

dialogue_en: All natural! Made from local wood! Guaranteed to bring you closer to that special someone too!
dialogue_jp:
恋愛成就間違いなしの　グラスランドの
天然木材を使った民芸品だ

dialogue_en: Brings you good luck and keeps you safe to boot! There's nothing this doll can't do!
dialogue_jp:
開運　縁結び　家内安全
ご利益は本物だよ！

dialogue_en: Sold only in Kalm─the perfect souvenir!
dialogue_jp:
カームこけし
お土産にぜひ買っていって！

dialogue_en: I heard this "Avalanche" is tearing Midgar to pieces. What has the world come to?
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルは　大変らしいじゃない
反神羅のアバランチが暴れてるんでしょ

dialogue_en: Goodness! I'd certainly be much more concerned about that.
dialogue_jp:
あらまあ
そっちのほうが気になるわね

dialogue_en: Cool off with some chocobo ice cream!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボフレーバーの
アイスはいかがですか？

dialogue_en: Our ice cream is made with fresh milk straight from the local farms!
dialogue_jp:
グラスランド農場直送の
濃厚ミルクで作ってまーす！

dialogue_en: Topped with a generous helping of lasan nuts!
dialogue_jp: おまけにラサンの実もまぜるわよ～！

dialogue_en: Moogle buns! Get your piping hot moogle buns!
dialogue_jp:
ふわふわ　とろっとろクリームの
モーグリまんじゅう！

dialogue_en: Even the fluffy pom is packed with cream!
dialogue_jp:
ポンポンまで
クリームたっぷりだよ～！

dialogue_en: Come share a moogle bun with that special someone! You won't regret it!
dialogue_jp:
いっしょに食べたら幸せになる
モーグリまんじゅうはいかが～？

dialogue_en: There's so much fresh produce to choose from!
dialogue_jp: 新鮮な食材を仕入れるぞ～

dialogue_en: Hmm... What looks good today?
dialogue_jp: さて　今日はなにを買おうかな

dialogue_en: Hard to choose... Anything you'd recommend?
dialogue_jp: ええと　今日のオススメはなに？

dialogue_en: Okay, good on produce. Just need to grab some meat and cheese.
dialogue_jp:
よし　野菜は買った
あとは　肉とチーズだな

dialogue_en: I love the smell of fresh vegetables. There's nothing like it.
dialogue_jp:
市場はいいよな～
野菜のかおりが気持ちいい！

dialogue_en: I'd better stock up on Ifrit oil while it's still on sale.
dialogue_jp:
イフリートオイルが特売だから
買いに行かなきゃね

dialogue_en: Oh, that shop looks promising.
dialogue_jp: 次はあの店で仕入れて　っと

dialogue_en: I always have a hard time deciding what I want.
dialogue_jp: 今日のサラダは　なににしようかな

dialogue_en: All these sales are so gosh darn tempting, but I gotta watch how much I spend.
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　これも安いあれも安い
買いすぎ注意ね

dialogue_en: What hidden treasures will I find in the shops today?
dialogue_jp: さて　今日もお店をめぐりますか！

dialogue_en: Hello and welcome to my humble shop!
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい　アイテム屋で～す！

dialogue_en: Stock up on whatever you need!
dialogue_jp: しっかり準備していってね

dialogue_en: Go on. Take a look around!
dialogue_jp: さあ　選んで選んで！

dialogue_en: Thanks. Hope to see you again soon!
dialogue_jp: またのご利用　お待ちしてま～す！

dialogue_en: Thank you so much!
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございました～！

dialogue_en: You have yourself a wonderful day!
dialogue_jp: バイバ～イ　また来てね！

dialogue_en: This place has great customer service. It's my go-to.
dialogue_jp:
お姉さんが　いつも元気だから
通っちゃうんだよな

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh... Don't mind me. I'm just window-shopping.
dialogue_jp: フフフ　私はただの冷やかしです

dialogue_en: Vending machines don't have that personal touch, you know?
dialogue_jp:
自動販売機より
ここで買うほうが好きなのよ

dialogue_en: Maybe I should grab some potions.
dialogue_jp: ポーションの予備を買っておこうかしら

dialogue_en: All my vegetables are locally sourced!
dialogue_jp: グラスランドの採れたて野菜だよ！

dialogue_en: Don't pass up these succulent fruits straight from the orchard!
dialogue_jp: 農場直送の　あま～い果物もあるよ

dialogue_en: Fresh fish from Junon harbor! Right here!
dialogue_jp: ジュノンの港から仕入れた魚だよ

dialogue_en: Good grilled, baked, or fried!
dialogue_jp: 焼いてもよし　煮てもよし！

dialogue_en: How about a slice of Kalm's mystery pizza?
dialogue_jp:
摩訶不思議な
カームピザはいかがっすか？

dialogue_en: Just one bite and you'll find yourself running back for more!
dialogue_jp:
とろとろチーズに　ピリ辛ソース
クセになるよ！

dialogue_en: Household goods! We've got everything you need!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　見ていって！
お得な品がいっぱいよ～

dialogue_en: All the essentials at bargain prices!
dialogue_jp: 役に立つ品がそろってるよ～！

dialogue_en: Fresh bread─straight from the oven!
dialogue_jp: 焼きたてのパンはいかがですか～？

dialogue_en: We've got plenty of sandwiches and lunches too!
dialogue_jp: お弁当に　サンドイッチもあります！

dialogue_en: Locally raised beef and pork right here!
dialogue_jp: グラスランドで育ったお肉たちだよ！

dialogue_en: Treat your family to some nice, juicy steaks tonight!
dialogue_jp:
今日は家族で
厚切りステーキはどうだい？

dialogue_en: You won't find any meat cheaper than mine! See for yourself!
dialogue_jp: 肉を買うならうちの店だ　安いぞ！

dialogue_en: All kinds of cuts, all very good! Buy 'em while you can!
dialogue_jp:
どの部位もオススメ！
ぜんぶ買ってくのもいいぜ

dialogue_en: Come on down, and browse our wares at your leisure!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　寄ってらっしゃい
見てらっしゃい！

dialogue_en: Bargain prices, right here!
dialogue_jp: 安いよ　安いよー！

dialogue_en: You're welcome to look and touch! Take all the time you need!
dialogue_jp:
見るだけならタダ！
どうぞ　お手に取ってみて～

dialogue_en: Nothing like a leisurely stroll to clear your head.
dialogue_jp:
散歩をすると
気持ちが落ち着きますよね

dialogue_en: This tranquility is what makes Kalm, Kalm.
dialogue_jp: この静けさが　カームの日常なんです

dialogue_en: Ahhh... There's a nice breeze today.
dialogue_jp: ああ　今日も風が気持ちいいな

dialogue_en: No matter what happens outside these walls, I know we'll be safe in Kalm.
dialogue_jp:
外でなにがあっても
カームの壁の中は安全と信じたい

dialogue_en: I can never get enough of this view.
dialogue_jp:
ここの景色が
お気に入りなんですよ

dialogue_en: I love how time almost seems to stop here.
dialogue_jp:
ゆるやかに流れる時間
好きなんです

dialogue_en: The scent of flowers on the wind is simply divine.
dialogue_jp: あら　今日は花のかおりがここまで

dialogue_en: Maybe today I'll meet the person of my dreams.
dialogue_jp: すてきな出会いがありますように

dialogue_en: Moving here was the best decision of my life.
dialogue_jp: カームに引っ越してきて良かった～

dialogue_en: I pray these peaceful days last forever.
dialogue_jp:
平和な日々が続くようにって
祈るんです

dialogue_en: Hmmm-hm-hmmm♪
dialogue_jp: ふ～ん　ふふ～ん

dialogue_en: Is it just me, or is Broden not doing so well?
dialogue_jp: 宿屋のブロードさん　調子悪そうね

dialogue_en: Didn't you used to have a crush on him? Said his eyes looked "sad when he smiled," or something?
dialogue_jp:
あなた　彼のファンだったわよね
寂しそうな笑顔がステキとかなんとか

dialogue_en: So, how was your trip to Midgar? Did you hit up the Honeybee Inn like you always do?
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルもうでは　いかがでした
いつもの蜜蜂の館には行きましたか？

dialogue_en: Yeah, you should've been there, man. This blonde dude slayed the stage like I've never seen before.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　すげえステージだった
金髪の踊り子のダンスがキレキレでさ

dialogue_en: Then they beat his mug and sent him to Corneo's place.
dialogue_jp:
女装して
コルネオの屋敷に行っちまったけど

dialogue_en: Hope he made it outta there in one piece.
dialogue_jp: いまごろ　どうなってんだろうな

dialogue_en: I dunno, man. Everyone's saying that another war might break out.
dialogue_jp:
戦争が始まるかもって噂ですけど
どうします

dialogue_en: D'you think we oughta cancel our Honeybee Inn trip?
dialogue_jp: 蜜蜂の館ツアー　やめにします？

dialogue_en: No way! It's times like this that you really gotta let loose!
dialogue_jp:
こんなときこそ
ハニーたちに元気もらうんだよ

dialogue_en: Plus, I can't pass up a chance at seeing that blonde queen again.
dialogue_jp:
女装の踊り子
まだいてくれるといいんだけどな

dialogue_en: That's it, spread your beautiful petals.
dialogue_jp: さあ　きれいなお花を咲かせてね

dialogue_en: Ah, I love this scent.
dialogue_jp: ああ　いいにおい

dialogue_en: Hmm... But what made them the way they are?
dialogue_jp: う～ん　黒マントとはなにか

dialogue_en: I'd bet all my gil that Shinra's got something to do with 'em.
dialogue_jp: そこにあるのは　神羅の闇か

dialogue_en: Oh, I'm working on an article about those men in robes.
dialogue_jp:
私は　黒マントたちのことを
追っている作家だ

dialogue_en: Most agree that they suffer from acute mako poisoning, but others theorize that they're also victims of secret experiments.
dialogue_jp:
彼らは　重度の魔晄中毒という説が
一般的だが　特別な実験の
犠牲者という説もあるようだ

dialogue_en: Personally, I think there's something even more sinister behind their existence, but I don't have any proof yet.
dialogue_jp:
もっと秘密があるような気がするんだが
まずは　証拠を集めて検証しようと思う

dialogue_en: And I'd better be careful making claims involving Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
神羅を敵にまわすことになれば
厄介だからな

dialogue_en: I'll never forget those steamed buns. The minced meat filling was...it was heavenly.
dialogue_jp:
フッカフカのお饅頭に
甘辛いそぼろ煮　うまかったなあ

dialogue_en: That's my one regret about leaving Midgar for good. No more stopping off for Sector 8 buns. I used to eat 'em every day.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルを離れて残念なのは
あの八番饅頭を
いつでも食べられなくなったことだな

dialogue_en: I'll miss that girl too. My little steamed honeybun...
dialogue_jp:
ああ　売り子のお姉さん
ボクのお饅頭ちゃん

dialogue_en: I wonder if she's still selling them.
dialogue_jp: いまごろ　どうしてるかな

dialogue_en: It's missing something... Maybe adding a few flowers from that big hill west of here will give it more variety?
dialogue_jp:
ここの花壇　ミッドガルが見える丘から
花を摘んできたら
もっと綺麗になるんじゃないかしら

dialogue_en: Red, blue, yellow... Could use green foxtails too.
dialogue_jp:
赤　青　黄色そろえて飾って
緑のねこじゃらしも

dialogue_en: Yeah, that ought to really liven this up.
dialogue_jp: いいアクセントになるわよね　きっと

dialogue_en: It did seem like his health was taking a turn, so maybe he went to see a doctor?
dialogue_jp:
体調悪かったみたいだし
どこかに療養でも行ったのかしら

dialogue_en: A trooper slugged me. Me! If it weren't for those terrorists...
dialogue_jp:
兵士に殴られたよ
この傷はアバランチのせいだ

dialogue_en: If it weren't for the Midgar bombings, we'd still be getting a steady stream of mako.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉爆破の影響で
カームの魔晄タンクもやばいらしい

dialogue_en: Shinra must mean business, dropping paratroopers...
dialogue_jp: 神羅軍の本気　見せてもらったぜ

dialogue_en: Those rumors about another war might not be rumors...
dialogue_jp:
ウータイとの戦争のウワサも
現実になるかもな

dialogue_en: Those bombings are gonna screw with our lives too. Thanks, Avalanche.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチのせいで
俺たちの生活も苦しくなるな

dialogue_en: If our mako supply gets cut off, Kalm is finished.
dialogue_jp:
カームに魔晄が供給されなくなったら
終わりよ

dialogue_en: It's looking more and more like we've got another war on our hands.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイとの戦争って
ほんとに起こるんじゃないかしら

dialogue_en: I don't wanna think about how many people died when the plate fell.
dialogue_jp:
プレート落下って
何人が犠牲になったんでしょう

dialogue_en: Kalm is currently on high alert! Please limit your activities to essential business.
dialogue_jp:
カームは現在　厳重警戒中だ
立ち寄り先は必要最小限に留めろ

dialogue_en: Once you've finished, return home!
dialogue_jp: 用が済んだら　さっさと立ち去れ！

dialogue_en: The monster advisory level is currently at: Caution!
dialogue_jp:
現在　モンスター注意報
重点注意！

dialogue_en: Recent security operations have agitated the local fiends!
dialogue_jp:
飛空艇の騒音の影響で
モンスターが興奮してる

dialogue_en: Do not approach them under any circumstances!
dialogue_jp: 無闇に近づいて　命を落とすな

dialogue_en: Come to think of it, I saw these odd people in black robes wandering the wastelands outside Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
そういえばミッドガルのゲートの近くで
黒マントたちが
荒野をさまよってるのを見たよ

dialogue_en: Shoulda heard the way they were moaning. Gave me the creeps.
dialogue_jp:
なんか　うめいてるし
気持ち悪いよな

dialogue_en: Prob'ly some slum rats looking to get out of Midgar. Making a run for it with just the clothes on their backs.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルから逃げ出してるのかしら
ドブネズミみたいな　しぶとい人たちね

dialogue_en: Like you guys did?
dialogue_jp: はは　君たちと同じだね！

dialogue_en: So, uh, what do these Avalanche people look like?
dialogue_jp:
ねえねえ
アバランチのメンバーの特徴は？

dialogue_en: No one knows. They didn't show any pictures on the news.
dialogue_jp:
情報ナシ
まだよくわからねえみたいだ

dialogue_en: Then how're we supposed to identify them?
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　探せないじゃない

dialogue_en: Eh, just bring 'em anyone who looks suspicious.
dialogue_jp:
適当にヤバそうなヤツを
差し出せばいいってことさ

dialogue_en: Oh yeah? How 'bout I start by reporting you?
dialogue_jp:
そっか　じゃあ
あんたを通報しようか

dialogue_en: Man, I was sweatin' bullets.
dialogue_jp: いや～　あせったよ

dialogue_en: Almost ran over a bunch of guys in black robes on my way here.
dialogue_jp:
カームに向かう途中
黒マントたちをひきそうになってさ

dialogue_en: Sounds like a close call.
dialogue_jp: 危なかったねえ

dialogue_en: I've seen them too. Buncha mako junkies, aren't they? Wonder if they were chased out of Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
あの連中　魔晄中毒なんだろ？
ミッドガルを追い出されたのかねえ

dialogue_en: I know they got all kinds in the city, but wandering packs of that is a new kind of weird to me.
dialogue_jp:
なんか　集団で歩いてたんだよね
このあたりじゃ珍しいよ

dialogue_en: Children of the planet! Hear our mother's cries!
dialogue_jp: 星の民よ　星の叫びを聞け

dialogue_en: She weeps in grief─cries out in pain and despair even now. Open your hearts and listen.
dialogue_jp:
星は嘆いている
星は悲しんでいる
星は怒っている

dialogue_en: Avalanche has warned us of what will come if we persist in our folly. You need only look to that devastating tornado for proof of her rage.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチの暴行は星からの警告
巻き起こった竜巻は　星の怒りの証だ

dialogue_en: Mako is her lifeblood. Our lifeblood. To exhaust it is to exhaust our very souls, and upset the natural cycle.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄は星の命　星の命が尽きれば
やがて　人の命も尽きる

dialogue_en: We cannot stand by and allow her lifestream to be bled dry! Our lives are bound to the planet. If she dies, then so too shall we!
dialogue_jp:
ライフストリームを絶やしてはならぬ！
我らの命が　星とともにあらんことを

dialogue_en: It's Avalanche's fault we're gonna have to ration mako. Bastards!
dialogue_jp:
魔晄が減ってる原因はアバランチだ
絶対　捕まえるんだ！

dialogue_en: Doesn't matter who comes out on top. We'll lose either way.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチと神羅
どっちが勝っても得しなさそうだ

dialogue_en: Kalm won't last much longer if they keep cutting our mako supply.
dialogue_jp:
このまま魔晄が減ったら
カームは　干上がっちまう

dialogue_en: An Avalanche cell in Kalm? That's ridiculous!
dialogue_jp:
アバランチがカームにいるとか
聞いてねえよ！

dialogue_en: The plate fell? They can do that?
dialogue_jp: 本当にプレート　落ちたんだ

dialogue_en: Better start cutting back. Just isn't enough mako to go around.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄が減ってるのね
いまのうちに節約しなきゃ

dialogue_en: To be honest, Shinra kind of scares me sometimes.
dialogue_jp:
神羅って
あんなに怖いこともするのね

dialogue_en: Does anyone know what those weird robed guys out in the grasslands are up to?
dialogue_jp:
グラスランドで
黒マントの人たち見たんだけど

dialogue_en: We're not gonna be able to keep the lights on at this rate!
dialogue_jp:
魔晄がこなくなって
急に電源が落ちたんだ

dialogue_en: Hurry up and fix it!
dialogue_jp: 早く直してくれよ！

dialogue_en: My fridge is busted! It's been making awful noises all day. Do somethin'!
dialogue_jp:
うちの冷蔵庫も壊れちゃったよ
ガタピシ言ってるんだ　どうしてくれる

dialogue_en: We know the pipeline is broken! What we want to know is when will you fix it!?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄パイプが故障だって？
いったい　いつになったら直るんだ

dialogue_en: Hey, what's going on!? Why is my house hardly getting any mako!?
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと　どうなってるの？
うちに来てる魔晄が少ないんですけど

dialogue_en: I tell you, the whole town'll be stinking to high heaven if we can't do our laundry soon!
dialogue_jp:
洗濯機が動かなくて困ってるのよ
なんとかしてよ

dialogue_en: Get Shinra to send us more mako already!
dialogue_jp: 早く魔晄を送っておくれよ

dialogue_en: Took them long enough. Now life can finally go back to normal.
dialogue_jp:
やっと直ったか
これで普段どおりに生活できる

dialogue_en: That repairman's a lifesaver.
dialogue_jp: 修理人には感謝だな

dialogue_en: Just make sure it doesn't happen again, alright?
dialogue_jp:
今後は　こんなことが
起こらないように頼むぜ

dialogue_en: They really should've gotten on it sooner, but at least it's fixed now.
dialogue_jp:
直ったのね　もう
もっと早くしてほしかったわ

dialogue_en: Now to deal with all the laundry that's piled up.
dialogue_jp: 溜まった洗濯物　片付けなきゃ

dialogue_en: Well, I'm glad to see everything's back to how it should be.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　これでようやく
魔晄が行き渡るわね

dialogue_en: So, let me get this straight. Rufus Shinra, the new president, is the son of the old one?
dialogue_jp:
神羅の新社長は　プレジデントの息子の
ルーファウス神羅って人なんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Yeah, but he's still so young. Dunno if he can handle all that responsibility.
dialogue_jp:
まだ若いみたいだけど
大企業のカンバン背負って
やっていけるのかなあ

dialogue_en: "Hotness" is not a qualification...
dialogue_jp: 仕事は顔でするものじゃないんだけど

dialogue_en: Avalanche was here─in this town!? How could they have slipped by us!?
dialogue_jp:
アバランチがこの街に居ただなんて
なんで気がつかなかったんだ！

dialogue_en: The next time they come through Kalm though, we'll be ready.
dialogue_jp:
今度ヤツらが来たら
俺たちが倒してやるんだ

dialogue_en: We may be an inspection team, but we can hold our own in a fight!
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉を守るのも
魔晄炉視察団の仕事だ

dialogue_en: Something good has to be in store for me after suffering through that interrogation. Patience is always rewarded, right?
dialogue_jp:
神羅軍の尋問にも耐え　待ち続けた俺
きっと　いいことあるよな？

dialogue_en: Oh look, dear. Seems they're practicing the dance for the harvest festival already.
dialogue_jp:
見てくださいよ　あそこで
収穫祭のダンスを練習していますよ

dialogue_en: If I were a few years younger, I'd have to join them.
dialogue_jp:
もうすこし若ければ
私もやるのにねえ

dialogue_en: 'Tis the season, huh?
dialogue_jp: もう　そんな時期か

dialogue_en: Even if you can't keep up with them, you could still go and wiggle along with the beat.
dialogue_jp:
激しいダンスはできなくても　一緒に
ゆったり踊るのはできるんじゃないかな

dialogue_en: When was the last time I danced?
dialogue_jp: ふふ　踊るなんて何年振りかしら

dialogue_en: Probably not since the day you and I met in Wall Market.
dialogue_jp:
昔　ウォール・マーケットのお店で
出会って以来ね

dialogue_en: Whop, whop, whop, whop, whop, whop, whop, whop! Whoosh! Airships are the coolest!
dialogue_jp:
ブオーンブオーン！
飛空艇　かっこいいよな

dialogue_en: Paratroopers away! Go, go, go!
dialogue_jp: たあっ　パラシュート部隊参上！

dialogue_en: When we become Shinra troopers for real, we'll travel all over the world in an airship!
dialogue_jp:
オレ　いつかホンモノに乗りたい
将来は神羅軍に入ろう！

dialogue_en: Yeah! We'll show those bad guys who's boss!
dialogue_jp:
うん　悪いヤツらを
こらしめてやろう

dialogue_en: Shinra troopers always set me on edge.
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　やっぱり神羅が来ると
緊張しちゃうね

dialogue_en: Feels like they're watching my every move.
dialogue_jp: 監視されてるみたいで　ヤな気分

dialogue_en: The sight of those helmeted thugs is enough to make me tense no matter what I'm doing.
dialogue_jp:
うん　兵士のメット見ると
悪いことしてなくても身構えちゃう

dialogue_en: Then again─what if one of those helmets was hiding the man of your dreams?
dialogue_jp:
でも　あのメットの下が
イイ男だったら　どう？

dialogue_en: Well, under different circumstances, I might not mind getting to know one.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　それはアリだわ～
身体検査くらいなら許すかも！

dialogue_en: I can't even remember the last time you invited me out for lunch like this.
dialogue_jp:
久しぶりだね
ランチに誘ってくれるなんてさ

dialogue_en: So, how much do you need this time? Would another three hundred gil cover it?
dialogue_jp:
で　今日はいくら貸してほしいの？
このまえは３００ギルだったけど

dialogue_en: Um, five hundred would be ideal...
dialogue_jp: ご……５００ギルくらいかなあ

dialogue_en: But that's all! And then I can get Fuzzy Wuzzy.
dialogue_jp:
それだけあれば
ムームーちゃんを手に入れられるんだ

dialogue_en: What am I going to do with you?
dialogue_jp: ほんとに仕方ないなあ

dialogue_en: Meow meow!
dialogue_jp: ニャーニャー！

dialogue_en: Here─have some food!
dialogue_jp: ほら　エサだぞ～

dialogue_en: That's for chocobos, not cats!
dialogue_jp: それ　チョコボにあげるやつ！

dialogue_en: Those reactors are turning everything to dust.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉があるから土地が枯れるのよ

dialogue_en: Thank heavens we don't have one here, or there wouldn't be a spot of green left.
dialogue_jp:
カームの自然が守られているのは
魔晄炉がないからね

dialogue_en: Don't start with this again, Grandma.
dialogue_jp: ああ　またお説教が始まった

dialogue_en: You know what? I'm gonna join Avalanche!
dialogue_jp: わたし　アバランチに入ろうかしら

dialogue_en: They're the only ones who care about keeping this planet from turning into a dried out husk!
dialogue_jp:
ひとりひとりの行動が　星を守るの
燃えるじゃない？

dialogue_en: Grandma, please! You of all people should know how much easier life is with mako energy. Just enjoy it!
dialogue_jp:
もう　魔晄のおかげで
穏やかな生活ができてるんだから
それでいいじゃないの

dialogue_en: No, not them. Hmm... That one might bite.
dialogue_jp: あいつは違うな　こいつはどうだ？

dialogue_en: Hahhh... Doubt they've got two gil to rub together, though.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　金持ってなさそうだ

dialogue_en: Breaking news at this hour...
dialogue_jp: 臨時ニュースをお伝えします

dialogue_en: Avalanche, the anti-Shinra terrorist group responsible for the bombings in Midgar, is believed to have taken shelter in Kalm.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルでの破壊活動で指名手配中の
反神羅組織『アバランチ』が
カームに潜伏しているという情報を受け

dialogue_en: Security forces performed a thorough sweep of the town...
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーは
カームに捜索隊を派遣しました

dialogue_en: during which time it was placed under a temporary lockdown, which has since been lifted as of this report.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチ捜索のため
カームは一時的に封鎖されましたが
現在は　解除されています

dialogue_en: The suspects remain at large, though Public Security is confident they will be apprehended soon.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチは　現在も逃亡中で
治安維持部門による捜査が続いています

dialogue_en: Local insurgents are believed to have played a role in their escape.
dialogue_jp:
また　組織の協力者が
カームに潜伏していたとみられ

dialogue_en: The company will conduct a separate investigation to identify these collaborators...
dialogue_jp:
今後は　カームの協力者も含め
さらに詳しく調べていく模様です

dialogue_en: and is encouraging residents with any information to step forward.
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーは
住民への情報提供を呼びかけており

dialogue_en: Information which leads to an arrest is subject to a reward.
dialogue_jp:
有力な情報には
報奨金が支払われるとのことです

dialogue_en: First they target Midgar, and now Kalm...
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの次は
カームが狙われたか

dialogue_en: Even money says Junon is next on the bastards' hit list.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチめ
次は　ジュノンでやらかしそうだな

dialogue_en: Wish Shinra'd get off their asses and arrest 'em.
dialogue_jp: 早く捕まってくれよ　頼むからさ

dialogue_en: I'm tired of wonderin' when I'll hear about another attack.
dialogue_jp:
いつになったら
平和な頃に戻れるんだろうな
